:   "*I am a Jedi, like my father before me.*"
:   ―Luke Skywalker — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/97/IAmAJediLikeMyFatherBeforeMe.flac/revision/latest?cb=20250408140334)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:IAmAJediLikeMyFatherBeforeMe.flac "File:IAmAJediLikeMyFatherBeforeMe.flac"))[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_VI-12)

**Luke Skywalker**, a [Force-sensitive](/wiki/Force-sensitive "Force-sensitive") [human](/wiki/Human "Human") [male](/wiki/Gender "Gender"), was a legendary [Jedi Master](/wiki/Jedi_Master "Jedi Master") who fought in the [Galactic Civil War](/wiki/Galactic_Civil_War "Galactic Civil War") during the [reign](/wiki/Imperial_Era "Imperial Era") of the [Galactic Empire](/wiki/Galactic_Empire "Galactic Empire"). Along with his companions, [Princess](/wiki/Princess "Princess") [Leia Organa](/wiki/Leia_Skywalker_Organa_Solo "Leia Skywalker Organa Solo") and [General](/wiki/General "General") [Han Solo](/wiki/Han_Solo "Han Solo"), Skywalker served as a revolutionary on the side of the [Alliance to Restore the Republic](/wiki/Alliance_to_Restore_the_Republic "Alliance to Restore the Republic")—an organization committed to the downfall of the [Galactic](/wiki/The_galaxy "The galaxy") [Empire](/wiki/Politics#Empire "Politics") and the restoration of [democracy](/wiki/Democracy "Democracy"). Following the war, Skywalker became a living legend, and was remembered as one of the greatest [Jedi](/wiki/Jedi "Jedi") in [galactic history](/wiki/Timeline_of_galactic_history "Timeline of galactic history").

The son of [Jedi Knight](/wiki/Jedi_Knight "Jedi Knight") [Anakin Skywalker](/wiki/Anakin_Skywalker "Anakin Skywalker") and [Senator](/wiki/Senator "Senator") [Padmé Amidala](/wiki/Padm%C3%A9_Amidala "Padmé Amidala"), Luke Skywalker was [born](/wiki/Reproduction "Reproduction") along with his [twin](/wiki/Twin "Twin") sister, Leia, in [19 BBY](/wiki/19_BBY "19 BBY"). As a result of Amidala's [death](/wiki/Death "Death") and Anakin's fall to the [dark side of the Force](/wiki/Dark_side_of_the_Force "Dark side of the Force"), the Skywalker [children](/wiki/Youngling "Youngling") were separated and sent into hiding, with Leia adopted by the [royal family](/wiki/House_of_Organa "House of Organa") of [Alderaan](/wiki/Alderaan "Alderaan") while Luke was raised by his [relatives](/wiki/Lars_family "Lars family") on [Tatooine](/wiki/Tatooine "Tatooine"). Longing for a life of adventure and purpose, Skywalker joined the Rebellion and began learning the ways of [the Force](/wiki/The_Force "The Force") under the guidance of Jedi Master [Obi-Wan Kenobi](/wiki/Obi-Wan_Kenobi "Obi-Wan Kenobi"), whose first [apprentice](/wiki/Padawan "Padawan") was Luke's own [father](/wiki/Parent "Parent"). During the [Battle of Yavin](/wiki/Battle_of_Yavin "Battle of Yavin"), Skywalker saved the Alliance from annihilation by destroying the Empire's [planet](/wiki/Planet "Planet")-killing [superweapon](/wiki/Superweapon "Superweapon"), the [Death Star](/wiki/DS-1_Orbital_Battle_Station "DS-1 Orbital Battle Station"). He continued his [training](/wiki/Jedi_training "Jedi training") in the [years](/wiki/Standard_year "Standard year") that followed, determined to become a Jedi Knight like his father before him, and found a new mentor in [Grand Master](/wiki/Grand_Master "Grand Master") [Yoda](/wiki/Yoda "Yoda"). After his master's death, Skywalker participated in the [Battle of Endor](/wiki/Battle_of_Endor "Battle of Endor") in [4 ABY](/wiki/4_ABY "4 ABY"), during which he confronted the [Sith Lord](/wiki/Sith_Lord "Sith Lord") [Darth](/wiki/Darth "Darth") Vader, whom he [learned](/wiki/Duel_on_Cloud_City "Duel on Cloud City") was in fact his father, Anakin Skywalker. With Luke's help, Anakin returned to the [light side of the Force](/wiki/Light_side_of_the_Force "Light side of the Force") by killing the [Emperor](/wiki/Galactic_Emperor "Galactic Emperor") and [Dark Lord of the Sith](/wiki/Dark_Lord_of_the_Sith "Dark Lord of the Sith") [Darth Sidious](/wiki/Darth_Sidious "Darth Sidious") at the cost of his own life, fulfilling his destiny as the [Chosen One](/wiki/Chosen_One "Chosen One"). Following the Battle of Endor, Skywalker trained his sister as a first Jedi apprentice on [Ajan Kloss](/wiki/Ajan_Kloss "Ajan Kloss"), but Leia ended her training after the birth of her son and seeing his death as a result of finishing her knighthood.

With the [Sith](/wiki/Sith "Sith")'s destruction and the subsequent [capitulation](/wiki/Galactic_Concordance "Galactic Concordance") of the Empire, Skywalker became a living legend as he traveled across the [galaxy](/wiki/Galaxy "Galaxy") during [New Republic](/wiki/New_Republic "New Republic") [Era](/wiki/New_Republic_Era "New Republic Era"), searching for knowledge that would aid him in rebuilding the [Jedi Order](/wiki/Jedi_Order "Jedi Order"). In [9 ABY](/wiki/9_ABY "9 ABY"), Skywalker [rescued](/wiki/Second_rescue_of_Grogu "Second rescue of Grogu") [Grogu](/wiki/Din_Grogu "Din Grogu"), a [Mandalorian](/wiki/Mandalorian "Mandalorian") Force-sensitive child that belonged to the same [species](/wiki/Yoda%27s_species "Yoda's species") as Yoda, from [Moff](/wiki/Moff "Moff") [Gideon](/wiki/Gideon "Gideon")'s [forces](/wiki/Gideon%27s_Imperial_remnant "Gideon's Imperial remnant"), and after temporarily taking the child as an apprentice on [Ossus](/wiki/Ossus "Ossus"). During the training, Skywalker was visited by Anakin's former padawan, [Ahsoka Tano](/wiki/Ahsoka_Tano "Ahsoka Tano"), where they discussed Grogu and how Skywalker sensed that the child's heart was not in relearning the Jedi path. After Grogu's caregiver, [Din Djarin](/wiki/Din_Djarin "Din Djarin"), visited the planet bearing a [gift](/wiki/Grogu%27s_chainmail_shirt "Grogu's chainmail shirt") for Grogu, Skywalker offered him with a choice, accept the gift and return to the Mandalorian, or take [Yoda's lightsaber](/wiki/Yoda%27s_second_lightsaber "Yoda's second lightsaber") and continue with his Jedi training. Grogu chose to return to Djarin, while Skywalker bid Tano farewell as she departed for ways unknown.

Skywalker later took his sister's son, [Ben Solo](/wiki/Ben_Solo "Ben Solo"), by [15 ABY](/wiki/15_ABY "15 ABY") who inherited the [bloodline](/wiki/Skywalker_family "Skywalker family") in the Force and had the potential for limitless power, as an apprentice. Both [traveled](/wiki/Mission_to_Elphrona "Mission to Elphrona") to [Elphrona](/wiki/Elphrona "Elphrona") to study lost Jedi lore, where the trio encountered the [Knights of Ren](/wiki/Knights_of_Ren "Knights of Ren"), while Solo began to be groomed by [Snoke](/wiki/Snoke "Snoke"), a [humanoid](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid") being powerful in the Force. In [21 ABY](/wiki/21_ABY "21 ABY"), Skywalker started feeling an increasing darkness in the Force and having dark visions that frequently came to him in meditation and undertook a [quest to find](/wiki/Quest_for_Exegol "Quest for Exegol") the hidden world of [Exegol](/wiki/Exegol "Exegol"). Skywalker journeyed to [Tython](/wiki/Tython "Tython") where upon meditating, he saw a vision of Exegol and faced nine wraiths when the force ghost of Anakin Skywalker appeared next to him. Following this, Skywalker was able to defeat [Kiza](/wiki/Kiza "Kiza") and the spirit of [Exim Panshard](/wiki/Exim_Panshard "Exim Panshard") but was ultimately unable to locate Exegol after failing to [track down](/wiki/Mission_to_Pasaana "Mission to Pasaana") an [assassin](/wiki/Assassin "Assassin") called [Ochi](/wiki/Ochi "Ochi").

In [28 ABY](/wiki/28_ABY "28 ABY"), Skywalker, glimpsing the darkness in Solo, briefly contemplated killing him, causing Solo to fall to the dark side. The [destruction](/wiki/Destruction_of_the_Jedi_Temple "Destruction of the Jedi Temple") of his [temple](/wiki/Jedi_Temple_of_Luke_Skywalker "Jedi Temple of Luke Skywalker") and the deaths of all his students convinced a haunted and regretful Skywalker that the [time](/wiki/Time "Time") had come for the Jedi to end. Skywalker therefore sought [exile](/wiki/Exile_(punishment) "Exile (punishment)") on the [distant](/wiki/Unknown_Regions "Unknown Regions") world of [Ahch-To](/wiki/Ahch-To "Ahch-To"), having elected to live out his remaining [days](/wiki/Standard_day "Standard day") as a [hermit](/wiki/Hermit "Hermit") despite the galaxy's pleas for help during the [rise](/wiki/Cold_War "Cold War") of the [First Order](/wiki/First_Order "First Order"). His solitude was interrupted in [34 ABY](/wiki/34_ABY "34 ABY"), shortly after the [fall](/wiki/Hosnian_Cataclysm "Hosnian Cataclysm") of the New Republic, resulting in a chain of events that led Skywalker to play [one last, momentous role](/wiki/Battle_of_Crait "Battle of Crait") in the conflict between light and darkness. Although he [passed away into the Force](/wiki/Force_spirit "Force spirit"), his legend would spread throughout the galaxy, rekindling a spark of hope in the enemies of the First Order. Before his death, Skywalker declared that the Jedi Order would not die with him, having trained a final apprentice: the [Jakku](/wiki/Jakku "Jakku") [scavenger](/wiki/Scavenger "Scavenger") known as [Rey](/wiki/Rey_Skywalker "Rey Skywalker").

A [year later](/wiki/35_ABY "35 ABY"), Skywalker's spirit communed with Rey during the final days of the [war](/wiki/First_Order-Resistance_War "First Order-Resistance War"). The Jedi apprentice had exiled herself to Ahch-To, following in Skywalker's example. However, he urged Rey to [confront](/wiki/Battle_of_Exegol "Battle of Exegol") her [grandfather](/wiki/Palpatine_family "Palpatine family"), the [resurrected](/wiki/Cloning "Cloning") Darth Sidious. Believing he had been wrong, Skywalker told Rey that a Jedi's destiny was to confront fear. Following the Emperor's destruction, the spirits of Skywalker and his sister watched over Rey as she buried their lightsabers in Skywalker's [childhood home](/wiki/Lars_homestead "Lars homestead") on Tatooine and adopted the Skywalker name as her own, honoring their legacy and recognizing herself as a member of her chosen family.

## Biography

### Pre-birth

:   "*He is to teach one that will save the universe from a great imbalance.*"
:   ―Serenity, concerning Yoda's future training of Luke Skywalker[[21]](#cite_note-Destiny-21)

 [![During Yoda's training, the Force Priestesses prophesied the coming of another Skywalker.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d1/Epguide612.png/revision/latest?cb=20150528202316) [![During Yoda's training, the Force Priestesses prophesied the coming of another Skywalker.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d1/Epguide612.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/238?cb=20150528202316)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d1/Epguide612.png/revision/latest?cb=20150528202316) 

During Yoda's training, the Force Priestesses prophesied the coming of another Skywalker.

 

During the [Clone Wars](/wiki/Clone_Wars "Clone Wars"), [Jedi Master](/wiki/Jedi_Master "Jedi Master") [Yoda](/wiki/Yoda "Yoda") set out on a journey to discover the secrets of [immortality](/wiki/Force_spirit "Force spirit"). His journey took him to [Moraband](/wiki/Moraband "Moraband"), the ancient [Sith](/wiki/Sith "Sith") homeworld, where he faced [visions](/wiki/Force_vision "Force vision") of the future. At the end of his journey, the [Force Priestess](/wiki/Force_Priestesses "Force Priestesses"), [Serenity](/wiki/Serenity "Serenity"), who guided his journey told him that there was another Skywalker, and Yoda heard his voice from the future say so as well.[[22]](#cite_note-Sacrifice-22) These events alluded to the birth and destiny of Luke Skywalker, as well as his [twin](/wiki/Twin "Twin") sister [Leia](/wiki/Leia_Skywalker_Organa_Solo "Leia Skywalker Organa Solo").[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_VI-12)

### Early life

#### Birth

:   "*It's a boy.*"  
    "*Luke.*"
:   ―Obi-Wan Kenobi and Padmé Amidala — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/08/PadmeDroid-LukesBirth.flac/revision/latest?cb=20250403185137)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:PadmeDroid-LukesBirth.flac "File:PadmeDroid-LukesBirth.flac"))[[13]](#cite_note-Episode_III-13)

 [![Obi-Wan Kenobi was the first person to hold the newborn Luke Skywalker.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/05/LukesBirthday-CGSWG.png/revision/latest?cb=20241205041425) [![Obi-Wan Kenobi was the first person to hold the newborn Luke Skywalker.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/05/LukesBirthday-CGSWG.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20241205041425)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/05/LukesBirthday-CGSWG.png/revision/latest?cb=20241205041425) 

Obi-Wan Kenobi was the first person to hold the newborn Luke Skywalker.

 

Luke Skywalker was [born](/wiki/Reproduction "Reproduction") in [19 BBY](/wiki/19_BBY "19 BBY")[[3]](#cite_note-Timelines-3) on the [asteroid](/wiki/Asteroid "Asteroid") field of [Polis Massa](/wiki/Polis_Massa "Polis Massa")[[13]](#cite_note-Episode_III-13) two [days](/wiki/Standard_day "Standard day") after the [proclamation](/wiki/Proclamation_of_the_New_Order "Proclamation of the New Order") of the [Galactic Empire](/wiki/Galactic_Empire "Galactic Empire").[[2]](#cite_note-Siege_of_Lothal_Recon-2) He[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1) and his twin sister, Leia, who was born minutes after him, were the children of [Galactic Republic](/wiki/Galactic_Republic "Galactic Republic") [Senator](/wiki/Senator "Senator") [Padmé Amidala](/wiki/Padm%C3%A9_Amidala "Padmé Amidala"), who [died](/wiki/Death "Death") shortly after the births, and [Jedi Knight](/wiki/Jedi_Knight "Jedi Knight") [Anakin Skywalker](/wiki/Anakin_Skywalker "Anakin Skywalker"), who had recently fallen to the [dark side of the Force](/wiki/Dark_side_of_the_Force "Dark side of the Force"). To protect the children from the Empire and their father, the now-[Sith Lord](/wiki/Sith_Lord "Sith Lord") Darth Vader, [Obi-Wan Kenobi](/wiki/Obi-Wan_Kenobi "Obi-Wan Kenobi") personally sent the infant Luke to be raised by Anakin's stepbrother, [Owen Lars](/wiki/Owen_Lars "Owen Lars") and his [wife](/wiki/Marriage "Marriage"), [Beru](/wiki/Beru_Whitesun_Lars "Beru Whitesun Lars") on the [planet](/wiki/Planet "Planet") [Tatooine](/wiki/Tatooine "Tatooine"), while Senator [Bail Organa](/wiki/Bail_Prestor_Organa "Bail Prestor Organa") agreed to adopt Leia together with his wife, the [queen of Alderaan](/wiki/Breha_Organa "Breha Organa").[[13]](#cite_note-Episode_III-13) Kenobi boarded the late General [Grievous](/wiki/Grievous "Grievous")'s starfighter, the *[Soulless One](/wiki/Soulless_One "Soulless One")*, once more flew to the planet [Nar Shaddaa](/wiki/Nar_Shaddaa "Nar Shaddaa") and sold it there to transport Luke Skywalker to Tatooine.[[23]](#cite_note-English_Ships_(2)-23)

#### First years on the farm

:   "*And what of the boy?"  
    "*To Tatooine. To his family, send him.*"*
:   ―Obi-Wan Kenobi and Yoda discuss Skywalker's future[[13]](#cite_note-Episode_III-13)

 [![Skywalker was sent away to live with his relatives on Tatooine.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a5/Baby_luke.png/revision/latest?cb=20130207002706) [![Skywalker was sent away to live with his relatives on Tatooine.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a5/Baby_luke.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/223?cb=20130207002706)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a5/Baby_luke.png/revision/latest?cb=20130207002706) 

Skywalker was sent away to live with his relatives on Tatooine.

 

Luke Skywalker spent his youth on the [Lars](/wiki/Lars_family "Lars family")' [moisture farm](/wiki/Lars_homestead "Lars homestead"), where his uncle unsuccessfully tried to discourage his adventurous tendencies, telling him that his father had been "a [navigator](/wiki/Navigator "Navigator") on a [spice](/wiki/Spice "Spice") [freighter](/wiki/Freighter "Freighter")" during the Clone Wars.[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1) His aunt, Beru, would read him storybooks; one day, when his uncle had business in [Mos Eisley](/wiki/Mos_Eisley "Mos Eisley"), she took Skywalker to [Anchorhead](/wiki/Anchorhead "Anchorhead") to use the [HoloNet](/wiki/HoloNet "HoloNet") connections there and show him images of forests, rivers, and oceans.[[6]](#cite_note-TPtSatFB-6)

By the age of three in [16 BBY](/wiki/16_BBY "16 BBY"), Skywalker had found pleasure playing with a model spaceship built especially for him. He did not know that Kenobi had actually built it and that Kenobi had been leaving several of them at his grandmother, [Shmi's](/wiki/Shmi_Skywalker_Lars "Shmi Skywalker Lars") sandblasted tombstone for his aunt to find. One morning, as Skywalker played with his toy, a group of marauders attacked the [farm](/wiki/Farm "Farm"). Obi-Wan Kenobi, who had been watching him from afar, sprang into action, cutting down several Gamorreans before coming to the realization that he was badly outnumbered. Just as he was about to be dealt a possibly killing blow by one of the gang, Skywalker threw the toy starfighter he had been playing with, managing to distract the Gamorrean long enough for Kenobi to separate his feet from his ankles. The battle then raged further, slowly turning in the favor of the defenders which included Owen Lars, who managed to gun down several of the invaders with a blaster. Luke cried out after noticing that one of the marauders, a [Devaronian](/wiki/Devaronian "Devaronian"), had snuck up behind Lars, ready to knock him out. Kenobi then threw his lightsaber cutting the last marauder in half. As Skywalker cheered, Lars threw a punch which knocked Kenobi to the ground. Lars then ushered Skywalker back before chastising Kenobi for his involvement, pointing out the fact that Skywalker's brief show of bravery had potential ramifications for the boy's future.[[24]](#cite_note-Time_of_Death-24)

#### Vader's vision

Shortly after the [Battle of Fortress Vader](/wiki/Battle_of_Fortress_Vader "Battle of Fortress Vader"), Darth Vader accessed a [portal](/wiki/Portal "Portal") to the dark side created by [Darth Momin](/wiki/Darth_Momin "Darth Momin") in an attempt to revive Padmé Amidala. He eventually found an apparition of Amidala standing on a balcony, who rejected his pleas and threw itself off the ledge and was incinerated by lightning. Just after this, Vader saw a blue light in the distance, out of which emerged an apparition of an adult Luke Skywalker, who blasted him back to reality.[[25]](#cite_note-Dark_Lord_25-25)

#### Brushes with Kenobi

:   "*What are you, uh, doin' here? I thought you were gonna keep your distance.*"  
    "*And I will. You know, you were right. He just needs to be a boy. The future will take care of itself. The only protection he needs now, Owen, is you and Beru. Take good care of him.*"  
    "*I will.*"
:   ―Owen Lars and Obi-Wan Kenobi on Luke's future[[26]](#cite_note-Part_I-26)

 [![Luke Skywalker around ten years of age.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/41/YoungLukePlaying-OWKpI.png/revision/latest?cb=20220703212000) [![Luke Skywalker around ten years of age.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/41/YoungLukePlaying-OWKpI.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/230?cb=20220703212000)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/41/YoungLukePlaying-OWKpI.png/revision/latest?cb=20220703212000) 

Luke Skywalker around ten years of age.

 

As Skywalker got older, Owen started homeschooling him so he could learn the family trade. Despite this, he still kept up with Tatooine's [podracing](/wiki/Podracing "Podracing"), [swoop racing](/wiki/Swoop_racing "Swoop racing"), and sky racing culture through comms stations and local chatter. He dreamed of what it would be like to one day be the pilot of a ship.[[27]](#cite_note-DoR:TVG-27)

In [9 BBY](/wiki/9_BBY "9 BBY"),[[28]](#cite_note-Timeline-28) Kenobi looked in on Skywalker via [macrobinoculars](/wiki/Macrobinoculars "Macrobinoculars") around the same time that the Empire's [Inquisitors](/wiki/Inquisitorius "Inquisitorius") [came](/wiki/Search_for_Nari "Search for Nari") to Tatooine looking for the Jedi [Nari](/wiki/Nari "Nari"). Skywalker was tasked with a chore by Lars but instead disappeared causing Lars and Beru to wonder where he went. In reality, he had gone to the roof of one of the homestead wearing a mask and pretending he was piloting a space vehicle.[[26]](#cite_note-Part_I-26)

The next evening, Kenobi visited the Lars homestead and left a [toy model](/wiki/Luke_Skywalker%27s_T-16_skyhopper_model "Luke Skywalker's T-16 skyhopper model") of a T-16 skyhopper for Skywalker. Lars found the toy and returned it to Kenobi the next day telling him to stay away from Skywalker and that they would not accept gifts from Kenobi. Kenobi tried to explain to Lars that there was more to life than just his farm and that there was a whole galaxy out there for Skywalker to explore. Despite being concerned for Skywalker, Lars accused Kenobi of only caring about his well-being only if he was showing signs of force-sensitivity. Lars refused once again to let Kenobi train Skywalker.[[26]](#cite_note-Part_I-26)

While Kenobi was off-world, having been sent by Bail Organa to protect Leia, Kenobi received a transmission from Bail, who was worried that Kenobi had not communicated with him. Bail informed him that if Vader had learned of Skywalker and Leia's existence, or if he did not hear back from Kenobi, he would go to Tatooine to help Lars with Skywalker. After an Imperial [attack](/wiki/Attack_on_Jabiim "Attack on Jabiim") on [Jabiim](/wiki/Jabiim "Jabiim"), while Skywalker was sleeping at the Lars homestead, the [holoprojector](/wiki/Holoprojector "Holoprojector") disk containing Bail's message was found by former Inquisitor [Reva Sevander](/wiki/Reva_Sevander "Reva Sevander") who learned from it that Vader's son was on Tatooine in the care of someone named Owen,[[29]](#cite_note-Part_V-29) who she had met.[[26]](#cite_note-Part_I-26) As she started to pursue Skywalker, Kenobi sensed something was wrong in the Force.[[29]](#cite_note-Part_V-29)

Luke did some work on Owen's speeder and accidentally broke it, so he was marched into a repair shop with Owen to have it fixed. However, the former Inquisitor [Reva Sevander](/wiki/Reva_Sevander "Reva Sevander"), blinded by rage and focusing that anger on the boy, traveled to Tatooine on the hope that killing Luke would bring her justice.[[30]](#cite_note-Part_VI-30)

 [![Luke Skywalker doing chores](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/99/Luke10yo-SWI220.png/revision/latest?cb=20230816013038) [![Luke Skywalker doing chores](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/99/Luke10yo-SWI220.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20230816013038)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/99/Luke10yo-SWI220.png/revision/latest?cb=20230816013038) 

Luke Skywalker doing chores

 

Warned of Sevander's coming [attack](/wiki/Assault_on_the_Lars_Homestead "Assault on the Lars Homestead"), Owen and Beru hid Luke inside their house and claimed that it was the Tuskens who were coming, but Sevander ultimately fought past the aunt and uncle. With Sevander in pursuit, Luke fled into the desert but was knocked out by a fall. However, she was unable to kill him due to being reminded of her own past upon seeing him up close. With Sevander returning the boy to Owen, Beru, and the suddenly-back Kenobi, who had drawn on the hope of what Luke and Leia were capable of to [triumph](/wiki/Fight_on_a_barren_moon "Fight on a barren moon") over Vader on a [barren moon](/wiki/Unidentified_barren_moon "Unidentified barren moon") before returning upon sensing that he was in danger, Luke was ushered back to the homestead by Owen and Beru. The following day, Kenobi stopped by to meet with Owen, who allowed Kenobi to finally meet the young Skywalker.[[30]](#cite_note-Part_VI-30)

#### Taking on Jabba's thugs

:   "*That right kid? You were trying to steal Jabba's water?"*  
    "*It's not Jabba's. It belongs to the* farmers*, I was taking it back.*"
:   ―One of Jabba's thugs and Luke Skywalker[[31]](#cite_note-SW7-31)

 [![Unknown to Skywalker, he was protected by his father's former friend, Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/65/BenKenobiSavesLuke-2015StarWars7.png/revision/latest?cb=20150729193801) [![Unknown to Skywalker, he was protected by his father's former friend, Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/65/BenKenobiSavesLuke-2015StarWars7.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/223?cb=20150729193801)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/65/BenKenobiSavesLuke-2015StarWars7.png/revision/latest?cb=20150729193801) 

Unknown to Skywalker, he was protected by his father's former friend, Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi.

 

During the [Great Drought](/wiki/Great_Drought "Great Drought"), henchmen for the [crime lord](/wiki/Crime_lord "Crime lord") [Jabba](/wiki/Jabba_Desilijic_Tiure "Jabba Desilijic Tiure") the [Hutt](/wiki/Hutt "Hutt") collected a "[water tax](/wiki/Water_tax "Water tax")" on their master's behalf. Despite the damage it caused [moisture farmers](/wiki/Moisture_farmer "Moisture farmer"), Skywalker naïvely stood up to the thugs at night, trying to take back the [water](/wiki/Water "Water") they had stolen from the [farmers](/wiki/Farmer "Farmer"). Kenobi, who sensed the danger his protégé was in, blew their vehicle's lights with [the Force](/wiki/The_Force "The Force") to hide his identity, and proceeded to disable all of Jabba's henchmen. One of them became startled and pushed Skywalker to the ground, causing him to hit his head and pass out. Once Kenobi handled the thugs, he carried Skywalker to the Lars' homestead where he was found asleep, unaware of his savior's identity, by his aunt in the morning.[[31]](#cite_note-SW7-31)

#### Saving Uncle Owen

:   "*Hang on, Uncle Owen!*"
:   ―Luke Skywalker after rescuing his uncle[[32]](#cite_note-SW20-32)

 [![Safe from the bounty hunter, Lars is reunited with Skywalker.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/4e/OwenAndLuke-2015StarWars20.png/revision/latest?cb=20170408073016) [![Safe from the bounty hunter, Lars is reunited with Skywalker.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/4e/OwenAndLuke-2015StarWars20.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/270?cb=20170408073016)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/4e/OwenAndLuke-2015StarWars20.png/revision/latest?cb=20170408073016) 

Safe from the bounty hunter, Lars is reunited with Skywalker.

 

A [year](/wiki/Standard_year "Standard year") after the Great Drought, life carried on for Skywalker on Tatooine. Alongside [Biggs Darklighter](/wiki/Biggs_Darklighter "Biggs Darklighter") and his other friends, Skywalker flew his [T-16 skyhopper](/wiki/T-16_skyhopper "T-16 skyhopper") for a joyride through [Beggar's Canyon](/wiki/Beggar%27s_Canyon "Beggar's Canyon"). Despite some daring moves, Skywalker ended up crashing the vehicle, leading to his uncle Owen grounding him. Skywalker offered to pay for the damage by flying in a race at nearby Anchorhead, but Lars stood his ground. Unbeknownst to both of them, Obi-Wan Kenobi used [Jawas](/wiki/Jawa "Jawa") to leave Skywalker some skyhopper parts. An angry Owen returned the parts to Kenobi and told him to leave the family alone.[[33]](#cite_note-SW15-33)

Some [time](/wiki/Time "Time") after grounding Skywalker from flying his skyhopper, Lars attempted to rebuild his relationship with his nephew by looking to help him fix it. However, before he could, he was captured by the Wookiee bounty hunter [Krrsantan](/wiki/Krrsantan "Krrsantan") and tortured. Meanwhile, Skywalker was running away from home for not the first time. However, he sensed something was wrong and rushed to his homestead. When he arrived, he found many droids destroyed and his aunt Beru rattled, telling him of the attack. She ordered her nephew to lock himself in the homestead's maintenance bay, where he found his disabled skyhopper. He proceeded to fix it and make his way to Krrsantan and Owen. As he flew there, the Wookiee was engaged by Obi-Wan Kenobi. During this battle, Owen was thrown off a cliff. Before he could hit the bottom, Skywalker, in his skyhopper, managed to catch him and escape. Meanwhile, Kenobi defeated Krrsantan. Afterwards, Skywalker was allowed to fly his skyhopper once again.[[32]](#cite_note-SW20-32)

#### Other adventures

:   "*Who…who are you?*"  
    "*Ben Kenobi. You can call me Ben. I am an old friend of your father.*"
:   ―Luke Skywalker and Obi-Wan "Ben" Kenobi, after the latter saves the former[[34]](#cite_note-SBTFA-34)

Eventually, Skywalker became an adventure-seeking youth who demonstrated his father's natural [piloting](/wiki/Pilot "Pilot") skills, as well as a strong desire to leave Tatooine.[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1) At one point in his boyhood, Skywalker was climbing in a canyon, but, when he grabbed the top, the rock broke off. Skywalker fell into a cave, where he was seen by a group of [womp rats](/wiki/Womp_rat "Womp rat") and a [krayt dragon](/wiki/Krayt_dragon "Krayt dragon"), although he managed to escape the creatures.[[35]](#cite_note-Ashcan-35) When Skywalker was 12 years old in [7 BBY](/wiki/7_BBY "7 BBY"),[[36]](#cite_note-Complete_Visual_New-36) he and his friend, [Windy](/wiki/Windy "Windy") went off on their own through the Tatooine desert and wandered away from the [moisture farms](/wiki/Moisture_farm "Moisture farm") riding a [dewback](/wiki/Dewback "Dewback"). The two encountered a [sandstorm](/wiki/Sandstorm "Sandstorm") during their time outside and both lost consciousness. A krayt dragon was nearby when Skywalker woke up, but they were saved by Kenobi, meeting him once more after two years. Skywalker asked him who he was, and Kenobi revealed that his name was Ben Kenobi and an old friend of his father. Soon after, Skywalker exhausted and with Windy, he returned safely to their homes, carried on a dewback.[[34]](#cite_note-SBTFA-34)

 [![As the years passed, Kenobi continued to watch over his friend's son from afar.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d3/Twin-suns-10_46371077.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170319183701) [![As the years passed, Kenobi continued to watch over his friend's son from afar.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d3/Twin-suns-10_46371077.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/212?cb=20170319183701)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d3/Twin-suns-10_46371077.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170319183701) 

As the years passed, Kenobi continued to watch over his friend's son from afar.

 

As more of Skywalker's friends left the planet to follow their dreams, he became increasingly frustrated that his uncle would not allow him to do the same, claiming that he still needed help with the farm. In truth, Owen was trying to prevent Skywalker from following in his father's footsteps.[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1) In [2 BBY](/wiki/2_BBY "2 BBY")[[37]](#cite_note-Twin_Suns_date-37) Skywalker was helping at his foster parent's moisture farm when Beru called him inside. As Skywalker ran back to the house, he was watched in the distance by Obi-Wan Kenobi, who was riding a dewback. Kenobi had just [defeated and killed](/wiki/Mission_to_Tatooine_(Imperial_Era) "Mission to Tatooine (Imperial Era)") the former [Sith apprentice](/wiki/Sith_apprentice "Sith apprentice") [Maul](/wiki/Maul "Maul"), who had a vendetta against Kenobi after being bisected at the torso during the [Invasion of Naboo](/wiki/Invasion_of_Naboo "Invasion of Naboo") [thirty years earlier](/wiki/32_BBY "32 BBY"). In his final moments, Maul asked Kenobi if he was guarding Skywalker. Kenobi affirmed that he believed Luke was the [Chosen One](/wiki/Chosen_One "Chosen One") before Maul passed away.[[38]](#cite_note-Twin_Suns-38)

When not helping his uncle, Skywalker would occasionally go bulls-eye womp rats, or go racing through the dangerous Beggar's Canyon in his T-16 skyhopper by the age of thirteen.[[6]](#cite_note-TPtSatFB-6) He would also spend time at [Tosche Station](/wiki/Tosche_Station "Tosche Station") with his friends, such as Biggs Darklighter,[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1) ["Fixer,"](/wiki/Laze_Loneozner "Laze Loneozner") [Camie Marstrap](/wiki/Camie_Marstrap "Camie Marstrap"),[[39]](#cite_note-SWCT-Camie-39) Windy, and [Deak](/wiki/Deak "Deak");[[6]](#cite_note-TPtSatFB-6) some of them called him "Wormie."[[40]](#cite_note-SW5-40) However, Luke spent most of his time working and always had to be helpful.[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1)

### Joining the Rebellion

#### Leaving Tatooine

:   "*I want to come with you to Alderaan. There's nothing for me here now. I want to learn the ways of the Force and become a Jedi like my father.*"
:   ―Luke Skywalker to Obi-Wan Kenobi — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/1/15/Luke-IWantToComeWithYouToAlderaan.flac/revision/latest?cb=20250410001722)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:Luke-IWantToComeWithYouToAlderaan.flac "File:Luke-IWantToComeWithYouToAlderaan.flac"))[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1)

In [1 BBY](/wiki/1_BBY "1 BBY"),[[41]](#cite_note-Galactic_Atlas-41) Skywalker was working on the family farm by repairing moisture vaporators with one of their [WED Treadwell repair droid](/wiki/WED_Treadwell_repair_droid "WED Treadwell repair droid") when he spotted a [battle over Tatooine](/wiki/Secret_mission_to_Tatooine "Secret mission to Tatooine");[[42]](#cite_note-WED_Treadwell_Droid-42) unknown to the young man, it was the Rebel starship *[Tantive IV](/wiki/Tantive_IV "Tantive IV")* being chased by the [*Imperial I*-class Star Destroyer](/wiki/Imperial_I-class_Star_Destroyer "Imperial I-class Star Destroyer") *[Devastator](/wiki/Devastator "Devastator")*.[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1) Heading to Tosche Station, Skywalker swapped stories with his friends, among them a visiting and recently-graduated Darklighter,[[43]](#cite_note-Bio_Gallery_Biggs_1-43) who was reluctant to believe Skywalker's claims about a battle upon looking up with Skywalker's macrobinoculars and merely seeing the two craft sitting still in space.[[44]](#cite_note-Bio_Gallery_Biggs_2-44) Nonetheless, Skywalker was then eager to tell his friend of his recent exploits aboard his skyhopper in Beggar's Canyon, which Darklighter was amused by. After warning his friend not to crash the ship,[[45]](#cite_note-Bio_Gallery_Biggs_3-45) he leaned close to Skywalker to tell his old friend a great secret: he intended to defect from the Empire to join the [Rebel Alliance Starfighter Corps](/wiki/Rebel_Alliance_Starfighter_Corps "Rebel Alliance Starfighter Corps").[[46]](#cite_note-Bio_Gallery_Biggs_4-46)

 [![Skywalker "stumbles" upon the recording of Princess Leia Organa.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/b9/Doctor_Aphra_4_Star_Wars_40th.png/revision/latest?cb=20190119030618) [![Skywalker "stumbles" upon the recording of Princess Leia Organa.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/b9/Doctor_Aphra_4_Star_Wars_40th.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20190119030618)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/b9/Doctor_Aphra_4_Star_Wars_40th.png/revision/latest?cb=20190119030618) 

Skywalker "stumbles" upon the recording of Princess Leia Organa.

 

Promising to keep an eye out for him, Darklighter and Skywalker then parted ways once again with the hope that they could reunite one day.[[47]](#cite_note-Bio_Gallery_Biggs_5-47) A short time later, the purchase of two [droids](/wiki/Droid "Droid")—[R2-D2](/wiki/R2-D2 "R2-D2") and [C-3PO](/wiki/C-3PO "C-3PO")—by Skywalker's step-uncle changed the young farm boy's life forever. Obtaining the droids from a band of Jawas to help with various tasks around the homestead, neither of them were aware that the droids had narrowly escaped from the battle[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1) Skywalker had glimpsed,[[42]](#cite_note-WED_Treadwell_Droid-42) and that R2-D2 contained a set of [plans](/wiki/Death_Star_plans "Death Star plans") for the Empire's dreaded [Death Star](/wiki/DS-1_Orbital_Battle_Station "DS-1 Orbital Battle Station") [superweapon](/wiki/Superweapon "Superweapon"). While cleaning the two new droids back at the homestead, Skywalker learned that they had been involved with the Rebel Alliance, and witnessed part of a desperate message from [Princess](/wiki/Princess "Princess") Leia Organa requesting help from someone named "Obi-Wan Kenobi," whom R2-D2 claimed that he once belonged to.[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1)

Chasing after R2-D2 when the droid ran off to find Kenobi, Skywalker soon found himself in the company of Kenobi after being attacked by a [group](/wiki/A%27Yark%27s_tribe "A'Yark's tribe") of [Sand People](/wiki/Tusken_Raider "Tusken Raider") out in the [Jundland Wastes](/wiki/Jundland_Wastes "Jundland Wastes"). After traveling back to the [Jedi's home](/wiki/Ben_Kenobi%27s_home "Ben Kenobi's home"), Kenobi soon revealed to Skywalker that he had once been a Jedi Knight who served in the Clone Wars with Skywalker's father. He went on to inform Skywalker that his father was not a spice freighter navigator like his uncle had always told him, but a Jedi Knight struck down by Darth Vader. Skywalker was also given his father's [lightsaber](/wiki/Skywalker_lightsaber "Skywalker lightsaber") by Kenobi,[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1) allowing the blade to be ignited for the first time in years.[[36]](#cite_note-Complete_Visual_New-36) After he showed Princess Leia's message in its entirety to Kenobi, the old Jedi Master requested Skywalker's help to see the mission through, and offered to show him the ways of the Force. Skywalker initially refused to get involved, as he believed his duties at home were more important, but he offered to take Kenobi to Anchorhead.[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1)

On their way to Anchorhead, Skywalker and Kenobi came upon a group of slaughtered Jawas—the same ones who sold the droids to his uncle. Skywalker deduced from learning that Imperial [stormtroopers](/wiki/Stormtrooper "Stormtrooper") were responsible that they might have looked into the sales records of the droids, and rushed home in the hopes of saving his step-aunt and step-uncle. Upon returning home, Skywalker discovered that he was too late: his step-aunt and step-uncle had been murdered by the Empire. With the people who raised him dead, he decided to accompany Kenobi to [Alderaan](/wiki/Alderaan "Alderaan") to deliver the plans back to the Alliance and learn the ways of the Jedi.[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1)

#### Jedi training

:   "*Force is what gives a Jedi his power. It's an energy field created by all living things. It surrounds us and penetrates us. It binds the galaxy together*"
:   ―Obi-Wan Kenobi explains the force to Luke Skywalker[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1)

 [![Skywalker learned through Kenobi that his father was once a Jedi Knight of the Galactic Republic and began his path to be a Jedi under Kenobi.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/92/Lukesaberanh.png/revision/latest?cb=20130228054320) [![Skywalker learned through Kenobi that his father was once a Jedi Knight of the Galactic Republic and began his path to be a Jedi under Kenobi.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/92/Lukesaberanh.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20130228054320)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/92/Lukesaberanh.png/revision/latest?cb=20130228054320) 

Skywalker learned through Kenobi that his father was once a Jedi Knight of the Galactic Republic and began his path to be a Jedi under Kenobi.

 

On their way to Mos Eisley, Kenobi began [training](/wiki/Jedi_training "Jedi training") him and gave Skywalker his first lesson, during which he learned the basics of [Jedi meditation](/wiki/Meditation "Meditation").[[48]](#cite_note-weapon-jedi-48) They would later reach [Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina](/wiki/Chalmun%27s_Spaceport_Cantina "Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina"), where Kenobi believed that they could find a pilot that could get them to Alderaan. Inside the cantina, Skywalker nearly had a fatal run-in with the criminals [Ponda Baba](/wiki/Ponda_Baba "Ponda Baba") and [Dr. Evazan](/wiki/Cornelius_Evazan "Cornelius Evazan"), but trouble was avoided when Kenobi sliced off Baba's arm with his [lightsaber](/wiki/Obi-Wan_Kenobi%27s_third_lightsaber "Obi-Wan Kenobi's third lightsaber") in defense of Skywalker.[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1)

The two were eventually able to find a pilot that could take them to Alderaan in the form of [Han Solo](/wiki/Han_Solo "Han Solo"), a [Corellian](/wiki/Corellian "Corellian") [smuggler](/wiki/Smuggler "Smuggler"), and his co-pilot [Chewbacca](/wiki/Chewbacca "Chewbacca"). Solo's initial rate was ten thousand [credits](/wiki/Galactic_Credit_Standard "Galactic Credit Standard") all paid in advance, which Skywalker thought was too expensive. Ultimately, they were able to compromise when Kenobi offered to pay two thousand credits up front and an additional fifteen thousand when they got to Alderaan, for a total of seventeen thousand credits, which convinced Solo to take them, with Skywalker selling his [speeder](/wiki/Landspeeder "Landspeeder") to [Wioslea](/wiki/Wioslea "Wioslea") to pay for the two thousand up front.[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1) As they left the cantina, they were also cornered by a [stormtrooper](/wiki/Unidentified_stormtrooper_(Mos_Eisley) "Unidentified stormtrooper (Mos Eisley)"), but Kenobi took out the trooper with the Force by throwing large pieces of metal. With it clear that stormtroopers were all around the city, the two moved to quickly depart Mos Eisley.[[34]](#cite_note-SBTFA-34)

After escaping stormtroopers on Solo's ship, the *[Millennium Falcon](/wiki/Millennium_Falcon "Millennium Falcon")*, Kenobi began Skywalker's instruction in the ways of the Force, using a [training remote](/wiki/Marksman-H_training_remote "Marksman-H training remote") to instruct him in basic [lightsaber combat](/wiki/Lightsaber_combat "Lightsaber combat"), much to the derision of Solo, who dismissed it as a "hokey religion."[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1)[[48]](#cite_note-weapon-jedi-48) Wearing a [helmet](/wiki/Helmet "Helmet") that completely covered his [eyes](/wiki/Eye "Eye") for part of the lesson, Kenobi encouraged him to reach out with the Force to combat the remote. Despite his vision being totally impaired, Skywalker was able to successfully deflect a pair of [blaster bolts](/wiki/Laser "Laser") from the remote, claiming that he could "almost see" the remote through the Force.[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1)

#### Death Star rescue

:   "*I'm Luke Skywalker. I'm here to rescue you.*"  
    "*You're who?*"  
    "*I'm here to rescue you. I've got your R2-Unit. I am here with Ben Kenobi.*"  
    "*Ben Kenobi?! Where is he?!*"  
    "*Come on!*"
:   ―Luke Skywalker and Leia Organa[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1)

 [![Skywalker rescued Princess Leia Organa, completely unaware that she was his twin sister.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/b4/LukeLeiaDS1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20071001012807) [![Skywalker rescued Princess Leia Organa, completely unaware that she was his twin sister.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/b4/LukeLeiaDS1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/218?cb=20071001012807)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/b4/LukeLeiaDS1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20071001012807) 

Skywalker rescued Princess Leia Organa, completely unaware that she was his twin sister.

 

The lesson, however, was soon interrupted by their arrival in the [Alderaan system](/wiki/Alderaan_system "Alderaan system") and their discovery of the planet's [destruction](/wiki/Destruction_of_Alderaan "Destruction of Alderaan"). They then spotted a patrolling [TIE fighter](/wiki/TIE/ln_space_superiority_starfighter "TIE/ln space superiority starfighter") and, upon following it, found that it was approaching what appeared to be a small moon, which turned out to be the [Death Star](/wiki/Death_Star "Death Star"). Caught by the Death Star's [tractor beam](/wiki/Tractor_beam "Tractor beam"), they were brought aboard the massive [space station](/wiki/Space_station "Space station").[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1)

Once on board, Luke and Han knocked two stormtroopers out and stole their armor, whereas Kenobi set out to deactivate the tractor beam. However, when R2-D2 discovered that Leia Organa was being held captive on the station, Skywalker insisted on [rescuing](/wiki/Rescue_of_Princess_Leia "Rescue of Princess Leia") her. Though Solo was reluctant to go marching into the [detention block](/wiki/Detention_Level "Detention Level"), Skywalker convinced him to go along with the rescue by claiming that he would get a significant reward for doing so.

Still using their stormtrooper guises, Skywalker and Solo convinced Chewbacca to pose as a prisoner and escorted him to [Detention Block AA-23](/wiki/Detention_Block_AA-23 "Detention Block AA-23") (where Organa was being held.) They were able to rescue Organa, but their cover was blown and they had to jump into the [garbage compactor](/wiki/Garbage_compactor "Garbage compactor") in order to escape the pursuing Imperial forces. After Luke thrashed and struggled against the hold of the [dianoga](/wiki/Dianoga "Dianoga") [Omi](/wiki/Omi "Omi"), the group escaped the compactor and headed back to the *Millennium Falcon*, but not before avoiding more troopers. Though Skywalker and Organa were separated from Solo and Chewbacca, they were able to reunite with their companions, and the droids, in the hangar bay.[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1)

Eventually, the group escaped the Death Star, but only after Kenobi sacrificed himself in a duel with Darth Vader.[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1) Angry and confused, Organa offered some comfort for his grief.[[6]](#cite_note-TPtSatFB-6) Despite the fact that they had escaped from the Death Star, a pursing TIE fighter patrol was on the verge of catching up to them, so at Solo's request, Skywalker manned one of the *Millennium Falcon*'s [quad laser cannons](/wiki/Quad_laser_cannon "Quad laser cannon") to eliminate the enemy fighters, with Skywalker managing to destroy two of them. Once the patrol was eliminated, they traveled to the hidden [rebel base](/wiki/Great_Temple "Great Temple") on [Yavin 4](/wiki/Yavin_4 "Yavin 4"), unaware that the Death Star was tracking them.[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1)

#### Battle of Yavin

:   "*It'll be like old times, Luke. They'll never stop us.*"
:   ―Biggs Darklighter, to Luke Skywalker, just before the Battle of Yavin[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1)

 [![Skywalker fought for the Rebel Alliance as an X-wing starfighter pilot during the Battle of Yavin.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/7b/LukeClimbsXWing-ANHOfficialPix.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20070712144848) [![Skywalker fought for the Rebel Alliance as an X-wing starfighter pilot during the Battle of Yavin.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/7b/LukeClimbsXWing-ANHOfficialPix.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20070712144848)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/7b/LukeClimbsXWing-ANHOfficialPix.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20070712144848) 

Skywalker fought for the Rebel Alliance as an X-wing starfighter pilot during the Battle of Yavin.

 

Upon their arrival at the Yavin base, they met with [Commander](/wiki/Commander "Commander") [Willard](/wiki/Vanden_Huyck_Willard "Vanden Huyck Willard")[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1) and Organa introduced him to Skywalker so that he could join the Rebel Alliance as a [pilot](/wiki/Rebel_pilot "Rebel pilot"). Skywalker then separated and met [Wedge Antilles](/wiki/Wedge_Antilles "Wedge Antilles"), who oversaw his flight simulation test. Lasting no more than 30 [seconds](/wiki/Second "Second"), the more experienced pilot advised Skywalker to listen to his explanations, and encouraged him not to give up. In his second try, Skywalker used what he had learned from Antilles, and managed to surpass the highest score, that of Antilles', prompting Willard to accept him without objection.[[6]](#cite_note-TPtSatFB-6) He joined [Red Group](/wiki/Red_Squadron_(Rebel_Alliance) "Red Squadron (Rebel Alliance)") with the designation of [Red Five](/wiki/Red_Five "Red Five"),[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1) which had previously belonged to a [cadet](/wiki/Cadet "Cadet") named [Pedrin Gaul](/wiki/Pedrin_Gaul "Pedrin Gaul"),[[49]](#cite_note-Rogue_One_Visual_Guide-49) who had perished during the [Battle of Scarif](/wiki/Battle_of_Scarif "Battle of Scarif") several days earlier.[[50]](#cite_note-Rogue_One-50)

After the briefing for their plan of attack against the incoming Death Star, Skywalker prepared himself for the attack, when he saw Solo loading his payment onto the *Falcon* for rescuing Organa and prepared to leave the group. Skywalker attempted to persuade him to stay and help them against the Empire, but Solo refused, claiming that the attack on the Death Star was suicide rather than bravery, deeply disappointing him. After bidding farewell to Organa as well, Skywalker was about to board [his](/wiki/Red_Five_(T-65B_X-wing_starfighter) "Red Five (T-65B X-wing starfighter)") [T-65B X-wing starfighter](/wiki/T-65B_X-wing_starfighter "T-65B X-wing starfighter"), when he encountered his old friend, Biggs Darklighter, the two about to be flying as wingmen in the upcoming battle. In a brief conversation, Darklighter promised Luke that the two would catch up on each other's stories when they got back. Skywalker was also approached by [Garven Dreis](/wiki/Garven_Dreis "Garven Dreis"), the commander of Red Squadron, who asked him if he was sure he could handle the X-wing, to which Darklighter vouched for his friend, calling him the "best bush pilot in the Outer Rim Territories."[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1) Skywalker was assigned command of [fourth flight](/wiki/Fourth_flight "Fourth flight") for the battle.[[51]](#cite_note-Duty_Roster-51)

As the [Battle of Yavin](/wiki/Battle_of_Yavin "Battle of Yavin") got underway and Skywalker and his fellow squadmates launched into space, Skywalker was guided by the spirit of Obi-Wan Kenobi. He participated in Red Squadron's initial assault on the Death Star's outer defenses, primarily focusing on disabling the station's numerous [turbolaser batteries](/wiki/XX-9_heavy_turbolaser_battery "XX-9 heavy turbolaser battery") and fighting off TIE fighters when they were deployed against the Rebel fighters. He also helped to provide cover for [Gold Squadron](/wiki/Gold_Squadron_(Rebel_Alliance) "Gold Squadron (Rebel Alliance)") when they made the first attack run on the [meridian trench](/wiki/Meridian_trench "Meridian trench"), as well as Commander Dreis when he made his attack run. Eventually, Darth Vader himself joined the fray in a [TIE Advanced x1](/wiki/TIE_Advanced_x1 "TIE Advanced x1") and succeeded in thwarting the first two attack runs. Just before he was shot down by the Sith Lord, Commander Dreis instructed Skywalker to lead a third and final run on the trench with Darklighter and Antilles.[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1)

Skywalker took charge of the last attempt on the [thermal exhaust port](/wiki/Thermal_exhaust_port "Thermal exhaust port") as instructed, but Vader and his two escort fighters soon caught up to them. Antilles was forced to withdraw after his starfighter suffered damage, and Darklighter was eventually shot down as well. Unable to grieve for his fallen friend, Skywalker tried to focus on his target. He was once again contacted by the spirit to Kenobi, who urged him to let the Force guide him. This prompted Skywalker to disable his starfighter's [targeting computer](/wiki/Targeting_computer "Targeting computer"), much to the confusion of the Rebel leaders continuing to monitor the battle from the surface of Yavin 4.[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1)

Just as Skywalker reached the end of the trench, it appeared as though Vader would shoot him down like he had the other pilots, but before he could, Han Solo and Chewbacca showed up in the *Millennium Falcon*, destroying Vader's two escorts and causing Vader's TIE Advanced to spiral out of control away from the trench. At Solo's urging, Skywalker took a single shot and fired two [proton torpedos](/wiki/Proton_torpedo "Proton torpedo"), using the Force to guide them to their target, which resulted in the destruction of the Death Star. For this action he, Chewbacca, and Han Solo were awarded the [Medal of Bravery](/wiki/Medal_of_Bravery "Medal of Bravery") the next morning.[[1]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-1)

 [![After destroying the Death Star, Skywalker became a fully committed soldier in the Rebellion.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/00/LukeWatchesLeiaEscape-PrincessLeia1.png/revision/latest?cb=20160707055759) [![After destroying the Death Star, Skywalker became a fully committed soldier in the Rebellion.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/00/LukeWatchesLeiaEscape-PrincessLeia1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/230?cb=20160707055759)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/00/LukeWatchesLeiaEscape-PrincessLeia1.png/revision/latest?cb=20160707055759) 

After destroying the Death Star, Skywalker became a fully committed soldier in the Rebellion.

 

Just as the [ceremony](/wiki/Royal_Award_Ceremony "Royal Award Ceremony") ended, Skywalker told Organa to allow herself some time to grieve for the loss of her family and homeworld. Afterwards, [General](/wiki/General "General") [Jan Dodonna](/wiki/Jan_Dodonna "Jan Dodonna") sent him and Antilles, the only other survivor of Red Group, in their X-wings to retrieve the wayward princess and bring her to the Great Temple. [Her](/wiki/Jan_Dodonna%27s_T-1_shuttle "Jan Dodonna's T-1 shuttle") [shuttle's](/wiki/T-1_shuttle_(Rebel_Alliance) "T-1 shuttle (Rebel Alliance)") pilot, [Evaan Verlaine](/wiki/Evaan_Verlaine "Evaan Verlaine"), however, managed to outsmart them and make the jump to [hyperspace](/wiki/Hyperspace "Hyperspace") with course to [Naboo](/wiki/Naboo "Naboo"), with R2-D2 accompanying the two women.[[52]](#cite_note-PL1-52) They would later reunite after she had successfully accomplished her [mission](/wiki/Mission_to_rescue_the_survivors_of_Alderaan "Mission to rescue the survivors of Alderaan").[[53]](#cite_note-PL5-53) Soon after, Skywalker became an [officer](/wiki/Alliance_officer "Alliance officer") in the Alliance and was given the [rank](/wiki/Military_rank "Military rank") of [Lieutenant](/wiki/Lieutenant "Lieutenant") and was regularly assigned numerous independent missions.[[54]](#cite_note-HttJ-54)

### Hero of Yavin

#### Balnab

:   "*You're the best smuggler we've got.*"  
    "*You* don't *got me! I'm not part of the Rebellion!*"
:   ―Skywalker and Solo[[55]](#cite_note-AOR_Han_Solo-55)

Despite his assistance in the fight, Solo largely divested himself from the Alliance after the Battle of Yavin. When Skywalker heard that Solo had camped out on [Balnab](/wiki/Balnab "Balnab"), he and some members of the Rebellion briefly went there to meet him. Skywalker approached Solo and Chewbacca on the *Millennium Falcon*, the latter roughing him up when he insulted the ship. Despite Solo's prodding and boasting of getting his reward money, Skywalker insisted that he was not running away from Rebel life and had just come to see him. He asked Solo for a favor to deliver a few crates to the Rebellion's surveillance outpost on [Calumdarian](/wiki/Calumdarian "Calumdarian"). Solo insisted that he was not a part of the Rebellion and did not want to do it, saying he had already done a mission for Organa and saved Skywalker's life at Yavin. Skywalker insisted that it was serious and that lives were at stake as Rebel pilots started to bring the crates aboard the ship. Skywalker pointed out that Solo was the best smugger they had. While Solo tried to insist that they did not have him because he was not a part of the Rebellion, Skywalker thanked the pilots for bringing the crates on board as he left. Solo ended up successfully completing the mission.[[55]](#cite_note-AOR_Han_Solo-55)

#### Rion

:   "*Seriously, Princess. You have* nothing *to worry about. This is* Han Solo *you're talking to."  
     "To be honest, I think that's* why *she's worried.*"
:   ―Han Solo and Luke Skywalker, while talking to Leia Organa[[56]](#cite_note-Swoop_Racers-56)

Soon after the Battle of Yavin, in 0 ABY,[[57]](#cite_note-SW:ADV21_Date-57) Skywalker, Solo, and Chewbacca were sent on a [mission](/wiki/Mission_to_Rion "Mission to Rion") by Princess Organa to negotiate supplies from the planet [Rion](/wiki/Rion "Rion"). Organa put Skywalker in charge, which surprised and peeved Solo.
Once arrived on the planet, Solo noticed that a big price could have been won by winning a swoop race. Skywalker, however, thought that it was better to fulfill the mission without being distracted and risking to loose money.[[56]](#cite_note-Swoop_Racers-56)

 [![Solo takes part to the race](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/00/RionSwoopRacing.png/revision/latest?cb=20210420115517) [![Solo takes part to the race](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/00/RionSwoopRacing.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/210?cb=20210420115517)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/00/RionSwoopRacing.png/revision/latest?cb=20210420115517) 

Solo takes part to the race

 

Solo decided to participate anyway and, unbeknownst to his friend, took some money with which they should have bought supplies and bought a [swoop](/wiki/Swoop "Swoop"). He signed up to the [race](/wiki/Rion_Swoop "Rion Swoop") and started bragging about his skills to other pilots. Two pilots, however, understood that Solo had a big bounty on his head and decided to sabotage the race and hand over the rebel soldier to the Empire.
In the meanwhile, Skywalker ended the negotiations with [Razian](/wiki/Razian "Razian"), an alien that should have provided the supplies to the Rebel Alliance, but noticed that half the credits were missing. He understood that Solo took part to the race, and went to the stadium in which Solo was racing. In the stands he heard two criminals talking about how they would knock Solo out: Skywalker and Chewbacca put the two criminals out of action, and Skywalker went to help Solo who was being targeted by his opponents who agreed to eliminate him. Solo, helped by his friend, was able to win the race, and they could eventually pay Razian for the supplies.[[56]](#cite_note-Swoop_Racers-56)

#### The *Desert Jewel*

:   "*Ever since the Battle of Yavin, I feel sometimes that people expect me to top it and wonder why I haven't yet.*"
:   ―Luke Skywalker[[54]](#cite_note-HttJ-54)

 [![Skywalker defending Drusil Bephorin on Denon.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/38/Luke_defends_Drusil.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150918002940) [![Skywalker defending Drusil Bephorin on Denon.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/38/Luke_defends_Drusil.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/215?cb=20150918002940)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/38/Luke_defends_Drusil.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150918002940) 

Skywalker defending Drusil Bephorin on Denon.

 

In an errand for Admiral [Gial Ackbar](/wiki/Gial_Ackbar "Gial Ackbar"), Skywalker was dispatched to the planet [Rodia](/wiki/Rodia "Rodia") in order to open a secret weapon supply line for the Alliance. He was accompanied by Artoo and a pilot named [Nakari Kelen](/wiki/Nakari_Kelen "Nakari Kelen"), and they flew her ship, the *[Desert Jewel](/wiki/Desert_Jewel "Desert Jewel")*. During their mission together, they [helped](/wiki/Skirmish_over_Llanic "Skirmish over Llanic") a [Kupohan](/wiki/Kupohan "Kupohan") ship—which, unknown to them at the time, carried vital intelligence on a [Givin](/wiki/Givin "Givin") cryptographer named [Drusil Bephorin](/wiki/Drusil_Bephorin "Drusil Bephorin")—near [Llanic](/wiki/Llanic "Llanic"). They then continued their journey to Rodia. Skywalker was greeted by [Laneet Chekkoo](/wiki/Laneet_Chekkoo "Laneet Chekkoo"), who guided him to [Toopil](/wiki/Toopil "Toopil"). During business with [Taneetch Soonta](/wiki/Taneetch_Soonta "Taneetch Soonta"), the [Rodian](/wiki/Rodian "Rodian") told Skywalker about the Jedi, including a story about Anakin during the Clone Wars. From her, Skywalker received [her uncle's](/wiki/Huulik "Huulik") [lightsaber](/wiki/Huulik%27s_lightsaber "Huulik's lightsaber").[[54]](#cite_note-HttJ-54)

 [![Skywalker and Nakari on Fex.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a6/Brazilian_Heir_to_the_Jedi_cover.png/revision/latest?cb=20201003175656) [![Skywalker and Nakari on Fex.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a6/Brazilian_Heir_to_the_Jedi_cover.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/195?cb=20201003175656)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a6/Brazilian_Heir_to_the_Jedi_cover.png/revision/latest?cb=20201003175656) 

Skywalker and Nakari on Fex.

 

After killing a [ghest](/wiki/Ghest "Ghest") and getting some treatment for his wounds, Skywalker focused on analyzing Huulik's lightsaber and trying to learn [telekinesis](/wiki/Telekinesis "Telekinesis"), but a planetwide alert for the *Desert Jewel* forced him to leave Rodia immediately and meet up with Ackbar and Organa on the *[Promise](/wiki/Promise "Promise")*. The two assigned him to a [mission](/wiki/Mission_on_Denon "Mission on Denon") to rescue Bephorin on [Denon](/wiki/Denon "Denon"), but the need for upgrades for the *Jewel* prompted him to go on another [mission](/wiki/Mission_to_Fex "Mission to Fex") to [Fex](/wiki/Fex "Fex") with Kelen before that. Warned by Organa not to blindly trust Kelen, Skywalker set off for [Pasher](/wiki/Pasher "Pasher") with Kelen and Artoo to receive intel from [her father](/wiki/Fayet_Kelen "Fayet Kelen") about their destination and the necessary equipment to survive its atmosphere. The two then headed towards Fex. Once they successfully retrieved the [*Harvester*](/wiki/Harvester_(XS-800) "Harvester (XS-800)") and were rewarded for it, Skywalker and Kelen traveled to Rodia to fix the *Desert Jewel*.[[54]](#cite_note-HttJ-54)

Following the ship's modifications, the two Rebels returned to the *Promise* to receive more intel on the Denon mission from Organa and Ackbar, only to depart for the planet as soon as possible, meet with their contact [Sakhet](/wiki/Sakhet "Sakhet"), and prepare Bephorin's liberation. Once in motion, their plan allowed them to escape from [Imperial Security Bureau](/wiki/Imperial_Security_Bureau "Imperial Security Bureau") [agents](/wiki/Agent "Agent"), and Denon altogether, with the Givin cryptographer onboard the *Jewel*. Despite several hiccups along the way, including an extended stop on [Kupoh](/wiki/Kupoh "Kupoh"), they reached [Omereth](/wiki/Omereth "Omereth"). There, however, the *Jewel* was intercepted by [bounty hunters](/wiki/Bounty_hunter "Bounty hunter") and a confrontation ensued between the Rebels and their pursuers. Despite the formers' victory, Kelen was killed by one of the bounty hunters—saddening Skywalker, who had come to develop feelings for her. After allowing himself some time to grieve for those he had lost during the war, Skywalker completed his mission by reuniting Bephorin with her family and meeting with [Major](/wiki/Major "Major") [Bren Derlin](/wiki/Bren_Derlin "Bren Derlin"). Afterwards, Skywalker returned Kelen's body to her father, after reflecting on the fact that he had learned how to move objects with the Force thanks to her support.[[54]](#cite_note-HttJ-54)

#### Devaron

:   "*Hyperspace scout. Historian. Farm boy. And yet here you are with a Jedi laser sword in your hand, like you mean to use it.*"
:   ―Sarco Plank[[48]](#cite_note-weapon-jedi-48)

After numerous missions alongside Antilles and earning each other's complete trust, Skywalker assisted on a [mission](/wiki/Mission_to_Giju "Mission to Giju") for Red Squadron above [Giju](/wiki/Giju "Giju"): he helped protect a transport carrying underground rebel leaders being evacuated from the planet, along with Antilles and Commander [Arhul Narra](/wiki/Arhul_Narra "Arhul Narra"). Once the package was clear, they followed the scatter protocol, and Skywalker and R2-D2 set course to [Devaron](/wiki/Devaron "Devaron") when he had a vision about future events on that same planet. He soon met with Antilles and Narra, who sent him, C-3PO and R2-D2 on a [mission](/wiki/Mission_to_recover_Imperial_communication_logs "Mission to recover Imperial communication logs") for [Chancellor](/wiki/Chancellor_(Rebel_Alliance) "Chancellor (Rebel Alliance)") [Mon Mothma](/wiki/Mon_Mothma "Mon Mothma").[[48]](#cite_note-weapon-jedi-48)

 [![Luke Skywalker training at the site of the former Jedi Temple of Eedit on Devaron.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/70/Luke_vs_Training_remotes.png/revision/latest?cb=20210613170026) [![Luke Skywalker training at the site of the former Jedi Temple of Eedit on Devaron.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/70/Luke_vs_Training_remotes.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/207?cb=20210613170026)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/70/Luke_vs_Training_remotes.png/revision/latest?cb=20210613170026) 

Luke Skywalker training at the site of the former Jedi Temple of Eedit on Devaron.

 

After refueling the ship, the trio departed for [Whiforla II](/wiki/Whiforla_II "Whiforla II") and jumped out of hyperspace in the [Tertiary Usaita system](/wiki/Tertiary_Usaita_system "Tertiary Usaita system"), but an Imperial attack forced them to return to Devaron and repair the [Y 4](/wiki/Y_4 "Y 4"), this time letting the Force guide him into the [Temple of Eedit](/wiki/Temple_of_Eedit "Temple of Eedit"). Landing in [Tikaroo](/wiki/Tikaroo "Tikaroo"), Skywalker left the ship for repairs with [Kivas](/wiki/Kivas "Kivas") and his daughter, [Farnay](/wiki/Farnay "Farnay"), using the alias "Korl Marcus," and went onto the depot where he was told the Temple was off-limits; after resting and a vision of the past, he left the depot and met with Farnay, to whom he revealed his true identity. Ultimately, [Sarco Plank](/wiki/Sarco_Plank "Sarco Plank") accepted to be his guide and brought Skywalker and the two droids close to Eedit, where Skywalker found a secret entrance to the Temple and entered alone with the droids.[[48]](#cite_note-weapon-jedi-48)

During his stay on the Temple, Skywalker heard Kenobi's voice, from whom he received further instructions. He managed to enter a secret chamber where he and the droids found three training remotes. Using what Kenobi had taught him on the *Falcon*, Skywalker gradually managed to pass the exercises after a few days, only to find himself surrounded by Imperials with orders to apprehend him and his fugitive [starfighter](/wiki/Starfighter "Starfighter"), using Farnay as a hostage. However, Plank unexpectedly appeared and helped Skywalker [fight](/wiki/Skirmish_in_the_Temple_of_Eedit "Skirmish in the Temple of Eedit") the stormtroopers with his [electrostaff](/wiki/Electrostaff "Electrostaff"), and observed that Skywalker was merely a [Padawan](/wiki/Padawan "Padawan").[[48]](#cite_note-weapon-jedi-48)

 [![Skywalker and Sarco Plank engage Imperial forces in the Temple of Eedit.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/51/Luke_and_Sarco_Plank_in_Eedit.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160824235310) [![Skywalker and Sarco Plank engage Imperial forces in the Temple of Eedit.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/51/Luke_and_Sarco_Plank_in_Eedit.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/213?cb=20160824235310)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/51/Luke_and_Sarco_Plank_in_Eedit.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160824235310) 

Skywalker and Sarco Plank engage Imperial forces in the Temple of Eedit.

 

Planning to ransack the Temple to pay his debts, Plank then challenged him to a duel, during which he used a [grenade](/wiki/Grenade "Grenade") to blind him, seeing that Skywalker would not be defeated so easily. Prepared to administer the coup de grace, Farnay interrupted him, for which Plank put [binders](/wiki/Binder "Binder") on her; however, it gave Skywalker time to stand up and slash Plank's control box, casting him and his electrostaff into a pit leading to the temple's underlevels. Skywalker then passed out and Farnay tended his wounds, to whom he swore he would become a Jedi and rebuild the [Order](/wiki/Jedi_Order "Jedi Order"), and return to Eedit one day. With the droids, they left the Temple as Imperial reinforcements arrived afterwards. Skywalker eventually kept his promise to Farnay and returned to Devaron accompanied by C-3PO and R2-D2. While there Luke also visited the Temple of Eedit once more.[[48]](#cite_note-weapon-jedi-48)

Back in Tikaroo, Skywalker reclaimed his now-repaired starfighter from Kivas, and before departing Devaron, he dropped several bombs at the base of the spire to cut off the paths into the jungle, meaning to stop the [pikhron](/wiki/Pikhron "Pikhron") hunt.[[48]](#cite_note-weapon-jedi-48)

#### Hradeek

:   "*W-What's happening to me? So much… Anger. So much rage.*"
:   ―Luke Skywalker, after killing many stormtroopers[[58]](#cite_note-SWA4-58)

 [![Luke kills several stormtroopers in anger](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/ff/LukeSlaughtersStormtroopers-2015StarWarsAnnual4.png/revision/latest?cb=20231120112241) [![Luke kills several stormtroopers in anger](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/ff/LukeSlaughtersStormtroopers-2015StarWarsAnnual4.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20231120112241)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/ff/LukeSlaughtersStormtroopers-2015StarWarsAnnual4.png/revision/latest?cb=20231120112241) 

Luke kills several stormtroopers in anger

 

Sometime after the Battle of Yavin, Skywalker, along with R2-D2, went on a mission on the planet [Hradreek](/wiki/Hradreek "Hradreek") to collect a [credit chip](/wiki/Credit_chip "Credit chip") from an individual who had been collecting a percentage for the Rebellion from a place where people gambled there. However, Skywalker felt meeting the way they did with so many Imperial agents around was a huge risk, and he suggested he should leave quickly because he and a bad feeling. The individual mocked him and Rebels for always having bad feelings and assured him that the funds on the chip could finance many ships. He offered for Skywalker to bet the money to get more, but he declined, saying he could not face Organa if he lost it. After thanking them and leaving, Skywalker walked into an area where he felt a [disturbance in the Force](/wiki/Disturbance_in_the_Force "Disturbance in the Force"). Despite, R2's warnings, he entered in a room in which many dead corpses lay, noticing that in the middle of it there was a very old [crossguard lightsaber](/wiki/Crossguard_lightsaber "Crossguard lightsaber"). Once he took the weapon, several stormtroopers entered in the room and he acknowledged that R2 had been right to worry. Skywalker ignited the [lightsaber](/wiki/Darth_Atrius%27_lightsabers "Darth Atrius' lightsabers"), which unbeknownst to him was one of [Darth Atrius](/wiki/Darth_Atrius "Darth Atrius")'s, and slaughtered all the Imperial troopers. After killing the last one, Skywalker was surprised by the unnatural anger that he had felt and told to R2-D2 that, during the battle, it was like he was watching without being able to stop himself, but that now he was fine.[[58]](#cite_note-SWA4-58)

Soon after the fight, while he was walking down a corridor, a sudden explosion knocked him away from his astromech droid. As he stood up he tried to contact R2, but another stormtrooper squad found him and started shooting at him, so Skywalker urged R2 to get to the X-wing. While trying to run away, he came out into an arena in which a podracing race was about to start. He warned R2 he was going to do something stupid, Skywalker stole a helmet from an [Er'Kit](/wiki/Er%27Kit "Er'Kit") pilot and then stole the Er'Kit's [podracer](/wiki/Podracer "Podracer") by threatening them with the red lightsaber, though he apologized. Hoping piloting a podracer was as easy as a landspeeder, Skywalker took part in the race trying to escape from the troopers. When he found it harder than he thought, he asked R2 for a pickup. Without Skywalker's knowledge, Darth Vader watched a holoprojection of Skywalker in the race, a flight that the commentator said no one had "ever seen anything like it", Vader calling it "most impressive." Vader watched as one of the engines blew up and left Skywalker stuck traveling on foot. He ignited the red-bladed lightsaber he had found, but was able to control his anger and, to avoid it to overwhelm him again, destroyed it with his blue-bladed lightsaber. He was then rescued by an X-Wing piloted by R2-D2, where Vader had walked outside and watched the fighter leave.[[58]](#cite_note-SWA4-58)

#### Searching for a base

##### Bogano

:   "*You fought well, rebel scum. But the Empire always wins.*"
:   ―A stormtrooper, moments before defeat[[59]](#cite_note-Bog_2-59)

 [![Skywalker on the grassy planet of Bogano.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/6c/MissionToBoganoGCW.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20210905013126) [![Skywalker on the grassy planet of Bogano.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/6c/MissionToBoganoGCW.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/210?cb=20210905013126)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/6c/MissionToBoganoGCW.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20210905013126) 

Skywalker on the grassy planet of Bogano.

 

At some point, Luke was given a mission to analyze different worlds in search of which could host a rebel base. However, as he did so, Skywalker felt the Force drawing him to [Bogano](/wiki/Bogano "Bogano"), a grassy planet in the [Outer Rim Territories](/wiki/Outer_Rim_Territories "Outer Rim Territories"). As Skywalker meditated on the planet, he began to hear the voice of her friend and companion rebel Leia Organa. Luke thought the Force allowed the two to communicate across the galaxy, but Leia was behind him. Leia asked what Luke was doing there since Bogano was one of the worlds she had to check out, and Luke told the Force had taken him there. The two were taken to the [Bogano Vault](/wiki/Bogano_Vault "Bogano Vault") by a small animal. Skywalker sensed the Force was strong in the place, and while Leia thought the world might be a good base, Luke disagreed. Skywalker was apparently right, as the small animal led them to a group of stormtroopers who were dealing with animals of the same species, making it clear that the Empire knew the world.[[60]](#cite_note-Bog_1-60) Along with Leia, Luke defeated the stormtroopers, who intended to sell the animals on the black market, and then left the planet to continue his mission to verify the planets assigned to him.[[59]](#cite_note-Bog_2-59)

##### Lotho Minor

:   "*I'm not sure there's much to give up on, Leia. Unless we want to make a base out of scrap metal.*"
:   ―Luke Skywalker to Han Solo[[61]](#cite_note-The_Planet_of_Misfit_Droids-61)

 [![Akar Duel and his droids confront Skywalker and the rebels.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ea/Lotho_Minor_rebels.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190128044911) [![Akar Duel and his droids confront Skywalker and the rebels.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ea/Lotho_Minor_rebels.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/220?cb=20190128044911)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ea/Lotho_Minor_rebels.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190128044911) 

Akar Duel and his droids confront Skywalker and the rebels.

 

At some point Luke, Leia, Han, Chewbacca, and C-3PO, were sent by the Alliance to investigate the planet [Lotho Minor](/wiki/Lotho_Minor "Lotho Minor") for a new base, traveling on the *Millennium Falcon*. Skywalker did not think there was anything worthwhile on the planet and that it would not lend well to a base, but Solo warned him to keep a look out on the planet. Hearing strange noises, Skywalker activated his lightsaber and warned the others. They were then approached by native droids and a [Duros](/wiki/Duros "Duros") named [Akar Duel](/wiki/Akar_Duel "Akar Duel").[[61]](#cite_note-The_Planet_of_Misfit_Droids-61)

After Duel announced his plans to take the *Falcon* for himself with the help of the droids [Teetee](/wiki/Teetee "Teetee"), [Doc](/wiki/Doc "Doc") and others, C-3PO ran from the ship calling Skywalker's name and informing him that his initial scans had been incorrect and that there was life on Lotho Minor. After seeing that thee protocol droid was acting without asking for permission or wearing a restraining bolt, the droids of the planet turned on duel, allowing Skywalker and his friends to escape on the *Falcon*, and leaving them believing that the planet was not a good location for a new rebel base.[[61]](#cite_note-The_Planet_of_Misfit_Droids-61)

##### Kudo

:   "*That was good thinking, sending the droids out with a cover story.*"
:   ―Skywalker, to Solo[[62]](#cite_note-Gift_of_Light-62)

Around this the rebellion eventually temporarily settled on the planet [Kudo](/wiki/Kudo "Kudo").
