During the holiday [Life Day](/wiki/Life_Day "Life Day"), Skywalker helped with a mission to stop the ISB from discovering them. After C-3PO and R2-D2 brought the [ISB agent](/wiki/Unidentified_Imperial_Security_Bureau_agent_(Kudo) "Unidentified Imperial Security Bureau agent (Kudo)") into a dark room, Skywalker held a blaster to him and Chewbacca knocked him down. Afterward, Skywalker commended Solo for coming up with the plan to use the droids as a trap, but Solo gave the credit to Chewbacca. Skywalker then watched a light display created by a [Life Day Orb](/wiki/Life_Day_Orb "Life Day Orb") and the Rebellion planned to leave the planet.[[62]](#cite_note-Gift_of_Light-62)

#### Cymoon 1

:   "*You, boy, are* no *Jedi. Who are you?*"  
    "*You killed my father!*"  
    "*I've killed very many fathers. You'll have to be more specific.*"
:   ―Darth Vader and Luke Skywalker during a brief duel in Cymoon 1[[63]](#cite_note-SW2-63)

Alongside Organa, Solo, Chewbacca, R2-D2, and C-3PO, Skywalker took part of a [mission](/wiki/Assault_on_Cymoon "Assault on Cymoon") to infiltrate [Cymoon 1](/wiki/Cymoon_1 "Cymoon 1"). To do so, the rebel team hijacked the ship of an emissary sent by Jabba the Hutt to negotiate a weapons deal at [Weapons Factory Alpha](/wiki/Weapons_Factory_Alpha "Weapons Factory Alpha"), with Solo as its replacement and Organa and Skywalker disguised as his bodyguards.[[14]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_1-14)

 [![Luke Skywalker frees a group of captive Imperial slaves held on the grounds of Weapons Factory Alpha on Cymoon 1.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/1/1b/LukeFreesCaptives-2015StarWars1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150311040812) [![Luke Skywalker frees a group of captive Imperial slaves held on the grounds of Weapons Factory Alpha on Cymoon 1.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/1/1b/LukeFreesCaptives-2015StarWars1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/234?cb=20150311040812)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/1/1b/LukeFreesCaptives-2015StarWars1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150311040812) 

Luke Skywalker frees a group of captive Imperial slaves held on the grounds of Weapons Factory Alpha on Cymoon 1.

 

Once inside the facility, they revealed themselves as rebels to [Overseer](/wiki/Overseer "Overseer") [Aggadeen](/wiki/Aggadeen "Aggadeen"), took their escorts down and made their way to the central power station. While Organa, Solo, and R2-D2 rigged the place to destroy it, Skywalker watched for additional Imperial troops, using what little he knew of the Force to reach out and sense any nearby presence. However, he was drawn to caged [slaves](/wiki/Slavery "Slavery"), whom he proceeded to free, and guided them to a rendezvous with Solo and Organa, when they were alerted of Vader's arrival by Chewbacca.[[14]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_1-14)

Determined to fight Vader for killing his father and Kenobi, he heard his mentor's voice speak to him from beyond, telling him to run, just as he faced the [Dark Lord](/wiki/Dark_Lord_of_the_Sith "Dark Lord of the Sith").[[14]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_1-14) However, he was no match for Vader, who quickly seized Skywalker's lightsaber and was about to kill him, until he realized that Skywalker's lightsaber had been once his own. Solo then intervened with an [AT-AT](/wiki/All_Terrain_Armored_Transport "All Terrain Armored Transport"), crashing the [walker](/wiki/Walker "Walker") through the factory's walls, giving Skywalker and the slaves an opening to escape from the facility.[[63]](#cite_note-SW2-63)

 [![Luke Skywalker is dispatched by Darth Vader following a brief confrontation on Cymoon 1.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/52/VaderBestsLuke-2015StarWars2.png/revision/latest?cb=20160430044241) [![Luke Skywalker is dispatched by Darth Vader following a brief confrontation on Cymoon 1.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/52/VaderBestsLuke-2015StarWars2.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/232?cb=20160430044241)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/52/VaderBestsLuke-2015StarWars2.png/revision/latest?cb=20160430044241) 

Luke Skywalker is dispatched by Darth Vader following a brief confrontation on Cymoon 1.

 

Seeing so many of the freed slaves die by Imperial fire, Skywalker regretted his decision, but continued fighting after stealing a [speeder bike](/wiki/Speeder_bike "Speeder bike"). After the Rebels' walker opened fire against Vader,[[63]](#cite_note-SW2-63) Skywalker picked his lightsaber up from the rubble, rushed to assist his team—whose walker had fallen down due to Vader—, and provided some cover fire. Determined to destroy the factory, Skywalker disobeyed Organa's orders and used his stolen speeder bike to destroy the power core despite Vader's threat. Afterwards, he managed to board the *Millennium Falcon*, reunite with his team and escape Cymoon 1, yet with his morale at rock bottom.[[64]](#cite_note-SW3-64)

#### Return to Tatooine

:   "*"There's nothing here for me now." That's what I said when I left this place. Let's hope I was* wrong*.*"
:   ―Luke Skywalker[[40]](#cite_note-SW5-40)

Once they returned to the [Alliance Fleet](/wiki/Rebel_Alliance_Navy "Rebel Alliance Navy"), Skywalker continued working on his lightsaber techniques until Organa came to see him. Skywalker told her that he lacked interest in undertaking any more missions, as he did not consider himself a Jedi but a danger, and that until he could figure out who he was, he could not be around the Alliance; he asked Organa to let him go. Much to her and Solo's dismay, Skywalker (along with R2-D2) took off in an X-wing and set off on a course for Tatooine. Hoping to find some guidance in Kenobi's hut, Skywalker and R2 made their way across the [desert](/wiki/Desert "Desert") to the abandoned residence, where they found it being pillaged by Tusken raiders, who fled in fear upon seeing his activated lightsaber.[[65]](#cite_note-SW4-65)

 [![Skywalker duels Boba Fett after being ambushed in Obi-Wan Kenobi's former home on Tatooine.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/37/ValiantDeed-CM.png/revision/latest?cb=20210325043622) [![Skywalker duels Boba Fett after being ambushed in Obi-Wan Kenobi's former home on Tatooine.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/37/ValiantDeed-CM.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20210325043622)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/37/ValiantDeed-CM.png/revision/latest?cb=20210325043622) 

Skywalker duels Boba Fett after being ambushed in Obi-Wan Kenobi's former home on Tatooine.

 

Inside the hut, Skywalker had R2 scan the ransacked place for anything of value, and the small android came across a box addressed to Skywalker. However, before they could find out its contents, one of [Boba Fett](/wiki/Boba_Fett "Boba Fett")'s [flash grenades](/wiki/Flash_grenade "Flash grenade") incapacitated R2-D2 and blinded Skywalker.[[40]](#cite_note-SW5-40) Fett proceeded to aim a [rifle](/wiki/Blaster_rifle "Blaster rifle") to his head, but Skywalker [fought back](/wiki/Duel_in_Ben_Kenobi%27s_home "Duel in Ben Kenobi's home") with his lightsaber despite his temporary blindness. Despite his disadvantage and multiple wounds done by Fett, Skywalker managed to deflect the bounty hunter's shot at point-blank and Fett tackled him in anger.[[66]](#cite_note-SW6-66)

Close to death by his own lightsaber as he struggled against Fett, R2-D2 saved him by hurling Kenobi's box and knocking the hunter out. Still blinded and carrying the box, Skywalker had R2-D2 lead him to his X-Wing.[[66]](#cite_note-SW6-66) On his way to an unknown location, he read some of Kenobi's passages on his [journals](/wiki/The_Journals_of_Ben_Kenobi "The Journals of Ben Kenobi"), including one set during the Great Drought involving him.[[31]](#cite_note-SW7-31)

#### Showdown on Nar Shaddaa

:   "*You want to finally be a Jedi Knight, kid? Here's your chance. Go die like one.*"
:   ―Kreel to Luke Skywalker[[67]](#cite_note-SW11-67)

Though Kenobi's journals contained a number of stories, Skywalker became frustrated as he continued to read them as he did not understand what lessons were to be learned about using a lightsaber or wielding the Force. Though Artoo suggested returning to the fleet, Skywalker had no intention of returning until he found the answers he was seeking. Artoo's suggestion did, however, give the young Jedi an idea: to venture into the [Jedi Temple](/wiki/Imperial_Palace "Imperial Palace") on [Coruscant](/wiki/Coruscant "Coruscant"), the former home of the Jedi Order. Before he could travel to Coruscant, however, Skywalker set a course to [Nar Shaddaa](/wiki/Nar_Shaddaa "Nar Shaddaa"), a world of pirates and outlaws known as the "Smuggler's Moon." Upon landing, Skywalker set off looking for someone who could help him get to the [Jedi Temple](/wiki/Jedi_temple "Jedi temple"). He entered a cantina, where he was immediately attacked by criminals looking to rob and kill him. Skywalker brandished his lightsaber and demanded that they cease their attack, while the bartender asked where he acquired a Jedi's lightsaber. He did not answer, instead saying that he was simply on Nar Shaddaa to conduct business and had already stated his purpose for entering the establishment. The bartender guessed that Skywalker was seeking entry into the Jedi Temple, meaning he would need to hire someone who could sneak him onto the capital world of the Empire. The bartender told him that he could do that for the boy, but the price would be the lightsaber—a price that Skywalker rejected, so the bartender resorted to his previous plan of killing and robbing the boy.[[68]](#cite_note-SW8-68)

 [![Skywalker and the thief fall towards the streets of Hutta Town, as the young Jedi reaches for his weapon.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/03/LukeAndThiefFall-2015StarWars9.png/revision/latest?cb=20151116151445) [![Skywalker and the thief fall towards the streets of Hutta Town, as the young Jedi reaches for his weapon.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/03/LukeAndThiefFall-2015StarWars9.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/241?cb=20151116151445)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/03/LukeAndThiefFall-2015StarWars9.png/revision/latest?cb=20151116151445) 

Skywalker and the thief fall towards the streets of Hutta Town, as the young Jedi reaches for his weapon.

 

Before the others could kill him, however, a [thief](/wiki/Unidentified_lightsaber_thief_(Nar_Shaddaa) "Unidentified lightsaber thief (Nar Shaddaa)") stole the lightsaber and fled the bar. Skywalker gave chase,[[68]](#cite_note-SW8-68) pursuing the [thief](/wiki/Thief "Thief") through the streets and over rooftops. The thief jumped onto a ship that was passing by and hung onto the bottom of it, and Skywalker used the Force to make the now-even longer jump towards them and grab the thief's leg. The thief lost his holding and both men fell towards the streets of [Hutta Town](/wiki/Hutta_Town "Hutta Town") below, where Skywalker retrieved his lightsaber once both he and the thief landed. The young Jedi was then confronted by [Grakkus](/wiki/Grakkus_Jahibakti_Tingi "Grakkus Jahibakti Tingi") the Hutt, a Nar Shaddaa crime lord who employed the thief that stole the lightsaber. Skywalker fought the Hutt's [MagnaGuard](/wiki/IG-100_MagnaGuard "IG-100 MagnaGuard"), while at the same time overhearing the thief telling Grakkus that Skywalker said his father was a Jedi and that he was seeking access to the Jedi Temple. Having his own plans for the boy, Grakkus knocked Skywalker out with a punch to the face.[[69]](#cite_note-SW9-69)

Skywalker later awoke to find himself in Grakkus' [palace](/wiki/Palace_of_Grakkus_the_Hutt "Palace of Grakkus the Hutt"), which contained untold numbers of relics from the Jedi Order. Grakkus held out a Jedi [holocron](/wiki/Holocron "Holocron"), though Skywalker did not know what it was. Grakkus, who explained that he was a collector of [Jedi artifacts](/wiki/Jedi_artifact "Jedi artifact") in addition to being a crime lord, told him that the item was a holocron and that only an individual who was strong with the Force could open it. Though Skywalker had no experience with holocrons, the Hutt gave him five seconds to open the holocron or be killed. Under threat of death, the boy reached out with the Force and was able to open the holocron, as well as the many others that were in the collection. They revealed themselves as containing historical records about the Jedi and the Sith, including the revelation that there was a [Jedi Temple](/wiki/Jedi_Temple_(Vrogas_Vas) "Jedi Temple (Vrogas Vas)") on [Vrogas Vas](/wiki/Vrogas_Vas "Vrogas Vas"). With Skywalker having proved himself, Grakkus believed he would make a fine addition to his collection as the last living Jedi. Grakkus planned to put Skywalker into an arena fight that he would bill as the death of the last Jedi, so the Hutt ordered him taken to the arena's gamemaster to be prepared. Artoo, knowing that Skywalker had been captured, send a distress call to the Alliance Fleet, where it was intercepted by the High Command. Though Chancellor Mothma was unwilling to send a team of Rebels on a suicide mission despite Skywalker's importance to the Rebellion, Chewbacca and Threepio—who remained with the fleet while Solo and Organa were on their own mission—volunteered to rescue their captured friend.[[69]](#cite_note-SW9-69)

 [![Grakkus the Hutt's "Gamemaster" Kreel bests Skywalker in a training duel on Nar Shaddaa.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/8c/LukeVsGamemaster-2015StarWars10.png/revision/latest?cb=20151116151857) [![Grakkus the Hutt's "Gamemaster" Kreel bests Skywalker in a training duel on Nar Shaddaa.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/8c/LukeVsGamemaster-2015StarWars10.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/233?cb=20151116151857)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/8c/LukeVsGamemaster-2015StarWars10.png/revision/latest?cb=20151116151857) 

Grakkus the Hutt's "Gamemaster" Kreel bests Skywalker in a training duel on Nar Shaddaa.

 

The gamemaster—secretly an Imperial stormtrooper named [Sergeant](/wiki/Sergeant "Sergeant") [Kreel](/wiki/Kreel "Kreel")[[70]](#cite_note-SW12-70)—introduced himself to Skywalker once the Jedi was led to the arena, and he stated that it was his job to make sure Skywalker was prepared to put on a good show before ultimately dying in the arena. Though Skywalker initially refused to fight, Kreel knew he would ultimately do so because he wanted to learn to hone his skills as a Jedi. The Kreel also told him that the Jedi Temple no longer existed, as it had been converted into the Imperial Palace—so whatever Skywalker was hoping to find was gone, as were the other Jedi temples in the galaxy. He then threw the lightsaber to Skywalker and removed the binds that the boy's hands were in. While surrounded by MagnaGuards, the Kreel used a lightsaber of his own and engaged in a duel to begin preparing him for the arena match. Though the Kreel was not a Jedi, he was a more-skilled swordsman and quickly bested Skywalker. Skywalker then engaged multiple MagnaGuards in combat.[[71]](#cite_note-SW10-71)

The big event soon arrived, and crime lords and other criminal types flocked to watch the death of the last Jedi. Skywalker spoke to Grakkus, who reminded him that no one wanted to watch him win and that everyone had paid to see him die, though the young Jedi believed he could succeed nonetheless. Grakkus also revealed that scavengers had found Skywalker's X-wing and the Journal of Ben Kenobi, which Grakkus intended to add to his collection. The event began once Grakkus left, and Skywalker entered into the arena and was introduced as the last of the Jedi. The announcer claimed that he was a veteran of battles across the galaxy and that he had fought Hutts and bounty hunters alike, hyping up the untrained Jedi hopeful. The announcer then introduced the Jedi's opponent: [Kongo](/wiki/Kongo "Kongo") the Disemboweler, a large and fearsome creature from the [dolovite](/wiki/Dolovite "Dolovite") [mines](/wiki/Mining "Mining") of [Mustafar](/wiki/Mustafar "Mustafar"). Skywalker ignited the green-bladed lightsaber that was given to him for the show and the fight began. The young Jedi slashed his blade at the creature, but the opponent's armor was resistant to a lightsaber blade and made it difficult for Skywalker to combat the creature. He remained confident, however, reminding himself that he blew up the Death Star, fought Boba Fett, and was trained by Obi-Wan Kenobi. He closed his eyes in an attempt to use the Force as his ally, but Kongo used the opportunity to throw Skywalker across the arena and knocking him onto the ground.[[67]](#cite_note-SW11-67)

 [![Skywalker battles Imperial soldiers in Grakkus' arena.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a4/LukeFightsInGrakkusArena-2015StarWars12.png/revision/latest?cb=20151118212314) [![Skywalker battles Imperial soldiers in Grakkus' arena.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a4/LukeFightsInGrakkusArena-2015StarWars12.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/257?cb=20151118212314)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a4/LukeFightsInGrakkusArena-2015StarWars12.png/revision/latest?cb=20151118212314) 

Skywalker battles Imperial soldiers in Grakkus' arena.

 

The beast grabbed Skywalker as the audience cheered for Kongo to make the kill, and Skywalker tried calling out to Kenobi to ask for miracle. Just as he did so, the beast's [shock collar](/wiki/Shock_collar "Shock collar") was activated by Kreel, who revealed himself to Grakkus as an Imperial and announced he was taking Skywalker into custody. Stormtroopers [poured](/wiki/Rescue_of_Luke_Skywalker "Rescue of Luke Skywalker") into the arena and surrounded Skywalker, arresting both him and the Hutt. Grakkus had one trick up his sleeve, though, and triggered an electromagnetic pulse that disabled the Imperials' blasters. Grakkus, skilled at combat in his own right, began fighting the weaponless stormtroopers, while other troops grabbed Skywalker. Just then, the young Jedi saw that Artoo, who had infiltrated the palace, recovered his lightsaber and threw it into the arena, so Skywalker grabbed it and cut the soldiers down. Kongo chased the spectators out of the arena, and Skywalker while Kreel confronted Skywalker, knocking him to the ground and revealing his true identity as a stormtrooper of the [501st Legion](/wiki/501st_Legion "501st Legion") tasked with arresting him. Skywalker was saved by the timely arrival of Grakkus, who Kreel attacked as Skywalker got away.[[70]](#cite_note-SW12-70)

Skywalker regrouped with Solo, Organa, Chewbacca, and the droids, all of whom ultimately traveled to Nar Shaddaa to rescue their captive friend. Solo, Organa, and Chewbacca each wielded lightsabers that Artoo stole from the palace so they were not defenseless in the wake of the EMP blast, leading Skywalker to quip that Solo looked good with a lightsaber. Artoo recovered Kenobi's journal and Skywalker wanted to go back to the palace to recover more artifacts, but the arena was flooded with blaster-wielding stormtroopers so Chewbacca grabbed the resistant Skywalker and brought him out of the arena. The Rebels returned to the *Millennium Falcon* and escaped from Nar Shaddaa.[[70]](#cite_note-SW12-70)

#### Vrogas Vas

:   "*…right now I'm just a Rebel pilot who needs to help his friends. Learning to be a Jedi will have to wait.*"
:   ―Skywalker, to R2-D2[[72]](#cite_note-Vader_Down_1-72)

Though he was unable to acquire the relics in Grakkus' palace, the holocrons he activated gave Skywalker one important piece of information: the existence of a Jedi Temple on Vrogas Vas. Skywalker returned to the Alliance but still sought answers, so he traveled to Vrogas Vas and was stationed in orbit with Red Squadron, along with [Blue Squadron](/wiki/Blue_Squadron_(Rebel_Alliance) "Blue Squadron (Rebel Alliance)") and [Yellow Squadron](/wiki/Yellow_Squadron_(Rebel_Alliance) "Yellow Squadron (Rebel Alliance)"). While in orbit and preparing for training exercises, Darth Vader[[72]](#cite_note-Vader_Down_1-72)—who had learned of Skywalker's location from one of his associates, a rogue [archaeologist](/wiki/Archaeologist "Archaeologist") named [Aphra](/wiki/Chelli_Lona_Aphra "Chelli Lona Aphra")[[73]](#cite_note-Vader_12-73)—dropped out of hyperspace in his TIE Advanced x1 starfighter. Vader made quick work of Blue Squadron and Yellow Squadron, destroying them both as Red Squadron looked on. Skywalker sensed that Vader was the pilot of the enemy starfighter, made a run towards him, and crashed his X-wing fighter into the Sith Lord's TIE Advanced. The collision damaged both vessels and send them hurtling towards the surface of Vrogas Vas.[[72]](#cite_note-Vader_Down_1-72)

 [![Skywalker senses the presences of Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker in the temple ruins.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/88/LukeSensesObiWanAnakin-2015DarthVader13.png/revision/latest?cb=20151125183049) [![Skywalker senses the presences of Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker in the temple ruins.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/88/LukeSensesObiWanAnakin-2015DarthVader13.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/283?cb=20151125183049)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/88/LukeSensesObiWanAnakin-2015DarthVader13.png/revision/latest?cb=20151125183049) 

Skywalker senses the presences of Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker in the temple ruins.

 

Skywalker and Vader both survived the crashes of their starfighters, though they impacted on the surface in different places. The young Jedi crashed outside of the ruins of the Jedi Temple, from which he witnessed the destruction of [Gray Squadron](/wiki/Gray_Squadron_(Rebel_Alliance) "Gray Squadron (Rebel Alliance)") forces sent to attack Vader—part of a major Rebel operation to capture the lone Sith Lord. He put off his search for answers and began to make his way towards the Rebel forces, determined to help his friends.[[72]](#cite_note-Vader_Down_1-72) As he passed through the ruins of the Jedi Temple, he could see [yet another](/wiki/Cyan_Three "Cyan Three") Rebel pilot being killed by the Dark Lord. Unknown to Skywalker was that, at the same time, he was being tracked by Vader's companions—Aphra and the [assassin droids](/wiki/Assassin_droid "Assassin droid") [BT-1](/wiki/BT-1 "BT-1") and [0-0-0](/wiki/0-0-0 "0-0-0"). While the Sith Lord's followers prepared a plan to capture the boy, Skywalker found writings in the ruins that were written with a lightsaber, letting him deduce that the ruins were from the Jedi. A cold feeling passed over him and he could sense the presence of what he thought was Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker. He tried to concentrate, but he was interrupted by what he thought was Threepio's arrival. In reality, it was Triple-Zero, painted in gold by Aphra, who placed his metal hand on Skywalker and sent an electrical charge through the boy's body, knocking him unconscious.[[74]](#cite_note-Vader_13-74)

Aphra and Triple-Zero prepared to take Skywalker hostage when Artoo stepped in to help. Bee Tee then brought his arsenal to bear on the rebel's astromech and chased him off. Aphra and Triple-Zero then seized Skywalker but were stopped by the smuggler Han Solo, who had a sniper rifle aimed at them. Chewbacca then came in and attacked the protocol droid, ripping his arm off. Skywalker then regained consciousness, dispatched Bee Tee, and sliced off Triple-Zero's other arm with his lightsaber. Skywalker and his allies then retreated when Bee Tee fired his weapons blindly.[[75]](#cite_note-SW13-75)

Skywalker, Solo, Chewbacca, and Artoo made their way back to the Millennium Falcon. They then lifted off in order to aid princess Leia. They were forced to the ground when their ship was crashed into by the Wookiee bounty hunter Black Krrsantan. While Solo and Chewbacca dealt with the mercenary, Skywalker left to head back to the Jedi ruins.[[76]](#cite_note-DV14-76)

Luke arrived back at the the Jedi temple looking for Leia. It was then that he heard the voice of Obi-Wan Kenobi, who told him that he should not have come to this place and that he was not ready for what is coming. Luke was then intercepted by a company of stormtroopers who opened fire on him. He retreated behind cover but was hit in the head and knocked unconscious.[[77]](#cite_note-SW14-77)

Luke was taken prisoner by the forces of Commander [Karbin](/wiki/Karbin "Karbin"). However Darth Vader, who had a rivalry with Karbin, used the force to crash the shuttle Skywalker was kept in. Now free, he then caught up with Solo, Chewbacca, C-3PO, and R2-D2. They made their way back to the Millennium Falcon, however Dr. Aphra had laid out a minefield to stop them. When she was distracted she was knocked out from behind by Princess Leia. Believing her to be of use, Organa decided to take the archaeologist with them. As they departed Vrogas Vas, Skywalker felt remorse that he would not be able to go back to the temple and see what was hidden there.[[78]](#cite_note-DV15-78)

#### Learning the ways of the smuggler

:   "*How else are we gonna replace the money we just lost?*"  
    "*Heh, don't worry, kid. I know just the thing. It's a big galaxy. And believe me, there's always something somewhere in need of smuggling.*"
:   ―Skywalker and Solo[[79]](#cite_note-SW16-79)

 [![Skywalker and Solo deliver nerfs on Ibaar.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/55/SkywalkerSoloAndNerfs-2015StarWars18.png/revision/latest?cb=20170406023821) [![Skywalker and Solo deliver nerfs on Ibaar.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/55/SkywalkerSoloAndNerfs-2015StarWars18.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170406023821)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/55/SkywalkerSoloAndNerfs-2015StarWars18.png/revision/latest?cb=20170406023821) 

Skywalker and Solo deliver nerfs on Ibaar.

 

Upon returning to the Rebel fleet with their new prisoner, Doctor Aphra, Skywalker and his friends went their separate ways; Organa, Artoo, and Threepio went to detain Aphra at an Alliance-controlled space station, [Sunspot Prison](/wiki/Sunspot_Prison "Sunspot Prison"), with the assistance of [Sana Starros](/wiki/Sana_Starros "Sana Starros"), whom Organa hired to transport them to the prison. Meanwhile, Solo and Skywalker were dispatched to buy supplies for the rebellion. Solo attempted to double the money he was given for supplies by betting on [sabacc](/wiki/Sabacc "Sabacc"). However, he was caught cheating, and had to escape with Skywalker on the *Millennium Falcon*.[[79]](#cite_note-SW16-79)

Skywalker and Solo traveled to Nar Shaddaa where Luke was tasked with finding a customer in need of a ship. He made a deal to haul [nerfs](/wiki/Nerf "Nerf") to [Ibaar](/wiki/Ibaar "Ibaar") for 5,000 credits, which was just enough to replace the credits lost by Solo. Skywalker and Solo were soon intercepted by TIE fighters who suspected the Falcon of smuggling illegal livestock.[[80]](#cite_note-SW17-80) Luke was able to shoot the fighters and he and Solo made it to Ibaar with the nerfs. While on Ibaar, Skywalker blackmailed Solo into allowing him to fly the Falcon for a few parsecs by threatening to tell Leia about losing the credits in a Sabacc game.[[81]](#cite_note-SW18-81)

After buying the supplies, Skywalker and Solo received a distress call from Sana and arrived at Sunspot Prison. They were immediately knocked out and taken captive by the [masked assailant](/wiki/Eneb_Ray "Eneb Ray") who was attacking the prison. Neither came to until after the battle had already ended and the attacker had been captured.[[82]](#cite_note-SW19-82)

#### Temporary outpost

:   "*I just go word that the cargo vessel just arrived. Looks like the mission was canceled. Hope you didn't go through too much trouble.*"
:   ―Luke Skywalker to R2-D2[[83]](#cite_note-Droid_Dilemma-83)

Sometime after the assault on Sunspot Prison, the Alliance established a temporary [outpost](/wiki/LX-Robynsun_V "LX-Robynsun V") on the Outer Rim planet [Reamma](/wiki/Reamma "Reamma"). Organa gave Luke a mission to find a missing Alliance cargo vessel. Skywalker and R2-D2 prepared to make the flight to look for them. Before they could do that, however, Organa informed Skywalker that the vessel reported in, cancelling the mission.[[83]](#cite_note-Droid_Dilemma-83)

#### Hijacking the *Harbinger*

:   "*Chances are...This is the last voyage of the* Harbinger*. So let's make it a memorable one.*"
:   ―Skywalker to Organa and Solo[[84]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2015)_22-84)

Sometime later, Skywalker and Organa rendezvoused with rebel leadership. Admiral Ackbar, General Dodonna, and Mon Mothma presented them with the task of providing aid to the people of [Tureen VII](/wiki/Tureen_VII "Tureen VII"), a planet that had provided aid to the rebellion in the past. A heavily blockaded planet with Imperial bases on both of its moons and swarms of TIE fighters in orbit, the Alliance could not risk sending the fleet. Luke and Leia proposed stealing an Imperial Star Destroyer and using it to infiltrate the blockade. Despite some reluctance from Dodonna, Ackbar and Mothma realized that it was the only choice left.[[85]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_23-85)

#### Skorii-Lei Rescue

Afer the hijacking of the [*Harbinger*](/wiki/Harbinger_(Imperial_I-class) "Harbinger (Imperial I-class)"), Leia ended up grievously injured on the planet [Skorii-Lei](/wiki/Skorii-Lei "Skorii-Lei"). Cared for by former engineer [Pash Davane](/wiki/Pash_Davane "Pash Davane") and carrying vital Alliance information, Organa was pursued by stormtroopers and barely managed to escape aboard the *Millennium Falcon* with Skywalker, Solo, and Chewbacca. Aboard the *Falcon*, Davane provided Skywalker with Leia's data tape, which he noted was a sign of great trust between the two of them. With her place as a friend of the Alliance confirmed, Skywalker and his allies returned Davane to her home on Skorii-Lei.[[86]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_Annual_2-86)

#### Journey to Vagadarr system

:   "*You remind me of him. But more than that... you remind me of me. You... you're nothing but a frightened child, just like I was. Do you know the only thing I was good at... when I was a child? Walking away.*"
:   ―Garro to Skywalker[[87]](#cite_note-SW30-87)

 [![Skywalker worked with Garro to revive a giant of living stone.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/07/OldManGarro-2015StarWars30.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170719223306) [![Skywalker worked with Garro to revive a giant of living stone.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/07/OldManGarro-2015StarWars30.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170719223306)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/07/OldManGarro-2015StarWars30.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170719223306) 

Skywalker worked with Garro to revive a giant of living stone.

 

Despite the escape from the *Harbinger*, the heroes quickly realized that C-3PO was captured during the commotion, and Skywalker was unable to stop R2-D2 from commandeering an [X-Wing](/wiki/X-wing_starfighter "X-wing starfighter") to rescue the [protocol droid](/wiki/Protocol_droid "Protocol droid") on his own. With his own X-wing's [hyperdrive](/wiki/Hyperdrive "Hyperdrive") temporarily disabled, he resumed reading Ben Kenobi's journal. Identifying a symbol in the journal as a [star map](/wiki/Star_map "Star map"), Skywalker decided to visit the [Vagadarr system](/wiki/Vagadarr_system "Vagadarr system") after reading of a Jedi Master who had ventured there in the past and encountered enormous [giants](/wiki/Giants_of_living_stone "Giants of living stone") made of living stone that gave those in close proximity a power known as [Stonepower](/wiki/Stonepower "Stonepower"). Skywalker hoped that going there would give him the knowledge he needed to save R2-D2 and C-3PO.[[88]](#cite_note-SW28-88)

Like the Jedi Master before him, Skywalker was able to navigate through the [planet](/wiki/Vagadarr_Prime "Vagadarr Prime")'s heavy debris field and land on the surface, where he encountered [Garro](/wiki/Garro "Garro"), the last remaining native human, who initially wanted to use Skywalker's life force to kill the few remaining giant children. Determined to protect them, Skywalker inspired Garro to change his mind and sacrifice his own life force to revive a dead giant. Skywalker and the giant children then ventured into the giant's cave to find the heart of the mountain and finish what Garro started in reviving the giant, thus completing the mission of the Master from years past and taking another step in his journey to becoming a [Jedi](/wiki/Jedi "Jedi").[[87]](#cite_note-SW30-87)

#### Horox III

:   "*So, come, shake hands, have dinner with the nice lady, and we walk away with an actual sentient Ancient Jedi. You get your teacher, I get an eyewitness to the Ancient past."   
    "I'm not sure.."   
     "C'mon, are you out, farm boy? Or are you in, Jedi Knight?*"
:   ―Aphra and Luke Skywalker on the visit to Ktath'atn[[89]](#cite_note-The_Screaming_Citadel_1-89)

 [![The bar on Horox III](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/fc/HoroxIIIBar-TheScreamingCitadel1.png/revision/latest?cb=20230327155020) [![The bar on Horox III](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/fc/HoroxIIIBar-TheScreamingCitadel1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20230327155020)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/fc/HoroxIIIBar-TheScreamingCitadel1.png/revision/latest?cb=20230327155020) 

The bar on Horox III

 

Sometime later, as the Alliance was setting up a [temporary outpost](/wiki/Horox_III_rebel_outpost "Horox III rebel outpost") on [Horox III](/wiki/Horox_III "Horox III"), Skywalker went to a local [bar](/wiki/Unidentified_bar_(Horox_III) "Unidentified bar (Horox III)"). Threatened by its denizens for being a human, he was forced to defend himself against them despite his warnings that he would be able to defeat them in a fight. The fight was compounded when Doctor Aphra, who had lied to Sana Starros in order to find Skywalker, arrived and sparked the anger of the entire bar after saying Skywalker was with her, forcing Skywalker, Aphra, and Black Krrsantan to fight the entire bar. After the fight, Skywalker told Aphra he did not want her following him because he did not want to have anything to do with someone who worked for Vader, but she caught his attention by saying she knew where to find a Jedi Master.[[89]](#cite_note-The_Screaming_Citadel_1-89)

Skywalker first refused to admit he was trying to be a Jedi, Aphra explaining that she had figured it out from Vader's vendetta and Skywalker's one-in-a-million shot to destroy the Death Star plus his general talent. She introduced him to the [Rur crystal](/wiki/Rur_Crystal "Rur Crystal") of the ancient Jedi splinter group known as the [Ordu Aspectu](/wiki/Ordu_Aspectu "Ordu Aspectu") with an ancient Jedi personality inside of it. By playing off Skywalker's hopes to be better with the Force and a true Jedi Knight, Aphra convinced an initially hesitant Luke to [visit](/wiki/Mission_to_Ktath%27atn "Mission to Ktath'atn") the [Screaming Citadel](/wiki/Citadel_of_Ktath%27atn "Citadel of Ktath'atn") with her, explaining that that introducing him to the [Queen of Ktath'atn](/wiki/Unidentified_Queen_of_Ktath%27atn "Unidentified Queen of Ktath'atn") as a Jedi would convince the Queen to reactive the crystal for them. On the way there, Skywalker reaquainted himself with 0-0-0 and BT-1, remembering the former for electrocuting him and the latter from R2 kicking him. Skywalker lamented not telling Solo, Organa, or Starros about where he was going, but he and Aphra both agreed they would have tried to stop them and they had no time to waste.[[89]](#cite_note-The_Screaming_Citadel_1-89)

 [![The temporary Rebel Outpost on Horox III.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/3f/TemporaryRebelOutpost-TheScreamingCitadel1.png/revision/latest?cb=20210518162918) [![The temporary Rebel Outpost on Horox III.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/3f/TemporaryRebelOutpost-TheScreamingCitadel1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20210518162918)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/3f/TemporaryRebelOutpost-TheScreamingCitadel1.png/revision/latest?cb=20210518162918) 

The temporary Rebel Outpost on Horox III.

 

Meanwhile, at the Rebel Outpost on Horox III, Solo then enlisted Starros' help in communicating with Skywalker's temporary [R5](/wiki/R5_series_astromech_droid "R5 series astromech droid") astromech droid [S4](/wiki/Essfour "Essfour"), who could only speak [Binary](/wiki/Binary "Binary") and thus was not easily able to communicate with Organa. Organa asked the droid for Skywalker's whereabouts but the droid responded that he could not tell. Questioning the droid, Starros learned that Skywalker did not go by himself but that he went with Doctor Aphra. An unhappy Leia and Solo wondered why Skywalker would go with Aphra, Organa suggesting she kidnapped Skywalker while Solo and Starros suspect she could have reprogrammed the droid to keep a secret.[[89]](#cite_note-The_Screaming_Citadel_1-89)

#### The Screaming Citadel

##### The Queeen of Ktath'atn

:   "*I know every sort of creature you can image, Doctor. And many I'm sure you cannot. They have all been paraded through the halls of this citadel. All by people desperate to gain my favor. But never once has anyone brought me a Jedi*"
:   ―The Queen of Ktath'atn to Skywalker and Aphra[[90]](#cite_note-SW_31-90)

 [![Skywalker journeyed to the Screaming Citadel with the hope of learning more about the Jedi.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/56/CitadelOfKthathatn-TheScreamingCitadel1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20171203150223) [![Skywalker journeyed to the Screaming Citadel with the hope of learning more about the Jedi.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/56/CitadelOfKthathatn-TheScreamingCitadel1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20171203150223)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/56/CitadelOfKthathatn-TheScreamingCitadel1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20171203150223) 

Skywalker journeyed to the Screaming Citadel with the hope of learning more about the Jedi.

 

After arriving on Ktath'atn, Skywalker and the others encountered a mob of villagers. Skywalker wants to help feed them and Aphra just calls him adorable and has Krrsantan scare them off. After making the trek to the the entire party, except for Krrsantan were allowed into the citadel. Skywalker was curious how Aphra met Krrsantan but she just said it was a long story and that she owed him a lot of money. Skywalker then asked how Aphra had found him. Noticing he was struggling, Aphra helped Skywalker put his [Spavat](/wiki/Spavat "Spavat") on to meet the Queen, and after finished he insisted that he was more than just a farm boy. While walking toward the main hall, 0-0-0 teased Skywalker for stuttering when Aphra commented on her attractiveness but she told the droid only she was allowed to tease him.[[89]](#cite_note-The_Screaming_Citadel_1-89)

In the ballroom, Skywalker was mesmerized by the crowd. Aphra told Skywalker to follow her lead and advised him to hide his lightsaber, but implies he is used to keeping his Jedi identity, which he hopes to solidify, a secret. When Skywalker asked about the Jedi in the crystal, Aphra said she only met him briefly but that he had strong opinions. After encountering an [Ezaraan](/wiki/Ezaraa "Ezaraa") guest, Skywalker was initially excited by them wanting to take down the Empire, but after they explained they wanted to replace it with a [Dominion of the Ezaraa](/wiki/Dominion_of_the_Ezaraa "Dominion of the Ezaraa") where they would consume the flesh of all "lesser species," Skywalker expressed that he thought the guests were crazy. The two soon saw the [Queen of Ktath'atn](/wiki/Unidentified_Queen_of_Ktath%27atn "Unidentified Queen of Ktath'atn"), and after being welcomed by one of her servants, [Varroa](/wiki/Varroa "Varroa"), Aphra presented Skywalker, describing him as a very interesting Tatooine farm boy, but was rejected. When the Ezaraan mocked Skywalker, Aphra defended him, but the Ezaraan grabbed her arm. Skywalker warned the Ezaraan to leave Aphra alone and used the Force to throw the Ezaraan to the ground, intriguing the Queen and earning a compliment from Aphra. Varroa ordered all the guests to leave but allowed Skywalker and his companion to stay so that the Queen could hear his request in the morning, Aphra telling him he did great. Later, the Queen told her servant [Vespinax](/wiki/Vespinax "Vespinax") that Skywalker's power and little experience made him perfect for her intentions to eat him. She then grew her power in anticipation of eating the Jedi.[[89]](#cite_note-The_Screaming_Citadel_1-89)

The next morning, Skywalker and Aphra made their way to a dining hall to have breakfast with the Monarch. On the way, after Skywalker expressed how creepy he thought the place was, Aphra assured him that the Queen's obsession with Jedi would get her to do what they wanted, but Skwalker was worried by this because of his encounter with Grakkus the Hutt and Aphra's mention that the Queen "keeps" her oddities. Aphra told Skywalker to let her do the talking and then the two walked inside and sat at a table with the Queen, Aphra introducing the both of them. Excited to see a Jedi, but wanting more verification, the Queen commanded Skywalker to move a nearby dining tray with the Force, though he was unable to until the Queen's servant, [Vespinax](/wiki/Vespinax "Vespinax"), threatened him with a knife to his throat. However, moving the tray revealed that under it were [Abersyn symbiotes](/wiki/Abersyn_symbiote "Abersyn symbiote") that the Queen planned on implanting them with, so after Aphra set off an explosion that knocked them both down they quickly made an attempt to escape while Aphra explained to Skywalker what the symbiotes were. Before they could escape, in the Citadel's hallway, they were nearly stopped by many of the Queen's thralls.[[90]](#cite_note-SW_31-90)

##### The Abersyn hive

:   "*You're not a Jedi. You just know what a Jedi knows. That's not enough. Knowing isn't enough. Being a Jedi is about* being*. Letting go…feeling…and more than anything…the Jedi feel free.*"
:   ―Skywalker, to Eternal Rur[[9]](#cite_note-Aphra_8-9)

 [![The Queen of Ktath'atn goes after Skywalker.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/c0/AphraLukeQueen-2016DoctorAphra7.png/revision/latest?cb=20170619195346) [![The Queen of Ktath'atn goes after Skywalker.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/c0/AphraLukeQueen-2016DoctorAphra7.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/300?cb=20170619195346)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/c0/AphraLukeQueen-2016DoctorAphra7.png/revision/latest?cb=20170619195346) 

The Queen of Ktath'atn goes after Skywalker.

 

After attempting to run, Skywalker prepared to use his lightsaber to defend them, but Solo, Organa, and Starros arrived at their location on Aphra's ship, the *[Ark Angel II](/wiki/Ark_Angel_II "Ark Angel II")*, with her droids 0-0-0 and BT-1 in tow. Starros attempted to shoot Aphra, but Skywalker blocked the blast with his lightsaber, claiming that she was a good person and his friend, he willingly went with her, and he knew what he was doing, despite Organa's attempts to call his decision unwise and threats to court-martial him if he did not follow orders. Meanwhile, the Queen's servants and armed security guards pursued the group, so they escaped into an Abersyn symbiote laboratory, which Skywalker decided people needed to know about. There, Skywalker and Aphra got into an argument about the merits of the Empire in which Aphra revealed her mother was killed in the Clone Wars, claimed that regular people preferred the Empire's peace to war, and insisted that she was not like Solo as Skywalker thought. She attempted to mock him for his upbringing until Skywalker revealed everyone on his farm was killed by the Empire. Aphra led Skywalker to a nearby room and sold him out to the Queen of Ktath'atn, who promptly mesmerized him to capture him. Aphra warned the Queen not to do the same to her too or she would blow up charges she placed in Skywalker's pockets. Organa, Solo, and Starros then saw Skywalker get captured, the former calling out to him and later refusing to leave him behind.[[91]](#cite_note-Aphra_7-91)

The Queen connected Skywalker to a machine that would allow her to directly feed on him. As Aphra left with the activated Rur crystal, she asked what would happen to Skywalker, and the Queen revealed she would not infect him with a symbiote, but started to drink his life force to increase her power. Upon speaking to to the crystal outside, Rur revealed to Aphra that she felt guilt over leaving Skywalker behind and felt guilt over blaming her actions on her tragedy, when Skywalker's tragedy made him a good person. Solo attempted to rescue him, but was quickly enthralled and forced to lead the Queen's forces, as Organa and Starros' desperation to save Skywalker lead them to place a symbiote into Krrsantan despite Organa's misgivings. Skywalker eventually tore free of the machine and in the ensuing struggle managed to re-arm himself with his lightsaber. While the Queen attacked him with her powers, Aphra bombed the room and came inside, revealing that she had scaled the Citadel and was there to rescue Skywalker. She also revealed that she had realized the reason the Queen did not put a symbiote in Skywalker was because he was more powerful than her and the [Abersyn hive](/wiki/Queen_of_Ktath%27atn%27s_hive "Queen of Ktath'atn's hive") would follow him instead. Skywalker then fell under the influence of an Abersyn symbiote, becoming more powerful than even the Queen, and proclaimed himself King of the hive.[[92]](#cite_note-SW_32-92)

 [![Skywalker kills the Queen of Ktath'atn.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/38/LukeKillsQueen-2016DoctorAphra8.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180820101035) [![Skywalker kills the Queen of Ktath'atn.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/38/LukeKillsQueen-2016DoctorAphra8.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180820101035)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/38/LukeKillsQueen-2016DoctorAphra8.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180820101035) 

Skywalker kills the Queen of Ktath'atn.

 

Skywalker entered a psychic duel with the Queen to force her to submit. Aphra allowed [Eternal Rur](/wiki/Eternal_Rur "Eternal Rur") from the crystal to enter his mind to assist him. Rur advised Skywalker to use the symbiote to his advantage, claiming that tying the Force's abilities into the parasite's emotional drive would make him immensely powerful. Realizing Rur was not a true Jedi and only a person with the knowledge of one, Skywalker ignored him and instead let go and connected to the Force. He was able to free himself of the symbiote's influence and strike down the Queen, believing that being free was more important to be a Jedi than just Rur's knowledge. Solo and all those under the Queen's control were freed, Skywalker reunited with Organa, and the Citadel was destroyed by BT-1. Later, after telling Starros it was time to go, Skywalker told Aphra that he did not want the crystal because it was not a Jedi in any real way. But he said that he had learned from it that there would not be any shortcuts to be a Jedi, and that people who tried to take them to get what they wanted, like her, were deluded. Finally, Skywalker told her to stay away from them. On the way back, while complaining to herself about Skywalker 0-0-0 pointed out that Skywalker's virtuousness despite his trauma and her inability to gain his response must be a heavy reminder of the failures of her character. Skywalker spoke with Starros on the way back, learning that Aphra had ruined S4 and shocked that Starros and her could have ever been together.[[9]](#cite_note-Aphra_8-9)

#### Among the stars

:   "*You're right, Leia. This is war.* Our *war. And despite everything we've already been through, everything we've won and lost...this war...has only begun. May the Force be with Us. May the Force be with us all.*"
:   ―Luke Skywalker to his team[[93]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_37-93)

 [![Luke and Leia were stranded on an oceanic planet for three weeks.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/8d/Star_Wars_33_Textless.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170420190544) [![Luke and Leia were stranded on an oceanic planet for three weeks.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/8d/Star_Wars_33_Textless.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/210?cb=20170420190544)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/8d/Star_Wars_33_Textless.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170420190544) 

Luke and Leia were stranded on an oceanic planet for three weeks.

 

Skywalker later took part in a mission with Leia, piloting a [Taylander shuttle](/wiki/Taylander_shuttle "Taylander shuttle") with the princess. With Imperial TIE Fighters in pursuit, Skywalker was forced to fly into a [nebula](/wiki/Nebula "Nebula"), which disabled the shuttle's systems, forcing them to crash land on an [ocean planet](/wiki/Unidentified_ocean_planet "Unidentified ocean planet"). Stranded on the planet for three [weeks](/wiki/Standard_week "Standard week"), Skywalker's experience with machinery, such as [moisture vaporators](/wiki/Moisture_vaporator "Moisture vaporator") helped keep himself and Leia alive. Having to live off of the land, the two grew closer, relating to each other because of their status as orphans. They eventually realized that there was a [native species](/wiki/Unidentified_aquatic_species "Unidentified aquatic species") living in the planet's ocean. Not wanting to bring the war to these people, Skywalker and Organa set a trap for the Imperial forces that were [pursuing](/wiki/Escape_from_an_unidentified_ocean_planet "Escape from an unidentified ocean planet") them. Luke used the native's resources, as well as his own lightsaber, to fend off an AT-AT and [shoretroopers](/wiki/Coastal_defender_stormtrooper "Coastal defender stormtrooper"). Although close to being defeated, Leia used a flaming arrow to light explosive chemicals and disable the [AT-AT](/wiki/All_Terrain_Armored_Transport_(Galactic_Civil_War) "All Terrain Armored Transport (Galactic Civil War)"). Afterwards, they were able to repair the shuttle and return to the Rebel Fleet.[[94]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_33-94)

Shortly afterward, Skywalker and his team intercepted a message from R2-D2, who had successfully [rescued](/wiki/Mission_to_rescue_C-3PO "Mission to rescue C-3PO") C-3PO from Imperial capture. They saved R2's X-wing from Darth Vader and escaped in hyperspace.[[95]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_36-95)

By then, Task Force 99 had [destroyed](/wiki/Mission_to_Horox_III "Mission to Horox III") the Horox III rebel outpost. The team arrived there, discovering the devastation. Fearing further danger, they left without burying the rebel troopers, but Skywalker insisted that they honor the dead. Together they built a cremation pile before leaving.[[93]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_37-93)

#### Ashes of Jedha

:   "*I've been thinking about Jyn and the rest of Rogue One. How many things went wrong for them? And Rogue One took whatever steps they needed. People making distractions, sacrificing themselves, amping up the signal. All improvised. This chain of sacrifice... All leading to* me *taking that shot.*"
:   ―Luke Skywalker contemplating the sacrifice of Rogue One[[96]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_42-96)

Having traveled throughout the galaxy with his friends, Luke and his fellow rebels journeyed to what remained of the moon [Jedha](/wiki/Jedha "Jedha"), the site of one of the Death Star's tests. On the ashy moon, Luke and Leia defended what remained of [Saw Gerrera](/wiki/Saw_Gerrera "Saw Gerrera")'s [Partisans](/wiki/Partisans "Partisans") from invading [snowtroopers](/wiki/Cold_weather_assault_trooper "Cold weather assault trooper") and brought them aboard the *Millennium Falcon*. Moving to [NaJedha](/wiki/NaJedha "NaJedha"), the planet that Jedha orbited, Luke met [Chulco Gi](/wiki/Chulco_Gi "Chulco Gi"), an aspirant to the [Disciples of the Whills](/wiki/Disciples_of_the_Whills "Disciples of the Whills"), someone who could potentially guide him in learning about the Force. Gi led the rebels to the rest of the Partisans on Jedha and placed hoods over their heads, in keeping with Partisan tradition. Led by [Benthic](/wiki/Benthic "Benthic"), Saw Gerrera's former second-in-command, the remaining extremists held guns at their fellow rebels' heads.[[97]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_38-97)

 [![Luke journeyed to the ravaged moon of Jedha, where he gained insight into the Dark Side of the Force.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/38/Jedha-2015StarWars38.png/revision/latest?cb=20240114021800) [![Luke journeyed to the ravaged moon of Jedha, where he gained insight into the Dark Side of the Force.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/38/Jedha-2015StarWars38.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20240114021800)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/38/Jedha-2015StarWars38.png/revision/latest?cb=20240114021800) 

Luke journeyed to the ravaged moon of Jedha, where he gained insight into the Dark Side of the Force.

 

Benthic questioned why the Alliance would attempt to mend their relations with the Partisans and return to Jedha, and Leia revealed that the Empire had resumed mining [Kyber crystals](/wiki/Kyber_crystal "Kyber crystal") on the planet and that the Alliance hoped to aid the Partisans in fighting against the Empire. Though wary of Alliance support, Benthic was nonetheless willing to accept some aid. Luke, shaken by the Partisans' extreme methods, was conflicted by agreeing to help them, but [specforces](/wiki/Rebel_Alliance_Special_Forces "Rebel Alliance Special Forces") operative [Ubin Des](/wiki/Ubin_Des "Ubin Des") reassured him that it was the right thing to do. Later in the ruined settlement of [Ai-jed](/wiki/Ai-jed "Ai-jed"), Luke, Chulco, and Ubin contemplated why people would stay on a ruined planet. Stormtroopers armed with [flamethrowers](/wiki/Flamethrower "Flamethrower") attempted to incinerate the remaining civilians, but Luke lashed out against them with his lightsaber, cutting them all down. Realizing all that was at stake in the Galactic Civil War, Skywalker approached Benthic with Han Solo and wholeheartedly agreed to assist him in his fight. Their first target was the [drill citadel](/wiki/Drill_citadel "Drill citadel"), a mining device from the planet [Shu-Torun](/wiki/Shu-Torun "Shu-Torun") that the Empire began using to mine Kyber crystals on Jedha.[[98]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_39-98)

Benthic and Luke scaled the drill citadel and the Tognath ruthlessly killed the station's guards, much to Skywalker's chagrin. Benthic held a technician at gunpoint and forced him to lower the citadel's shields before killing him as well. This allowed Han Solo, aboard the *Millennium Falcon*, to destroy the drill citadel after Benthic and Luke escaped. Later, a disillusioned Chulco asked Luke to accompany him to meet the [Central Isopter](/wiki/Central_Isopter "Central Isopter"), a death-worshipping cult that Gi claimed was wise in the Force. Although Luke was hesitant to seek the guidance from someone other than a disciple of the Jedi, he nonetheless was willing to go along. Leia attempted to convince him that his duty to the Alliance was most important, but Luke believed that becoming a Jedi and avenging all those slain by Darth Vader was the most important duty to him. Entering a chasm alongside Gi, the duo were attacked by a [sand slug](/wiki/Sand_slug "Sand slug"), a giant, normally herbivorous animal negatively influenced by the Dark Side of the Force. Able to slay the beast, Skywalker and Gi were finally confronted by the Central Isopter, who claimed that they had come to join them "in the shadow of death."[[99]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_40-99)

 [![The temple of the Central Isopter.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/56/TempleOfCentralIsopter-2015StarWars41.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190303072612) [![The temple of the Central Isopter.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/56/TempleOfCentralIsopter-2015StarWars41.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190303072612)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/56/TempleOfCentralIsopter-2015StarWars41.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190303072612) 

The temple of the Central Isopter.

 

At the edge of the planet's blast crater, Chulco and the Central Isopter presented Luke with the [Temple of Central Isopter](/wiki/Temple_of_Central_Isopter "Temple of Central Isopter"), a shrine surrounded by the Dark Side of the Force. The cult implored Skywalker and Gi to meditate and listen to the chasm's call. They both did, but Luke refused to let the Dark Side take hold of him. However, Chulco was possessed by the darkness and attacked Luke, forcing the Jedi trainee to strike him down. The cultists then announced that they had received a distress call from Chewbacca, who was being pursued by a TIE fighter over NaJedha. Luke borrowed a ship, was able to destroy the TIE fighter and bring an injured Chewie to the planet, where he provided the Alliance with the plans for the [*Leviathan*](/wiki/Leviathan_(Continent-class_crawler) "Leviathan (Continent-class crawler)"), a mobile fortress able to strip mine Kyber crystals from Jedha.[[100]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_41-100)

Han, Leia, and Benthic formed a strategy to destroy the *Leviathan* using the plans Chewbacca obtained. After the meeting, Luke ruminated on the sacrifice Rogue One made to get the Death Star plans to the Alliance, ultimately leading to him making the shot that destroyed the battle station. A newly motivated Luke accompanied Leia, C-3PO, and R2-D2 aboard the crawler and readied themselves for taking control of it. Skywalker made his way to the bridge of the *Leviathan* and held its commander, [Kanchar](/wiki/Kanchar "Kanchar"), hostage but the Imperial's cybernetic arm was equipped with a blade able to defend against Luke's lightsaber.[[96]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_42-96)

 [![Skywalker confronts Kanchar](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/bc/LukeConfrontsKanchar-2015StarWars42.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180822212528) [![Skywalker confronts Kanchar](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/bc/LukeConfrontsKanchar-2015StarWars42.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180822212528)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/bc/LukeConfrontsKanchar-2015StarWars42.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180822212528) 

Skywalker confronts Kanchar

 

Kanchar pursued Luke throughout the ship with his cybernetic arm's blade and flamethrower. Eventually leading the officer to the crawler's hangar, Skywalker activated an ion torpedo, which shut down Kanchar's cybernetics and allowed Luke to knock him out. Having taken total control of the *Leviathan* with the help of the double-crossing Queen [Trios](/wiki/Trios "Trios"), the rebels brought it to Jedha's chasm, destroyed it, and escaped with not much time to spare. Having saved what remained of Jedha and made allies in the form of the Partisans and Queen Trios, Luke and his friends left Jedha.[[101]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_43-101)

#### Crait

:   "*I'm just a farmboy from Tatooine. One of many sand-planet farmboys. But one thing was true there, just like it's true here. When someone comes for what's our, they don't try it twice. We work an honest day and long one. We're the good guys. But you wouldn't want to meet us in the dark. Where I come from—when someone pushes you, you push back harder!*"
:   ―Skywalker to Kreel while dueling him[[102]](#cite_note-Storms_of_Crait-102)

 [![Berinato leads a tour of Crait's salt flats](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/e4/SkiSpeederTour-TheStormsOfCrait1.png/revision/latest?cb=20210611234947) [![Berinato leads a tour of Crait's salt flats](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/e4/SkiSpeederTour-TheStormsOfCrait1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/300?cb=20210611234947)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/e4/SkiSpeederTour-TheStormsOfCrait1.png/revision/latest?cb=20210611234947) 

Berinato leads a tour of Crait's salt flats

 

After a mission with a plan made by Solo went awry, Skywalker, who had helped fight in his X-Wing, escaped to [Baraan-Fa](/wiki/Baraan-Fa "Baraan-Fa") with the rest of the Alliance. Organa then put him in charge of a mission to the planet [Crait](/wiki/Crait "Crait") to survey its facilities as a base. Skywalker, flying there in a [GR-75 medium transport](/wiki/GR-75_medium_transport "GR-75 medium transport"), believed the mission was just delivering farm equipment, and was reluctant to go there as he directed those on the mission to land. Once there, they met up with [Trusk Berinato](/wiki/Trusk_Berinato "Trusk Berinato"), who led them all to the mines of the planet on [V-4X-D ski speeders](/wiki/V-4X-D_ski_speeder "V-4X-D ski speeder"). After receiving new orders from Organa, Luke stated that he found the mission particularly irritating, as it reminded him of his life as a farm boy. Once they arrived, Solo encouraged him to enjoy the mission since they were not in danger. He told everyone to follow him.[[102]](#cite_note-Storms_of_Crait-102)

Skywalker and his team, which included Antilles, began using the farming equipment to make trenches in Crait's surface, though he said he would rather do anything else. Green worms then appeared from the ground and Antilles and Solo tried to shoot them, but Skywalker realized they would leave you alone if you left them alone. Still being reminded of home, Skywalker reluctantly continued an environmental assessment, discovering and rationalizing an underground ecosystem where the worms came from and realizing it was drying up quickly. Following a hunch, Skywalker took Antilles with him on the ski speeders and they discovered bodies that appeared to have been flash dried. Realizing what happened, Skywalker rushed to tell the others. He reached Organa and told her he resented her for sending him on this mission, but she said he reminded him of her and complimented him before giving him a kiss on the cheek. He then finished what he was trying to say and explained that they need to leave because a deadly salt storm was coming in. After Skywalker realized Berinato forged environmental reports, Solo warned that Berinato called SCAR squadron on them.[[102]](#cite_note-Storms_of_Crait-102)

 [![Skywalker duels Kreel on Crait](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/90/LukeVSKreelCrait-TheStormsOfCrait1.png/revision/latest?cb=20180207032607) [![Skywalker duels Kreel on Crait](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/90/LukeVSKreelCrait-TheStormsOfCrait1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180207032607)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/90/LukeVSKreelCrait-TheStormsOfCrait1.png/revision/latest?cb=20180207032607) 

Skywalker duels Kreel on Crait

 

Skywalker got in a ski speeder and attempted to shoot at the incoming troopers, but one shot a canon at his and destroyed it. Kreel then approached him and ignited his lightsaber, a determined Skywalker lighting his too. The two dueled, Skywalker turning Kreel's taunts against him by taking pride in being a farm boy as they were hard working good people who would push you back harder if you pushed them. The worms he saw earlier then tackled Kreel and Skywalker cut the stormtrooper's lightsaber in half. Skywalker made his way back to the *Falcon* and revealed that SCAR squadron lived, but that they needed to get out of the storm or they would die. Later, in orbit on the *Falcon*, Organa asked how Skywalker was and he said that he was the same, living a small life and trying to make a difference. She told him not to change.[[102]](#cite_note-Storms_of_Crait-102)

#### Mon Cala and Mako-Ta

:   "*I guess you don't need a wingman anymore.*"  
    "*WEDGE!*"  
    "*I thought you'd forgotten me!*"  
    "*No way! Red squadron forever!*"
:   ―Wedge Antiles and Skywalker reunite[[103]](#cite_note-SW45-103)

 [![Skywalker and his friends are attacked on Mon Cala.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/41/RebelsAttacked-2015StarWars44.png/revision/latest?cb=20220110202945) [![Skywalker and his friends are attacked on Mon Cala.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/41/RebelsAttacked-2015StarWars44.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20220110202945)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/41/RebelsAttacked-2015StarWars44.png/revision/latest?cb=20220110202945) 

Skywalker and his friends are attacked on Mon Cala.

 

Skywalker joined Organa, Solo, Ackbar and others to meet with [Grand Admiral](/wiki/Grand_Admiral "Grand Admiral") [Dors Urtya](/wiki/Dors_Urtya "Dors Urtya") of the [Mon Cala Mercantile Fleet](/wiki/Mon_Cala_Mercantile_Fleet "Mon Cala Mercantile Fleet") at an island preserve on [Mon Cala](/wiki/Mon_Cala "Mon Cala") with the hope of getting the fleet to join the Rebellion. Skywalker was surprised the Empire cared about nature preservation, but Organa clarified that they wanted to exploit it. After Han revealed he used to smuggle from there, which upset Skywalker, Ackbar and Organa began to negotiate as an Imperial [LAAT/le patrol gunship](/wiki/LAAT/le_patrol_gunship "LAAT/le patrol gunship") approached. Skywalker immediately assumed they had been betrayed, but Solo thought otherwise and advised Skywalker not to use his lightsaber while he spoke with them. It fired on Urtya's ship, the explosion knocking Skywalker down. When Solo's plan resulted in stormtroopers pursuing them, Skywalker went with the others through the forest to a boat where Chewbacca was waiting. On the boat, Organa continued to try an convince Urtya, but he said that he did not want to sacrifice Mon Cala, but Skywalker shot back, insisting he could not talk to the Princess of Alderaan about sacrifice. They eventually made it back to the *Falcon* and then to the [Mako-Ta Space Docks](/wiki/Mako-Ta_Space_Docks "Mako-Ta Space Docks") that the Rebellion was using as a production center, where Skywalker rejected going drinking with Solo.[[104]](#cite_note-SW44-104)

 [![Skywalker and Wedge Antilles reunite](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/50/Star_Wars_45_Textless.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20171219194236) [![Skywalker and Wedge Antilles reunite](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/50/Star_Wars_45_Textless.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20171219194236)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/50/Star_Wars_45_Textless.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20171219194236) 

Skywalker and Wedge Antilles reunite.

 

However, Skywalker did go with Solo to the bar, but insisted on only getting milk, to Solo's dismay. There, someone put their hand on Skywalker's shoulder so he pushed them away with the Force, but it turned out to be Wedge Antilles and the two had a cheerful reunion, Skywalker insisted that he had not forgot about Antilles and declared that Red Squadron was forever. Solo then tried to get Skywalker a drink to celebrate, but Skywalker just ordered the biggest milk they had. Antilles introduced Skywalker to [Hobbie](/wiki/Derek_Klivian "Derek Klivian") and [Zev Senesca](/wiki/Zev_Senesca "Zev Senesca"), who he explained they had met during Alliance training exercises, which he clarified were to ensure enough people could operate cruisers. Senesca said he was honored to meet Skywalker, but Skywalker just told him not to use honorifics and told him he would have also taken the shot. Solo then lead a toast to Red Squadron, Skywalker reciting all its members that had died. Solo was surprised he remembered all the names, but Skywalker expressed that he wished to know the names of all the Rebels that had died. Organa then arrived and told them to finish up because they had a mission.[[103]](#cite_note-SW45-103)

During the mission, Skywalker accompanied Organa and Solo to the [Dex Acquisitions Depot](/wiki/Dex_Acquisitions_Depot "Dex Acquisitions Depot") on [Meor Ain](/wiki/Meor_Ain "Meor Ain") to retrieve a Clawdite. With C-3PO unable to slice the door to the room where he was, Skywalker used his lightsaber to cut around and remove the locking mechanism before Chewbacca kicked the door. After retrieving the shapeshifter, who briefly pretended to be Bail Organa, the group left.[[103]](#cite_note-SW45-103)

 [![The Moncaladrome](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/c2/MoncaladromeExterior-2015StarWars46.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180510041628) [![The Moncaladrome](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/c2/MoncaladromeExterior-2015StarWars46.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180510041628)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/c2/MoncaladromeExterior-2015StarWars46.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180510041628) 

The Moncaladrome

 

After debriefing the Clawdite, whose name was [Tunga Arpagion](/wiki/Tunga_Arpagion "Tunga Arpagion"), that he was to impersonate the Moff of the [Calamari sector](/wiki/Calamari_sector "Calamari sector") [Tan Hubi](/wiki/Tan_Hubi "Tan Hubi") while they kidnapped him, Skywalker insisting the ordeal would make Arpagion more famous. At the [Moncaladrome](/wiki/Moncaladrome "Moncaladrome") on Mon Cala, Skywalker impersonated a stormtrooper, Organa ordering him to wait until they drugged the Moff and then bring him back to their hideout. Solo and Chewbacca went into a refresher and anticipated kidnapping Hubi while Skywalker stood outside as a stormtrooper and told everyone around that the room was for the Moff's private use, though one Imperial officer did manage to Force themself through. After successfully kidnapping Hubi, Skywalker returned to Organa and warned her to be quick so that others would not notice the switch. After Arpagion copied Hubi's appearance, Skywalker told him "May the Force be with you" before departing with the others and a tied up Hubi in a Mon Cal ship to rescue Mon Cal King [Lee-Char](/wiki/Lee-Char "Lee-Char") from [Strokill Prime](/wiki/Strokill_Prime "Strokill Prime").[[105]](#cite_note-SW46-105)

#### Mon Cal Mutiny

:   "*The King… He couldn't be moved. He was too ill.*" […]   
    "*But we've got his last words. If this doesn't inspire Mon Cala, nothing will.*"  
    "*It has to be worth it. So many people are counting on us.*"
:   ―Skywalker and Organa to C-3PO on King Lee-Char[[106]](#cite_note-SW48-106)

 [![Skywalker swims on Strokill Prime.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/2a/LukeOnStrokillPrime-2015StarWars47.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180827182550) [![Skywalker swims on Strokill Prime.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/2a/LukeOnStrokillPrime-2015StarWars47.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180827182550)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/2a/LukeOnStrokillPrime-2015StarWars47.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180827182550) 

Skywalker swims on Strokill Prime.

 

Once there, Skywalker commented that it made sense they would keep Lee-Char on a water world, though admitted the place looked bleak. After avoiding the planet's security using Hubi's biosignature, they took the ship to the planet and underwater, where they encountered a giant terrifying sea creature.[[105]](#cite_note-SW46-105) Organa realized that the creature was attracted to their ship because of the light. Solo was skeptical, but Skywalker told him not to question her and informed them he was going to carry out a plan with Chewbacca's help and to be ready. Donning a full body diving suit while Chewbacca set up an underwater sled, Skywalker shot out far away from the ship after Chewbacca gave Skywalker a hug and he thanked the Wookiee. Away from the ship in the expanse of the ocean, Skywalker ignited his lightsaber, leading the creature away with the light. Chewbacca then used a water sled and a breath mask to quickly go after Skywalker and bring him back to the ship as he turned off his lightsaber.[[107]](#cite_note-SW47-107)

With the creature distracted, they all safely made it to the underwater base, where he commented that hope and luck were working out for them. They then discovered that Lee-Char was hooked up to a machine that was the only thing keeping him alive, and Solo said Skywalker jinxed them.[[107]](#cite_note-SW47-107) Skywalker attempted to calm an angry Solo, and Lee-Char suggested that they could just carry his words to his people instead of having to lead them directly, prompting Skywalker to suggest they search for a recording droid there.[[106]](#cite_note-SW48-106)

 [![Lee-Char is found being kept alive by a machine.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/58/LeeCharCritical-2015StarWars47.png/revision/latest?cb=20240113063134) [![Lee-Char is found being kept alive by a machine.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/58/LeeCharCritical-2015StarWars47.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20240113063134)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/58/LeeCharCritical-2015StarWars47.png/revision/latest?cb=20240113063134) 

Lee-Char is found being kept alive by a machine.

 

After bringing back a camera droid, Skywalker watched as the King recorded his message, before noticing stormtroopers and screaming out to everyone that they had been noticed. The stormtroopers shot into the room, killing Lee-Char, but the group escaped with the recording back to their ship, Skywalker defending them with a blaster and directing them to get onboard and get to hyperspace quickly. He then pointed out that the *Falcon* with its touchy hyperdrive would not have been able to pull that off, but Solo warned him to stop disparaging the ship.
They met back up with C-3PO in a deserted cove on Mon Cala, Skywalker revealing to the droid that the king could not be moved but having hope that his message was worth it because people were counting on them. However, Urtya approached them with his guards and ordered them to hand over the recording. As he forcefully took it from Organa, Skywalker screamed that Lee-Char would be ashamed, though Solo told him to top talking and that they needed to get out of there. However, Urtya decided to show the footage too all of the fleet captains. Back on the *Falcon*, Skywalker heard on an earpiece that the people on the Mon Calamari ships were rebelling because of footage of Lee-Char. Because of this, however, the Imperial fleet arrived.[[106]](#cite_note-SW48-106)

 [![The Falcon faces the Imperial fleet over Mon Cala.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/46/MonCalaBlockade-2015StarWars49.png/revision/latest?cb=20240406071957) [![The Falcon faces the Imperial fleet over Mon Cala.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/46/MonCalaBlockade-2015StarWars49.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20240406071957)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/46/MonCalaBlockade-2015StarWars49.png/revision/latest?cb=20240406071957) 

The *Falcon* faces the Imperial fleet over Mon Cala.

 

Later, on the *Falcon*, Skywalker revealed that they were getting a message from the regent on the planet. The regent apologized for acting without warning and revealed he had called the Rebel fleet. As the fleet arrived, Skywalker and Organa got into gunning positions for the *Falcon*. Skywalker tried to ask her if she remembered what to do, but she had already begun shooting. Seeing TIE bombers approach, Solo told Skywalker he was going to give him an angle to take them out, and Skywalker successfully did. Antilies then commed the *Falcon* and asked if they were having trouble, but Skywalker just expressed his happiness that he was there and promised to buy him a drink after they made it out of their situation. Skywalker kept shooting to help protect jetisonned escape pods, and the *Falcon* escaped to hyperspace after a Mon Calamari ship full of coaxium crashed into the Star Destroyer and exploded it. Later, Skywalker accompanied Organa, Solo, and Chewbacca to see Arpagion off on the [Cosmatanic Steppes](/wiki/Cosmatanic_Steppes "Cosmatanic Steppes").[[108]](#cite_note-SW49-108)

#### Rogue Squadron

:   "*No time for sentiment, Luke. […] So, flight leader…what's our call sign?*"  
    "*You know, Wedge, if we're acting like Jyn Erso, I have to disagree. It* is *time for sentiment. **Rogue Squadron, form up.***"
:   ―Wedge Antilles and Skywalker, as the latter forms Rogue Squadron[[109]](#cite_note-SW52-109)
