 [![The Empire begins their attack on Mako-Ta.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/f9/AssaultOnMakoTaBegins-2015StarWars50.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180903082544) [![The Empire begins their attack on Mako-Ta.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/f9/AssaultOnMakoTaBegins-2015StarWars50.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20180903082544)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/f9/AssaultOnMakoTaBegins-2015StarWars50.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180903082544) 

The Empire begins their attack on Mako-Ta.

 

Later, Skywalker participated in a celebration of the commencement of the Rebel fleet at the Rebel Base at Mako-Ta, using his X-Wing to create a display trail of blue light alongside other X-Wings creating trails of other colors. After landing back in the hangar bay, Skywalker expressed his enthusiasm that amount Rebels present could definitively defeat the Empire, though had to assure General Dodonna that he was not being overconfident and was just excited. However, due to a betrayal by Queen Trios of Shu-Torun, the commencement failed and the Imperial Navy arrived, which Skywalker saw from a window and suspected was led by Vader. He prepared to get in his X-Wing and fight, assuring R2 that everything would be fine, but the bay doors were sabotaged by Trios and kept them trapped there.[[110]](#cite_note-SW50-110)

He then watched with shock as one of the Alliance's cruisers was destroyed[[110]](#cite_note-SW50-110) and others started to be, but still assured Zev that they had survived the Death Star and would not die there. Skywalker and Antilles then spotted the *Falcon* taking on the fighters, both confused as to what Solo was doing there. Unbeknownst to them Solo was trying to get to them to let them know that the bay doors would open if they just flew toward them because of a fail-safe.[[111]](#cite_note-SW51-111)

 [![Rogue Squadron forms.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/e5/RogueSquadron-2015StarWars52.png/revision/latest?cb=20180903005534) [![Rogue Squadron forms.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/e5/RogueSquadron-2015StarWars52.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20180903005534)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/e5/RogueSquadron-2015StarWars52.png/revision/latest?cb=20180903005534) 

Rogue Squadron forms.

 

Skywalker was disturbed by feeling powerless to help and only watch the ships get destroyed, but Solo sent C-3PO in an escape pod to the hangar bay, who informed him that they could leave by flying at the doors. Skywalker rallied all of the fighters to get ready to launch and readied R2. Dodonna commed Skywalker, who informed him of the situation, but Dodonna warned him that they needed to test the doors first, which Skywalker ignored.[[109]](#cite_note-SW52-109)

As he proceeded and Dodonna continued to insist he stand down, Skywalker realized that his situation was making him feel how [Jyn Erso](/wiki/Jyn_Erso "Jyn Erso") must have felt when she took her rogue mission to steal the Death Star plans. Though R2 warned that the doors might not open, he continued, trusting in the Force, but saying he would blame his potential death on C-3PO. The doors opened and the rest of the fighters went to meet Skywalker, him telling Wedge that he was glad for their company. Wedge advised against sentiment and asked Skywalker what their call sign should be. He told Antilles that sentiment was timely because they were acting like Jyn Erso, and named the squadron [Rogue Squadron](/wiki/Rogue_Squadron "Rogue Squadron") after Erso's crew called [Rogue One](/wiki/Rogue_One "Rogue One").[[109]](#cite_note-SW52-109)

### Rebel Commander

#### Battle of Mako-Ta

:   "*We have more important business. Leia Ogana: You are now a general. Luke Skywalker: You are now a commander. Han Solo: You are now a colonel.*"  
    "*We're being* promoted?"   
    "*The Rebellion command has been decimated. Every candidate of quality needs to step forward.*"
:   ―Mon Mothma and Leia Organa, the former speaking to Organa, Skywalker, and Solo via hologram[[112]](#cite_note-SW55-112)

Entering the [battle](/wiki/Battle_of_Mako-Ta "Battle of Mako-Ta"), Skywalker called out to Rogue Eight to warn them that someone was on their tail, but their X-wing was destroyed. Solo advised the squadron to stay close to the destroyers, and as they did, Skywalker noticed the decrepit state of the *Falcon* and asked what happened to it, Solo merely replying that Darth Vader got to it and warning Skywalker that he was still there somewhere. After Solo's plan paid off, Skywalker made a joke to him by calling him an Admiral, which Solo told him never to do again. From the base, Organa hoped out loud that Skywalker would spread the word after learning that he was out there.[[113]](#cite_note-SW53-113)

Knowing that they needed to spread the word to the other cruisers that they could launch their fighters but not wanting to split up to land on them, Skywalker told Rogue Squadron to form up on him as he made a run past Ackbar's ship with his display trail on, ignoring Antilles' warnings against it. As Ackbar watched, his attention grabbed by the display trail, Skywalker flew toward the bay doors on one of the cruisers, which opened. Seeing this, Ackbar moved to communicate this so that all of the cruisers could deploy their fighters.[[113]](#cite_note-SW53-113) Solo then announced to Skywalker that the *Falcon* was too damaged and so he was flying an X-wing.[[114]](#cite_note-SW54-114)

 [![Skywalker and Organa return to the Mako-Ta Space Docks to perform a rescue](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/96/ReturnToMakoTa-2015StarWars55.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20181003211527) [![Skywalker and Organa return to the Mako-Ta Space Docks to perform a rescue](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/96/ReturnToMakoTa-2015StarWars55.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20181003211527)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/96/ReturnToMakoTa-2015StarWars55.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20181003211527) 

Skywalker and Organa return to the Mako-Ta Space Docks to perform a rescue

 

Skywalker pursued a rogue TIE fighter that had escaped, and that unbeknownst to him was piloted by Organa, who decided to take it while fleeing Vader and his Star Destroyer the *[Executor](/wiki/Executor "Executor")*. Sensing something was off and noticing the pilot's skill, Skywalker had R2 try and scan and message it, to no avail. When Organ shot down another TIE, Skywalker realized the pilot was on their side. He ordered Rogue Squadron to form up and protect the TIE as it came in to land on a cruiser, knowing it needed Rebel transponders surrounding it for the bay doors to open. This was successful, but Skywalker's fighter was shot as he did this and crashed into the bay. Solo and Organa rushed to make sure he was all right, leaving Skywalker shocked Organa had been piloting the TIE, but all of them were happy things worked out well for them.[[114]](#cite_note-SW54-114)

Due to the counter-codes Organa had retrieved from the *Executor*, the cruiser escaped to hyperspace, though Skywalker wanted to go back and try and rescue more people, pointing out that his chance had worked out before. Dodonna criticized him for this and told him the decision was not his, merely telling Skywalker and Organa to prepare for war.[[114]](#cite_note-SW54-114) After it was decided to attempt a rescue, Solo returned to Mako-Ta with Rogue Squadron, Skywalker telling them he would fly with them again soon, causing Organa to make a comment implying he was neurotic. As Organa told Mon Mothma to get the ambassadors to board their ship, he spotted a TIE fighter coming to them, but it was shot down by Solo. Soon after, Skywalker tried to inform Solo that they were almost ready to leave, but could not get ahold of him.[[112]](#cite_note-SW55-112)

 [![The Alliance transport on Corosi 7](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/07/Corosi7-2015StarWars55.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20200601194259) [![The Alliance transport on Corosi 7](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/07/Corosi7-2015StarWars55.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20200601194259)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/07/Corosi7-2015StarWars55.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20200601194259) 

The Alliance transport on Corosi 7

 

Organa and Skywalker told Mothma to leave in the main transport with everyone while they tried to save Solo, which they did by attaching cables to his X-Wing and then jumping to hyperspace. Skywalker brought them to a moon called [Corosi 7](/wiki/Corosi_7 "Corosi 7") where Mothma sent them a transmission informing them that in the midst of the Alliance's dispersal, Skywalker was promoted to a Commander and Organa to a General, instructing them to find more ways to hurt the Empire. Receiving no information on the location of Chewbacca or the *Falcon*, Skywalker wondered how they would find them. Solo decided to take them to Nar Shaddaa, where they met up with Sana Starros, who agreed to bring them all along in her ship the *[Volt Cobra](/wiki/Volt_Cobra "Volt Cobra")*.[[112]](#cite_note-SW55-112)

#### Er'Kit

:   "*Rebel intelligence heard some strange things about the Malachor Company, and as soon as I got here to investigate I felt an... echo in the Force. I don't quite know how to explain it, but there's more going on here on Er'Kit than meets the eye.*"
:   ―Luke Skywalker, during the operations on Er'Kit[[115]](#cite_note-Commander-Echoes-115)

Following the [attack](/wiki/Battle_of_Mako-Ta "Battle of Mako-Ta") on the [Mako-Ta Space Docks](/wiki/Mako-Ta_Space_Docks "Mako-Ta Space Docks"), Skywalker was promoted to the rank of commander.[[116]](#cite_note-SW_55-116) After being promoted, Skywalker was sent to the desert world of Er'Kit, where the locals were being oppressed by a group of [mercenaries](/wiki/Mercenary "Mercenary") known as the [Malachor Company](/wiki/Malachor_Company "Malachor Company"). Upon arriving on the desert world, Skywalker sensed through the Force that there was something more at play beyond the actions of a few mercenaries. He requested the assistance of an [agent](/wiki/Saponza%27s_partner "Saponza's partner") who had a reputation for desert warfare and, together, the two defeated the mercenary outposts. The two also discovered from Imperial operatives in the [sector](/wiki/Sector "Sector") that Imperial supplies were being ferried from Nar Shaddaa to Er'Kit, suggesting a large-scale operation was under way. Eventually, Skywalker and the agent arrested the mercenary leader and tracked down the last members of Malachor Company, who had holed up in an empty village.[[115]](#cite_note-Commander-Echoes-115)

 [![Er'Kit](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/57/ErKit_planet.png/revision/latest?cb=20151228135523) [![Er'Kit](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/57/ErKit_planet.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20151228135523)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/57/ErKit_planet.png/revision/latest?cb=20151228135523) 

Er'Kit

 

Among the mercenaries' possessions, Skywalker and the agent discovered a document proving that Malachor Company was preparing to ship supplies somewhere, and its coordinates led Skywalker and the agent to an Imperial base on the planet. They subsequently attacked several Imperial bases until they found intelligence pertaining to the Empire's operation on the planet. Once they located the base from which the Imperials deployed most of their forces on the planet, Skywalker assaulted it with the assistance of Princess Organa. The Rebels razed the base, dealing an important blow to the Empire's operations on Er'Kit, but they still lacked vital information on what the Empire's true purpose was on the planet. Skywalker gradually discovered Imperial logs detailing how Malachor Company had been hired by the Imperial Security Bureau and were tasked with forcibly relocating natives to make room for [Project Hidden Eye](/wiki/Project_Hidden_Eye "Project Hidden Eye"). This ISB operation was intended to create cybernetic [sleeper agents](/wiki/Sleeper_Agent "Sleeper Agent") who could be deployed throughout the galaxy and spy on galactic citizens on behalf of the ISB. Upon its discovery, Project Hidden Eye was nearly ready to deploy its first wave of spies.[[115]](#cite_note-Commander-Echoes-115)

To prevent the operation from being carried out, Skywalker and the agent led their troops to the base that housed Project Hidden Eye. They fought through its staging area and ultimately took out the installation, ending the Imperial project for good. Skywalker thanked the agent for their service and then remained on Er'Kit for a short time, helping the Rebel Alliance execute additional missions on the desert world.[[115]](#cite_note-Commander-Echoes-115)

#### Shu-Torun

:   "*You asked the Partisans to join you. Do not be surprised when they act like the Partisans.*" […]  
    "*I…just don't push it. We have all the advantages here. Only we can open doors. We make our way to each of the cores, blow them up and bring the Spike down.*"
:   ―Benthic and Skywalker[[117]](#cite_note-SW64-117)

Eventually, Organa presented an idea to Skywalker, Solo, and Chewbacca to take down Shu-Torun and all of its facilities. Skywalker was on board immediately and thought it was time considering how much Queen Trios was responsible for. When Organa revealed they needed a shape-changer, Skywalker pointed out that they knew Tunga Arpagion and the three went to find him, finding him on [Gralack](/wiki/Gralack "Gralack") while he was performing a show using Skywalker's visage about a character based on Skywalker named "Luc Swordswinger" freeing the Mon Calamari people. When stormtroopers tried to shut down the show for being treasonous material, Skywalker confronted them, but thinking he was just Arpagion in Skywalker's form, ignored him. Skywalker disarmed all of the Stormtroopers by destroying their blasters while yelling with rage as the others extracted Arpagion. Organa later revealed that they also needed people who were used to fighting on a hell world, which Skywalker realized meant they needed to go back to Jedha. While Organa recruited the remaining Partisans there, Skywalker went to the Temple of the Central Isopter with Solo in the hopes of receiving advice from them about the dangers of the Force and controlling his anger but was surprised to find it empty, especially knowing that the cult hunted disasters like Jedha was experiencing and wanted to be around them.[[118]](#cite_note-SW62-118)

 [![Skywalker flies the Millennium Falcon over Shu-Torun.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/45/StarWars64-CoverArt.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190122225428) [![Skywalker flies the Millennium Falcon over Shu-Torun.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/45/StarWars64-CoverArt.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/220?cb=20190122225428)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/45/StarWars64-CoverArt.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190122225428) 

Skywalker flies the *Millennium Falcon* over Shu-Torun.

 

Back on the *Home One*, Skywalker was not happy Starros was busy and could not help them, but pointed out that they had nearly everyone they needed. When they arrived on Shu-Torun, Skywalker had to assuage their slicer [Meorti](/wiki/Meorti "Meorti"), who had become scared by Solo calling the mission suicidal, by insisting that they had a good plan and Solo liked to be dramatic. On the *Falcon*, Organa explained to Skywalker and the others her plan to destroy a massive tower called the [Spike](/wiki/Spike_(Shu-Torun) "Spike (Shu-Torun)"), thus systematically causing the destruction of the rest of the planet's infrastructure. Skywalker then revealed that they were planning to get access to the master security controls and lock down everything on the planet like they did to them at Mako-Ta. While Organa worked to get an eye scan of Trios to achieve this, Skywalker, Chewbacca, and the Partisans waited on the *Falcon*.[[119]](#cite_note-SW63-119)

Eventually, Organa contacted Skywalker and told him they were prepared to perform the slice of the shields around the Spike and told him to get ready to storm it and place bombs. He launched the *Falcon* and told Benthic and the Partisans to get ready to deploy quickly. Solo told Skywalker to take care of the ship, but Skywalker pointed out that the only danger it would be in would be if Solo and the others did not get the shields down in time. Once he got the word from Organa that he was able, Skywalker took the *Falcon* through the shields and he and the others stormed the base, noticing how weird it was that they had control and the element of surprise. Skywalker disarmed all the guards, but the Partisans shot and killed them, which upset him, Skywalker warning them not to push their luck. Skywalker revealed that they had control of all the doors now and instructed them to stick together so they could blow up the cores, but told Chewbacca to get back to the ship to stay in contact with Organa.[[117]](#cite_note-SW64-117)

They eventually took down three of the cores, and Skywalker took down the guards at the fourth one with his blaster and lightsaber while the Partisans gave him cover, before instructing R2 to set it to explode. Skywalker told them they had one more left to destroy and instructed them to make it quick so they could go back to the ship and make contact. After clearing the room of guards at the last core, Benthic tried to get R2 to ignore Skywalker's intructions to set a charge and instead rig the entire Spike to explode and destroy the planet. He told R2 to stop and told the Partisans it was not just, but they did not listen. Skywalker then feigned surrender as R2 emitted a bunch of gas into the gas, allowing Skywalker and the droid to run off out of sight. Fearing the Partisans had gone crazy, Skywalker was determined to find a way to stop them.[[120]](#cite_note-SW65-120)

 [![Skywalker and Benthic come into conflict on the Spike.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/61/StarWars65-CoverArt.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190220214309) [![Skywalker and Benthic come into conflict on the Spike.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/61/StarWars65-CoverArt.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20190220214309)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/61/StarWars65-CoverArt.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190220214309) 

Skywalker and Benthic come into conflict on the Spike.

 

Skywalker ran through the Spike, using his lightsaber to deactivate a blast door's controls and close it. As the Partisans started to open it, Skywalker told R2 that they could not do anything without the droid, instructing him to hide while he led the Partisans away. He did so successfully, but was cornered by the Partisans, who then contacted R2 and told him that if he did not come to them they would kill Skywalker. R2 did what they said despite Skywalker insisting his life was not worth it and begging him to stop.[[121]](#cite_note-SW66-121)

As R2 set the Spike to destroy the planet, Skywalker told the droid that he did not understand him because saving his life was not worth killing millions. Skywalker secretly hoped stormtroopers would show up and take down the Partisans. He unsuccessfully tried to talk Benthic into stopping, but Organa and Solo arrived and the former successfully talked him down. As Skywalker and the others escaped in the *Falcon*, refusing to give in to Imperial forces that had arrived, C-3PO revealed that R2 kept telling Skywalker to "trust in the Force" when he was beeping. After making it to hyperspace, Skywalker asked what they would do about the Partisans, who he called traitorous, them all eventually deciding to drop them off on [Salobea](/wiki/Salobea "Salobea"). Back at the *Home One*, Skywalker asked Meorti if they had gotten an appetite for the field, but she said she had not and sped off. Organa then listed off a bunch of possible locations for a new rebel base provided to her by General Dodonna, one of which was Hoth, Skywalker declaring that one of the places would be their new home.[[122]](#cite_note-SW67-122)

#### Sergia

:   "*And look at* this*. Didn't I just spend all my life trying to get* off *a desert planet?*"
:   ―Luke Skywalker on the desert planet Sergia[[123]](#cite_note-SW_68-123)

 [![Skywalker was assigned General Rieekan to Sergia](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/21/MissionToSergia-2015StarWars69.png/revision/latest?cb=20210519195828) [![Skywalker was assigned General Rieekan to Sergia](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/21/MissionToSergia-2015StarWars69.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/220?cb=20210519195828)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/21/MissionToSergia-2015StarWars69.png/revision/latest?cb=20210519195828) 

Skywalker was assigned General Rieekan to Sergia

 

Following their [mission to Shu-Toran](/wiki/Mission_to_Shu-Torun_(Rebel_Alliance) "Mission to Shu-Torun (Rebel Alliance)"), Skywalker, along with Solo and Organa, returned to the Rebel fleet where General [Carlist Rieekan](/wiki/Carlist_Rieekan "Carlist Rieekan"), noting his skill as a pilot, assigned Skywalker a [mission](/wiki/Mission_to_Sergia "Mission to Sergia") to the [Inner Rim](/wiki/Inner_Rim_Territories "Inner Rim Territories") planet [Sergia](/wiki/Sergia "Sergia") to lure all Imperial forces and [probe droids](/wiki/Viper_probe_droid "Viper probe droid") that had recently been released en mass from a [refueling station](/wiki/Rebel_refueling_station "Rebel refueling station") the Rebel Alliance had established on the planet. When Skywalker arrived, he found a massive Star Destroyer in orbit. After failing to lure it away, Skywalker landed on the planet and tried to look for the Rebels on foot, though was upset that he could not influence the Star Destroyer's pilot with the Force to do what he wanted like he believed Kenobi could have. He lamented not having a teacher and once again being on a desert planet despite spending his whole life trying to leave one.[[123]](#cite_note-SW_68-123)

After destroying a probe droid that was caught in a stampede of [plain hundas](/wiki/Plain_hunda "Plain hunda") with his his lightsaber, Skywalker found that the rebels were operating out in the open, and sent R2-D2 to deliver a message to the rebels to lie low until he could help them to escape. He spent hours attempting to find pods released by the Star Destroyer, eventually trying and failing to use the Force to find them, before finding a town and deciding to check it out. There, in a bar, Skywalker saved thief [Warba Calip](/wiki/Warba_Calip "Warba Calip") from an individual that was threatening her because he believed she was cheating at sabacc by beating them with a broom. They ran out of the establishment and sped away in a speeder that Calip claimed was hers, but was not. Skywalker was annoyed by the experience and asked her to drop him off as soon as possible, but she was elated and asked why he was not, before suggesting that the reason she had won so much at the bar was because she knew the Force, saying she recognized Skywalker as someone who sought it.[[124]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_69-124)

Eventually the speeder Skywalker and Calip were in was deactivated from afar by the owner and the two introduced themselves to each other. When he questioned his decision to rescue her, she claimed she had cheated earlier using a Jedi mind trick, though she was not a Jedi. She also saw his lightsaber and told him to tell her all about it after they moved the speeder and then hid. Once they did, and saw the owner coming for it, they hid out in a forest of dead trees, though Calip no longer was interested in hearing about his lightsaber or helping him with the Force because she said using the Force got people killed. He insisted he just needed a little help, before noticing that Calip had stolen his lightsaber and pulling it back to him to activate it. After contacting someone named Tinga about the lightsaber, Calip tried to suggest that Skywalker run away and settle down, but he insisted that he needed to learn about the Force to fight the Empire and tried to convince her to help him with his mission to destroy the shuttles that had arrived there, explaining that he was unable to locate them with the Force. She claimed that she could teach him to reach out with his mind and find them, but that it would take too long and they should just rob a bank instead, confusing Skywalker.[[125]](#cite_note-SW70-125)

 [![The Imperial payroll garrison](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/0e/ImperialPayrollGarrison-2015StarWars71.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190906060649) [![The Imperial payroll garrison](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/0e/ImperialPayrollGarrison-2015StarWars71.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20190906060649)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/0e/ImperialPayrollGarrison-2015StarWars71.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190906060649) 

The Imperial payroll garrison

 

Skywalker was unsure about Calip's plan, but he insisted that they needed to steal the money from the Imperial payroll garrison so they could buy the information about the shuttles from the secretary of the local sub-governor. Skywalker and Calip analyzed the defenses before she taught him the [Guardian's Mantra](/wiki/Guardian%27s_Mantra "Guardian's Mantra"), claiming he would become more powerful if he had the belief of the the priests who said that mantra. While saying the mantra, Skywalker took down Imperial droids with his lightsaber and barged into the garrison, though he lost his lightsaber in a flurry of blasterfire shot by turrets on the building, though Calip collected it. After an explosion rocked the building, Skywalker exited the building with a bag full of credits. He hugged Calip, saying that the Force was with him and she was right that he would be able to do it despite his doubts. She said she was always right, which Skywalker said he would remember.[[126]](#cite_note-SW71-126)

After escaping in an Imperial speeder, Skywalker expressed his delight that they could now buy information from Calip's source, but Calip instead suggested that they take the money for themselves. As Calip continued to discard Skywalker's insistences that he needed to find the patrol to save thousands of lives and stared to suggest that he would be a great thief, Skywalker started to believe that Calip was testing him as part of his training and insisted they find her source. They then stumbled upon stormtroopers threatening a person named [Ranja](/wiki/Ranja "Ranja"). Skywalker wanted to take them down with his lightsaber, but Calip insisted that he would make things worse, causing Calip to sit down in frustration when Skywalker once again thought she was testing him. She explained that she had grown up on Jedha near the [Temple of the Kyber](/wiki/Temple_of_the_Kyber "Temple of the Kyber") and had seen the [Guardians of the Whills](/wiki/Guardians_of_the_Whills "Guardians of the Whills") perform miracles, but had also seen the Empire's atrocities afterward. When he asked about the Force, she instructed Skywalker to close his eyes and try to reach out and feel for it after explaining what it was. However, she was really using the opportunity to steal his lightsaber and run off, which Skywalker quickly realized, screaming out for her.[[127]](#cite_note-SW72-127)

 [![Warba Calip](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/28/Warba-2015StarWars69.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190725102622) [![Warba Calip](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/28/Warba-2015StarWars69.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20190725102622)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/28/Warba-2015StarWars69.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190725102622) 

Warba Calip

 

As he ran after Calip, C-3PO reached out to Skywalker via comm and informed him that the planet he and Chewbacca were supposed to destroy had turned out to be inhabited and that Vader had arrived. Skywalker got no response from the droid after and ran after Calip to get his lightsaber, realizing he needed it more than ever, but his attempts to reason with her by warning her people would die failed and she sped off in the speeder. The Rebels on Sergia then contacted Skywalker via R2-D2 and informed them that an Imperial transport had found them. Skywalker told them to stay under cover before stealing a stormtroopers speeder bike and leading the transport away, instructing the Rebels to evacuate while he did so. He then crashed the speeder bike into the transport and brought it down, stormtroopers chasing him through the desert until he ran into Calip in her speeder, who reluctantly gave Skywalker his lightsaber.[[128]](#cite_note-SW73-128) While deflecting the stormtroopers blasterfire with his lightsaber, Skywalker got in the speeder with Calip and they left, Skywalker joking that he used a Jedi mind trick on her and pointing out that in seemed like she was like his friend Solo and helping for more than just the money.[[129]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_74-129)

#### K43

:   "*I've got to get to K43 and help my friends.*"  
    "*But your friends just said Vader's there! […] I'm not a teacher. I don't know anything about the Force. You haven't learned anything from me. If you try to take on Lord Vader…you're dead.*"  
    "*I still gotta go, Warba. But I don't care what you say. You're more than you seem…let's hope we all are.*"
:   ―Skywalker and Werba Calip[[129]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_74-129)

 [![Stormtroopers chase after Skywalker and Calip on desert manglers.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/09/DesertMangler-2015StarWars74.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20210316181223) [![Stormtroopers chase after Skywalker and Calip on desert manglers.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/09/DesertMangler-2015StarWars74.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20210316181223)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/09/DesertMangler-2015StarWars74.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20210316181223) 

Stormtroopers chase after Skywalker and Calip on desert manglers.

 

Meanwhile, Darth Vader had discovered that Chewbacca was on the planet [K43](/wiki/Kakra "Kakra") in the *Millennium Falcon*.[[125]](#cite_note-SW70-125) He had realized it was a rebel trap for him and Imperial forces, but decided to use Chewbacca to trap Skywalker.[[127]](#cite_note-SW72-127) Skywalker commed Solo, telling the smuggler he had just been talking about him and was fleeing stormtroopers mounted on [desert manglers](/wiki/Desert_mangler "Desert mangler"), but Solo one-upped him and said he was trying to take down a star destroyer with a transport shuttle. After keeping the troopers away by swinging his lightsaber at them, Skywalker instructed Calip to have faith and bring the speeder to some rocks, where Skywalker used a grappling hook to bring down the rocks on top of the troopers. Skywalker then made it back to R2 and his X-wing, which Rebels had prepared and confirmed it was the right time for him to leave and avoid the Super Star Destroyer. Skywalker instructed them to take Calip and drop her on the next safe planet. When Skywalker revealed he was going to K43, Calip revealed that she did not actually know much about the Force and had not really taught Skywalker anything, warning he would die if he went to face Vader. Skywalker said he still needed to go, and boarded his X-wing and took off while telling Calip that she was more than she seemed, and that he hoped they all were.[[129]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_74-129)

While landing his X-wing on K43, the starfighter was hit by an electromagnetic pulse generated by the planet's natives, the [Kakrans](/wiki/Kakran "Kakran"), in an attempt to combat Vader. As a result, the X-wing crashed and R2 was deactivated, leaving Skywalker worried and rattled as he noticed Vader approaching him with his red lightsaber ignited. However, Vader was attacked with a rock by Chewbacca before the Sith Lord could reach Skywalker.[[129]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_74-129) After Chewbacca knocked Vader down into a chasm, Skywalker ran to his friend. Finding his lightsaber unable to activate, he decided to use a rock to bring an avalanche down on top of Vader while saying the Guardian's mantra, but ultimately caught caught in the rock slide and had to be saved from the dark lord's clutches by Chewbacca. Skywalker tried to get Chewbacca to abandon him and save himself as Chewbacca carried him and ran away from Vader and blasterfire shot by stormtroopers at the top of the chasm.[[130]](#cite_note-SW75-130)

 [![Skywalker and his friends shoot at a weakened Darth Vader.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d0/ShootingVaderOnK43-2015StarWars75.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20230821005509) [![Skywalker and his friends shoot at a weakened Darth Vader.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d0/ShootingVaderOnK43-2015StarWars75.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20230821005509)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d0/ShootingVaderOnK43-2015StarWars75.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20230821005509) 

Skywalker and his friends shoot at a weakened Darth Vader.

 

As they ran, Solo crashed his shuttle down in front of them, Skywalker saying they needed to get Vader before Solo could even ask how he was doing. Organa then emerged from the ship shooting stormtroopers with another man, who Solo revealed was named [Dar Champion](/wiki/Dar_Champion "Dar Champion") when Skywalker asked. After learning that that Vader had been weakened by the electromagnetic pulse, Skywalker insisted they would never get a better chance to take him down so they all rushed at him while shooting at him until he threw them all down and back with the Force. After Vader ran off, Skywalker and the others started board the *Falcon* to evacuate the unstable planet, but remembering R2 was still on his X-wing, Skywalker ran to rescue the droid, telling the others he would meet them in the air. C-3PO and the Kakrans then agreed that Skywalker was very thoughtful.[[130]](#cite_note-SW75-130)

Skywalker eventually reunited with R2-D2 at his X-wing, but Vader was there too, with his lightsaber ignited. Skywalker ignited his lightsaber too, but before they could duel, the ground beneath them collapsed, forcing Skywalker to jump in the X-wing as the planet was destroyed. As Skywalker flew his starfighter in the aftermath, he discovered that Vader had survived the event and watched with relief as the Star Destroyer the man was in jumped to lightspeed before Vader could hurt him. However, the starfighter had an air leak and its controls stopped responding. Skywalker was saved by the rebels from Sergia, including Calip who had refused to let the others go somewhere safe and insisted they rescue Skywalker. Skywalker told her that he had known she would come through. Later, on the Rebel fleet, which was now over the planet Hoth, Skywalker watched as Champion spoke to Rieekan and commented he was really good. Organa claimed the reason for this was that he had plans and did not just show up and hope for the best like Solo, but Skywalker decided that was all you needed when you had friends as he watched with a smile as Calip pickpocketed someone.[[130]](#cite_note-SW75-130)

#### Valo system

:   "*Oh I dread to think what would've happened if the Empire had captured you.*"  
    "*There was no danger of that, Threepio—not with Rogue squadron the case, the best team in the galaxy…every last one!*"
:   ―C-3PO and Skywalker[[131]](#cite_note-Squad_Goals_2-131)

 [![The Taris shipyard is destroyed.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9f/Taris-shipyard-destroyed.png/revision/latest?cb=20211021002830) [![The Taris shipyard is destroyed.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9f/Taris-shipyard-destroyed.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20211021002830)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9f/Taris-shipyard-destroyed.png/revision/latest?cb=20211021002830) 

The Taris shipyard is destroyed.

 

Skywalker lead Rogue Squadron, including Antilles, [Lyle Kullan](/wiki/Lyle_Kullan "Lyle Kullan"), [Isla Mantra](/wiki/Isla_Mantra "Isla Mantra"), and [Ibti Myrak](/wiki/Ibti_Myrak "Ibti Myrak") to accompany [Blade Squadron](/wiki/Blade_Squadron "Blade Squadron") to the [Taris system](/wiki/Taris_system "Taris system") to take out an Imperial shipyard. After having everyone report in, Skywalker attempted to dissuade Myrak of their excitement to hurt the Empire, insisting they have a level head, but Myrak continued being cocky, which angered Kullan. Skywalker reminded Kullan that he used to be the same way. Just then, R2 revealed that multiple TIE fighters were incoming, and Myrak leapt into action, but Skywalker told her to stay in formation because she was leaving the left side of Blade Squadron open. Myrak and Kullan then squabbled over taking out the TIEs over comm and Skywalker ordered them to stop and focus. Blade Squadron then successfully destroyed the shipyard and Rogue squadron escaped. Afterward, Skywalker warned Myrak that she was out of line. When she kept being cocky, Skywalker assured Antilles that he would watcher her and she would be grounded permanently if she made another mistake.[[132]](#cite_note-Squad_Goals_1-132)

Three days later, during a pirate attack in the [Cilpar system](/wiki/Cilpar_system "Cilpar system"), Myrak ignored Skywalker's orders to protect a Rebel cruiser from pirates and stay with the group, before insulting Skywalker for not being a hotshot and derogatorily calling him a farmboy. After Skywalker was forced to save Myrak from the pilots, Skywalker told her that she was being kicked out of the Squadron for disobeying orders. On the *Home One*, Skywalker and Antilies then received a message from Kullan saying the Empire was attacking [Lonisa City](/wiki/Lonisa_City "Lonisa City") on the planet [Valo](/wiki/Valo "Valo"), before it cut out. Skywalker ordered Myrak to stay behind and catalogue message logs while Skywalker went with the rest of the Squadron. Once in the [Valo system](/wiki/Valo_system "Valo system"), they found no sign of the Empire until Skywalker got an intense feeling in the Force and a Star Destroyer appeared.[[132]](#cite_note-Squad_Goals_1-132)

 [![Rogue Squadron faces a Star Destroyer over Valo.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a7/StarDestroyeroverValo.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20230826003951) [![Rogue Squadron faces a Star Destroyer over Valo.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a7/StarDestroyeroverValo.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20230826003951)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a7/StarDestroyeroverValo.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20230826003951) 

Rogue Squadron faces a Star Destroyer over Valo.

 

While Skywalker and Rogue Squadron fought the Empire and tried to figure out where Kulan was, Myrak ignored Skywalker's orders and took her X-wing to go after him. Ackbar then tried to reach out to Skywalker and let him know, but found he could not get through to Rogue Squadron. C-3PO then warned Ackbar that he suspected Skywalker's hands were full. Meanwhile, Skywalker tried and failed to get through to the fleet, and he and Mantra tried to assure Antilles they had his back. However, Skywalker was then caught in a tractor beam. Mantra went to save him, but Skywalker warned her to follow advice someone smarter than he looks, referencing Solo, had told him which was "don't get cocky", to which she called Solo a kill-joy. She assured Skywalker he would be able to tell Solo she said that, but before she could take out the tractor beam, she was fired at by a fellow X-wing, who turned out to be Kullan.[[131]](#cite_note-Squad_Goals_2-131)

Kullan revealed that he had been working for the Empire and would have had Skywalker captured at Taris if it was not for Myrak. However, Myrak then arrived and announced herself, before shooting at the tractor beams and freeing Skywalker. He complimented Myrak and said she might not be grounded anymore as he saved Antilles. Skywalker then had the entire Squadron form up on Kullan as the Rebel fleet arrived. The Star Destroyer left into hyperspace and abandoned Kullan, who was then captured by the Rebels. Akbar and C-3PO then revealed to Skywalker that Myrak had uncovered Kullan's spy messages and plan to trap him on Valo. Skywalker assured C-3PO that there never had been any real danger, because Rogue Squadron was on the case and was the best team in the galaxy.[[131]](#cite_note-Squad_Goals_2-131)

#### On Hoth

:   "*I know where we can dig to free ourselves. See? Jedi aren't all bad.*"  
    "*Solving the same problem you caused is supposed to make me like you?*"  
    "You *could have caused the problem, too, I'll remind you. It's okay. I'll work on you. I have a feeling we're going to be on Hoth for a long, long time.*"  
    [laughing] "*Gods, I hope not.*"
:   ―Luke Skywalker and Reyé Hollis[[133]](#cite_note-Luke_on_the_Bright_Side-133)

 [![Echo Base on Hoth](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/24/EchoBase-ESBPromo.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20171020032513) [![Echo Base on Hoth](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/24/EchoBase-ESBPromo.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/300?cb=20171020032513)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/24/EchoBase-ESBPromo.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20171020032513) 

Echo Base on Hoth

 

In [3 ABY](/wiki/3_ABY "3 ABY"),[[41]](#cite_note-Galactic_Atlas-41) Skywalker and the Rogue Squadron were transferred to the [Echo Base](/wiki/Echo_Base "Echo Base"), a rebel base on the iced planet [Hoth](/wiki/Hoth "Hoth"), where he participated in regular patrols of the frozen perimeter under the callsign [Echo Three](/wiki/Echo_Three "Echo Three").[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11) Upon Skywalker's arrival at Echo Base, Rebel leadership expected him to use the Force to help excavate the tunnels by sensing where and when to dig, even though he was unsure of how to do that. His belongings, including his lightsaber, were placed in a decontamination unit in case of off-world pathogens. Sergeant [Reyé Hollis](/wiki/Rey%C3%A9_Hollis "Reyé Hollis") from [Rebel Alliance Special Forces](/wiki/Rebel_Alliance_Special_Forces "Rebel Alliance Special Forces") was assigned to familiarize him with the location. After they introduced themselves to each other and shook hands, Skywalker declared that he was there to help.[[133]](#cite_note-Luke_on_the_Bright_Side-133)

Skywalker hoped to get to know Hollis since they would be working together, and they both thought the other had attractive qualities, but the sergeant's anti-Jedi sentiments gave Skywalker the initial impression that the other man disliked him. He did not recognize that Hollis had a Naboo name, but he could sense that Naboo was beautiful through Hollis' mental images of home. Hollis made a derogatory remark about the Jedi and Skywalker defended them. He also promised not to let the Naboo man down, just before a giant [fork-nosed ice worm](/wiki/Fork-nosed_ice_worm "Fork-nosed ice worm") broke through the ground next to them and they were trapped by a cave-in.[[133]](#cite_note-Luke_on_the_Bright_Side-133)

Unused to total darkness, Skywalker experienced claustrophobia. He could hear but not locate Hollis until he tried to use the Force to stretch out his senses. He tried to remember that darkness had been a comfort back on Tatooine, but that did not work and he still felt suffocated by the darkness. He successfully detected that Hollis was nearby using the Force and told the other man to stay still. When Skywalker approached, they bickered briefly over what was responsible for the cave-in, Hollis urging him not to use the Force. Hollis, recognizing that the Jedi was panicking, grabbed Skywalker's hand and pressed it to a gap in the wall that had air flowing through it. Skywalker clutched Hollis' hand and asked for his trust. They sat down and kept holding each other's hands as Skywalker thought about the light and warmth of his home on Tatooine. Skywalker began to reflect on his fear of what the darkness would do to him psychologically, referring both to the literal situation they were in and the general darkness in the galaxy he faced. As their hands warmed, Skywalker could sense where they could dig through the ice to free themselves in the Force. They teased each other and laughed before they started digging, Skywalker recognizing that the Force had never steered him the wrong direction and suspecting it never would.[[133]](#cite_note-Luke_on_the_Bright_Side-133)

While the base was still being built, two rebel soldiers, [Kes Dameron](/wiki/Kes_Dameron "Kes Dameron") and his wife, [Shara Bey](/wiki/Shara_Bey "Shara Bey") found themselves trapped after an ice collapse caused by [A-Wing](/wiki/A-wing_starfighter "A-wing starfighter") cannon. Thinking they would have died, they recorded a message for their little son, [Poe Dameron](/wiki/Poe_Dameron "Poe Dameron") to explain why they joined the Rebellion. Skywalker, however, rescued them, helped by Chewbacca by opening a hole in the ice using his lightsaber, him, Organa, and the others willing to risk the tech in the control room to save their lives. He allowed Bey to use him as a crutch so she could limp out. Dameron and Bey were eventually treated by a [2-1B surgical droid](/wiki/2-1B_surgical_droid "2-1B surgical droid").[[134]](#cite_note-AEoV-134)

At some point, Skywalker walked outside of Echo Base to speak with Captain [Magna Tolvan](/wiki/Magna_Tolvan "Magna Tolvan"), [Vulaada Klam](/wiki/Vulaada_Klam "Vulaada Klam"), and [Korin Aphra](/wiki/Korin_Aphra "Korin Aphra"), the latter of which had been very excited by the idea of the Force-sensitive pilot and the former recognizing him as the man who destroyed the Death Star, which Skywalker confirmed. After confirming that they were the friends of Doctor Chelli Aphra, Skywalker told them that a Rebellion spy had revealed that he had learned from a comms jockey on the *Executor* that someone had sabotaged the Empire's computers and made it hard for them to search for the Alliance. He explained that the Empire had put out a warrant for the culprit, and then revealed that their description matched that of Doctor Aphra and her droid companions. Skywalker revealed that sabotage had set the Empire back enough for them to set up their shields and finalize their evacuation plans. He told them that he had always known that there was good in Aphra before turning and leaving, the three then discussing and then deciding against telling him that Aphra had also saved the Emperor's life.[[135]](#cite_note-Aphra_Epilogue-135)

#### The Battle of Hoth

:   "*Rogue Group, use your harpoons and tow cables. Go for the legs. It might be our only chance of stopping them.*"
:   ―Commander Luke Skywalker, during the Battle of Hoth[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11)

 [![Skywalker riding a tauntaun mount on Hoth](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/86/Tauntaun-TOTS.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160220050752) [![Skywalker riding a tauntaun mount on Hoth](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/86/Tauntaun-TOTS.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20160220050752)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/86/Tauntaun-TOTS.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160220050752) 

Skywalker riding a tauntaun mount on Hoth

 

Some time later, while reconnoitering the surroundings of Echo Base on[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11) the [tauntaun](/wiki/Tauntaun "Tauntaun") [Riba](/wiki/Riba "Riba"),[[136]](#cite_note-FACPOV_SWKTW-136) after Solo had departed back to base, Skywalker was attacked by a [wampa](/wiki/Unidentified_wampa "Unidentified wampa"), only to regain consciousness in its [cave](/wiki/Cave "Cave"). He severed its arm with his lightsaber and escaped; after a long walk in the icy wind, he collapsed from exhaustion. Near death, he had a vision of Kenobi, who told him to seek the teachings of Yoda in the [Dagobah system](/wiki/Dagobah_system "Dagobah system").[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11)

Rescued by Solo, Skywalker recovered from his wounds in a [bacta tank](/wiki/Bacta_tank "Bacta tank") operated by the medical droids [2-1B](/wiki/2-1B "2-1B") and [FX-7](/wiki/FX-7 "FX-7"). However, Vader had located Echo Base with [one](/wiki/XJ9-CS14 "XJ9-CS14") of his [probe droids](/wiki/Probe_droid "Probe droid") and prepared an imminent attack on the recently-opened Alliance base,[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11) thus prompting the Alliance to evacuate the base at once. After bidding farewell to his friends,[[137]](#cite_note-SYWtBaJ?-137) for the impending [battle](/wiki/Battle_of_Hoth "Battle of Hoth"), Skywalker was to lead Rogue Squadron in an [airspeeder](/wiki/T-47_airspeeder "T-47 airspeeder").[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11) Before he departed to the battlefront, he was spotted by rebel journalist [Corwi Selgrothe](/wiki/Corwi_Selgrothe "Corwi Selgrothe"), who wanted to quickly interview him for propaganda footage, but she was instead led to the escape transports by rebel trooper [L'cayo Llem](/wiki/L%27cayo_Llem "L'cayo Llem").[[138]](#cite_note-Heroes-138) During the battle, Skywalker led his speeders against the walkers, ordering Rogue Squadron to pull the AT-ATs down with tow tables after realizing their armor could resist their blasters. Though he was shot down, and his [gunner](/wiki/Gunner "Gunner") [Dak Ralter](/wiki/Dak_Ralter "Dak Ralter") was killed, he got out of his damaged speeder and single-handedly destroyed walker [Blizzard 4](/wiki/Blizzard_4 "Blizzard 4") by using a [harpoon gun](/wiki/Harpoon_gun "Harpoon gun") and then used his lightsaber to cut a hole and throw a [thermal detonator](/wiki/Thermal_detonator "Thermal detonator"). As Imperial forces breached the Rebels' defenses, the last Rebel transport departed, and Skywalker fled the planet aboard his X-wing with R2-D2.[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11)

### Traveling to Dagobah

#### Meeting Yoda

:   "*Will he finish what he begins?*"  
    "*I won't fail you. I'm not afraid.*"  
    "*Oh, you will be. You will be.*"
:   ―Yoda and Luke Skywalker — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a6/ImNotAfraid-YouWillBe.flac/revision/latest?cb=20250405134538)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:ImNotAfraid-YouWillBe.flac "File:ImNotAfraid-YouWillBe.flac"))[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11)

 [![Traveling to Dagobah, Skywalker sought out Grand Master Yoda in order to complete his Jedi training.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/dd/Yodalukedagobah.png/revision/latest?cb=20130324024419) [![Traveling to Dagobah, Skywalker sought out Grand Master Yoda in order to complete his Jedi training.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/dd/Yodalukedagobah.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20130324024419)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/dd/Yodalukedagobah.png/revision/latest?cb=20130324024419) 

Traveling to Dagobah, Skywalker sought out Grand Master Yoda in order to complete his Jedi training.

 

Skywalker then traveled to [Dagobah](/wiki/Dagobah "Dagobah"), which turned out to be a remote [swamp](/wiki/Swamp "Swamp") planet, where he encountered Yoda, the former [Grand Master](/wiki/Grand_Master "Grand Master") of the fallen Jedi Order. In their initial meeting, Skywalker was frustrated and impatient and was rather short-tempered with the diminutive Yoda, who did not initially identify himself and purposefully tested Skywalker's patience, telling him a story about three brothers,[[137]](#cite_note-SYWtBaJ?-137) and taking him back to his [hut](/wiki/Yoda%27s_Hut "Yoda's Hut") to partake in a meal of [rootleaf stew](/wiki/Rootleaf_stew "Rootleaf stew"), which he did not find very appetizing.[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11)

However, Skywalker gained a new appreciation for the small creature upon learning his identity, and Yoda agreed to train Skywalker only at the insistence of Kenobi's spirit. Skywalker's training proved to be difficult, as his adventurous past had shaped his mind toward action and emotional instinct.[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11)

#### Renewed training

:   "*That place… is strong with the dark side of the Force. A domain of evil it is. In you must go.*"  
    "*What's in there?*"  
    "*Only what you take with you.*"
:   ―Yoda and Luke Skywalker[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11)

 [![Yoda trains Luke Skywalker on Dagobah.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/7f/LukeTrainsDagobah.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20240501004621) [![Yoda trains Luke Skywalker on Dagobah.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/7f/LukeTrainsDagobah.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20240501004621)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/7f/LukeTrainsDagobah.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20240501004621) 

Yoda trains Luke Skywalker on Dagobah.

 

Skywalker's training on Dagobah lasted several weeks, with Kenobi needing to appear in Yoda's dreams more than once to convince the old master to keep up Luke's training and argue that the boy would not end up like this father. When Skywalker and Yoda argued, Kenobi also regularly appeared to stop their arguments.[[139]](#cite_note-There_is_Always_Another-139) One day during his training with Yoda, the Jedi Master had Skywalker climb a tree to use his senses to find a way through the tree, Skywalker lost his balance and fell from the tree. Yoda decided to have Skywalker carry him as he redid the task.[[140]](#cite_note-FOD-140)

When Yoda asked him to enter a [cave](/wiki/Cave_of_Evil "Cave of Evil") that was strong in the dark side in which he was supposed to find only what he took with him, he was [challenged](/wiki/Duel_on_Dagobah_(3_ABY) "Duel on Dagobah (3 ABY)") by a vision of himself wearing the [armor of Darth Vader](/wiki/Darth_Vader%27s_armor "Darth Vader's armor"), meant to symbolize his inner darkness.[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11) Master and apprentice then had an encounter with a raging [elephoth](/wiki/Elephoth "Elephoth"), which Skywalker managed to calm by leading her to her child.[[137]](#cite_note-SYWtBaJ?-137)

#### Leaving prematurely

:   "*Luke! You must complete the training.."  
    " I can't keep the vision out of my head. They're my friends. I've gotta help them.*"
:   ―Yoda and Skywalker[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11)

Shortly after, he had a vision of Han Solo and Leia Organa suffering at [Cloud City](/wiki/Cloud_City "Cloud City") on [Bespin](/wiki/Bespin "Bespin"). Unable to get the visions out of his head, and convinced that his friends would surely die if he did not help them, Skywalker decided to end his training prematurely to rescue them, despite Yoda and Kenobi's insistence that he was not ready to face the dark side on his own yet, but Skywalker was convinced that he would learned enough to hold his own, and he could not just stand by and leave his friends to the mercy of the Empire.[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11)

Seeing that Skywalker's mind was made up, Kenobi let him know that if he ended up facing Vader, he could not interfere on his behalf, and advised him not to give into hatred. Likewise, Yoda advised him to mind what he would learned. Skywalker promised to do so, and vowed to return to Dagobah one day to finish his training.[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11)

### Vader's revelation

#### Vader's trap

:   "*You have learned much, young one."  
    "You'll find I'm full of surprises!*"
:   ―Darth Vader and Luke Skywalker[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11)

 [![Skywalker confronted Vader on Bespin while attempting to save his friends.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/27/LukeVSVaderB.png/revision/latest?cb=20130324214148) [![Skywalker confronted Vader on Bespin while attempting to save his friends.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/27/LukeVSVaderB.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/269?cb=20130324214148)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/27/LukeVSVaderB.png/revision/latest?cb=20130324214148) 

Skywalker confronted Vader on Bespin while attempting to save his friends.

 

Upon his arrival at Cloud City's [East Platform](/wiki/East_Platform "East Platform"), Skywalker felt Vader's presence,[[137]](#cite_note-SYWtBaJ?-137) and went into the nearest building, where he was shot at by Fett, who had come to claim a bounty put on Solo by Jabba the Hutt, and tried to pursue a group of stormtroopers and [Imperial officers](/wiki/Imperial_officer "Imperial officer") who held Organa, Chewbacca, and C-3PO captive. The princess attempted to warn Skywalker that he was walking into a trap, but his path was diverted to the [carbon-freezing](/wiki/Carbon-freezing "Carbon-freezing") [chamber](/wiki/Carbon-freezing_chamber "Carbon-freezing chamber") where Darth Vader awaited him, with the intention to freeze him in [carbonite](/wiki/Carbonite "Carbonite") to present him to the [Emperor](/wiki/Galactic_Emperor "Galactic Emperor"). Skywalker engaged the Dark Lord in a fierce [lightsaber duel](/wiki/Duel_on_Cloud_City "Duel on Cloud City").[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11)

During the duel, Vader praised Skywalker's training in the Force thus far and attempted to goad him into giving into his anger and hatred, claiming that it was the only way to defeat him. Vader managed to knock Skywalker into the carbon-freezing chamber and appeared to have frozen him like he had Solo, but Skywalker [leapt](/wiki/Force_jump "Force jump") out of the chamber before the process was finished, which left Vader impressed.[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11)

The duel eventually carried into the control room of one of Cloud City's [gas-processing vanes](/wiki/Gas-processing_vane "Gas-processing vane"). Vader began using the Force to throw various objects in the chamber at the young Jedi hopeful. One such projectile, a large piece of metal piping, was misdirected and smashed through a nearby observation port. The chamber was quickly depressurized, sucking Skywalker out onto the nearby sensor relay catwalk overlooking the [reactor shaft](/wiki/Reactor_shaft "Reactor shaft"). Skywalker managed to grab on to the catwalk's railing and pull himself up.[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11)

Vader re-entered the fray and forced Skywalker back onto the catwalk. Sensing that Skywalker was weakened, the Sith Lord demanded that Skywalker surrender, lest he be destroyed as Obi-Wan Kenobi had been. Skywalker refused and desperately tried to keep fighting Vader, to which Vader responded with several ferocious strikes, ultimately forcing Skywalker to the very edge of the catwalk and slicing off his right hand. Both Skywalker's hand and his lightsaber fell into the depths of the reactor shaft.[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11)

#### A dark revelation

:   "*Obi-Wan never told you what happened to your father.*"  
    "*He told me enough! He told me you killed him!*"  
    "*No.* I *am your father."  
    "No...that's not true! That's* impossible*!"  
    "Search your feelings. You* know *it to be true."  
    "No!*"
:   ―Darth Vader and Luke Skywalker — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/22/IAmYourFather.flac/revision/latest?cb=20250405134533)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:IAmYourFather.flac "File:IAmYourFather.flac"))[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11)

 [![The revelation that Vader was Skywalker's father shook the Jedi hopeful to his core.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/87/Luke_whining.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20120109234546) [![The revelation that Vader was Skywalker's father shook the Jedi hopeful to his core.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/87/Luke_whining.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/209?cb=20120109234546)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/87/Luke_whining.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20120109234546) 

The revelation that Vader was Skywalker's father shook the Jedi hopeful to his core.

 

Seeing that Skywalker was vulnerable in his weakened state, Vader offered to show Skywalker the power of the dark side and complete his training, but Skywalker adamantly refused to ever join Vader, the man who had killed his father. In that moment, Vader revealed the truth: that *he* was his father.[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11)

Horrified by Vader's shocking revelation, Skywalker initially denounced the Sith Lord's claim as untrue and impossible, but Vader insisted that they both knew that it was the truth. Vader further claimed that Skywalker was powerful enough to destroy the Emperor, and when he did, they could rule the galaxy together as father and son.[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11)[[141]](#cite_note-BtPotDS!-141) Unwilling to join Vader but too weak to fight back, Skywalker took the only option he had left, and allowed himself to fall down the reactor shaft, being sucked through several vents and eventually being deposited to the outside of the floating city. Though he managed to grab onto a [weather vane](/wiki/Weather_scanner_vane "Weather scanner vane") to avoid falling to his death, he knew he was unable to stay there forever, especially in his weakened state. Calling out to Kenobi at first but getting no response, in desperation, he called out to Leia Organa through the Force, who was able to hear the call.[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11)

Soon, the *Millennium Falcon*, with [Lando Calrissian](/wiki/Landonis_Balthazar_Calrissian "Landonis Balthazar Calrissian"), Organa, Chewbacca, and the droids onboard, arrived to rescue him. As they [escaped](/wiki/Escape_from_Cloud_City "Escape from Cloud City") from Bespin, and the *Falcon* was faced with the Imperial fleet, Vader reached out to Skywalker through the Force, calling him "son."[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11) Skywalker fought tears back, after hearing the word he had always longed to hear while lamenting that Kenobi had not told him the truth,[[137]](#cite_note-SYWtBaJ?-137) just as the *Falcon* made the jump into hyperspace thanks to R2-D2.[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11)

#### Haunted by the truth

:   "*Ben... Ben. Why didn't you tell me?*"
:   ―Luke Skywalker[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11)

Haunted by the truth of his parentage, Skywalker found his connection to the Force considerably weakened, with his control over it remaining sporadic. Aboard the *Falcon*, after introducing Skywalker to Calrissian, Organa informed Skywalker of what had happened to Solo. Skywalker wanted to begin searching for his friend immediately, but Organa told him that there was more at stake than just Solo's life and it would be best to reconvene with the Rebel fleet first. He revealed that he had received no response from reaching out Kenobi, but she assured him that he was strong and would find his way. With Skywalker agreeing to her plan, the *Falcon* jumped to hyperspace.[[142]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_1_2020-142)

 [![The Millennium Falcon fights at Rendezvous Point Delta-Three.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/f7/DeltaThreeStar-2020StarWars1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20200919225813) [![The Millennium Falcon fights at Rendezvous Point Delta-Three.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/f7/DeltaThreeStar-2020StarWars1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20200919225813)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/f7/DeltaThreeStar-2020StarWars1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20200919225813) 

The *Millennium Falcon* fights at Rendezvous Point Delta-Three.

 

The *Falcon* arrived at the Rebellion's [Rendezvous Point Delta-Three](/wiki/Rendezvous_Point_Delta-Three "Rendezvous Point Delta-Three") in the Mid Rim to find the fleet's Fourth Division under attack from several Star Destroyers, including the *[Tarkin's Will](/wiki/Tarkin%27s_Will "Tarkin's Will")*, which was under the leadership of Commander [Ellian Zahra](/wiki/Ellian_Zahra "Ellian Zahra"). As the *Falcon* entered the battle, Skywalker volunteered to commandeer the ship's belly gun, despite his injuries. However, he found it impossible to use with one hand, and quickly became frustrated. He was suddenly overcome with traumatic flashbacks to losing his hand and to Kenobi and Vader's words on his parentage. His anger resulted in him unknowingly using the Force to make several of the attacking TIE Fighters crash into one another. With Luke stunned by his sudden show of strength, the fleet jumped to hyperspace.[[142]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_1_2020-142)

With the fleet regrouped, Skywalker found a deserted part of the flagship and attempted to contact Yoda through the Force to receive his guidance. Angry at the Jedi Master's refusal to answer, he almost shattered one of the ship's windows in another frustration-fueled loss of control over his Force abilities. Speaking to R2-D2, he revealed that he was incredibly afraid and angry and considered that those feelings and his parentage meant he should not be a Jedi. He wondered whether the lack of answers from his mentors, who he was now frustrated with for lying to him, signified a premature end to his Jedi training, and who he was meant to be if not a Jedi.[[142]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_1_2020-142)

As Calrissian prepared to go to Tatooine to locate Solo, Skywalker, who was unsure if he could trust him, insisted that he inform him if he found Solo. He suggested they could meet up at the [Jundt Massif](/wiki/Jundt_Massif "Jundt Massif") so he could help, since he knew the area from growing up there, though Calrissian was skeptical. Skywalker insisted that he did not need both hands because he had the Force, but Calrissian still insisted a rescue mission from Jabba's palace would be impossible. Organa told Skywalker that he should have a [prosthetic hand](/wiki/Mechno-arm "Mechno-arm") installed in the [Nebulon-B frigate](/wiki/EF76_Nebulon-B_escort_frigate "EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate") *[Redemption](/wiki/Redemption "Redemption")*'s medbay. Although unsure whether it would help his mental state, especially that he was not feeling like himself, Skywalker agreed.[[143]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_2-143) Skywalker specifically requested 2-1B, the medical droid who treated him on Hoth, for the procedure. Although he questioned whether he was deserving of having his hand replaced, Skywalker ultimately[[144]](#cite_note-Right-Hand_Man-144) received the hand as Calrissian and Chewbacca set out to find Solo.[[11]](#cite_note-Episode_V-11)

### An uncertain path

#### Return to Cloud City

:   "*I need to get back to Cloud City, and they'll never let me go. But if* you *ask, say you want to go, need me as your guide…*"  
    "*Why would I* ever *go back there?*"  
    "*'Cause how I hear it, you lost more than your hand there. Your lightsaber too.*"
:   ―Lando Calrissian and Luke Skywalker[[143]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_2-143)

Upon their return, Calrissian found Skywalker training to fire a blaster with his prosthetic hand. Observing the would-be Jedi's struggles, Calrissian suggested that they return to Bespin so as to retrieve Skywalker's lightsaber. As they talked, Skywalker was suddenly confronted with a vision of a female [hooded figure](/wiki/Verla "Verla") catching his lightsaber and telling him to follow his destiny.[[143]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_2-143)

 [![Skywalker has a vision while reaching out to the Force in Cloud City.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/3e/Destiny-2020StarWars4.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20231120011636) [![Skywalker has a vision while reaching out to the Force in Cloud City.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/3e/Destiny-2020StarWars4.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/300?cb=20231120011636)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/3e/Destiny-2020StarWars4.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20231120011636) 

Skywalker has a vision while reaching out to the Force in Cloud City.

 

Skywalker, accompanied by Calrissian, Organa, and R2-D2, returned to Bespin, Calrissian assuring Skywalker he knew where his lightsaber ended up. However, they were fired upon the [Bespin Wing Guard](/wiki/Bespin_Wing_Guard "Bespin Wing Guard") upon approach, though Calrissian urged Skywalker not to fire on them and instead take them in as close as possible. Skywalker was sure that they were gonna get killed, insisting destroying the Death Star was different when Calrissian suggested he could do it. Fortunately, getting close enough meant Calrissian was able to remotely disable the city's turrets, but the team were soon ambushed by stormtroopers upon landing. Needing to carry out their missions as quickly as possible to avoid capture, the rebels split up, with Skywalker and R2-D2 heading to the smelting chamber where Calrissian claimed his lightsaber should be located, walking past the spot where Vader cut off his hand. When they got there, Calrissian commed him asking for backup against stormtroopers, Skywalker agreeing to help once he found his lightsaber.[[145]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_3_2020-145)

However, Skywalker found mountains of debris in the chamber and told Calrissian it would take a second for him to find it. He enlisted the help of [ugnaughts](/wiki/Ugnaught "Ugnaught") to find it but realized that it would likely be impossible to recover his lightsaber before finally deciding to search for it through the Force. However, he instead a vivid vision of the cloaked woman and a location she was at, as well as flashes of Vader, Kenobi, Yoda, and the Emperor. Sensing that Organa was in trouble, he abandoned the search and found Calrissian surrounded by stormtroopers. Skywalker used the Force to push the Imperial soldiers through a window, slightly surprised that he was able to and revealing to Calrissian he had gotten over his block. Lando introduced his friend [Lobot](/wiki/Lobot "Lobot") and Skywalker revealed that he knew that Organa was in a hangar there.[[146]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_4_2020-146)

 [![Skywalker flees Cloud City in his X-wing.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/0f/EscapeFromCloudCityAgain-2020StarWars4.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20200714033329) [![Skywalker flees Cloud City in his X-wing.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/0f/EscapeFromCloudCityAgain-2020StarWars4.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20200714033329)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/0f/EscapeFromCloudCityAgain-2020StarWars4.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20200714033329) 

Skywalker flees Cloud City in his X-wing.

 

When Calrissian noticed he had not retrieved the lightsaber, Skywalker explained that he had learned that he did not need the lightsaber to be a Jedi and that being a Jedi was about using the Force to bring light. He was once again determined to be a Jedi, even if he never saw his father's lightsaber, which he had mixed feelings about, again. Despite Calrissian's misgivings about his plan, Skywalker was able to use the Force to deactivate all of the carbonite blocks at once and free everyone, including Organa, before fighting off stormtroopers to get to his X-wing and take off from Bespin with it. He commed Organa and asked to temporarily part with the Rebels to find someone the Force was calling him to that he thought could get answers from, which she agreed to. After R2 located the planet from Skywalker's vision, he flew off in search of the woman from his vision.[[146]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_4_2020-146)

#### Verla

:   "*You're just a poor, deluded kid. My name is Verla. So you're all caught up in this Jedi business,* huh? *Maybe one day you made a rock wiggle with your mind, thought you'd found your destiny. You're a sucker.*"
:   ―Verla, to Luke Skywalker[[147]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_5_2020-147)

 [![Skywalker flies his X-wing to Serelia.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9d/SereliaSystem-2020StarWars5.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20200814214421) [![Skywalker flies his X-wing to Serelia.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9d/SereliaSystem-2020StarWars5.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20200814214421)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9d/SereliaSystem-2020StarWars5.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20200814214421) 

Skywalker flies his X-wing to Serelia.

 

While Skywalker traveled to find the woman from his visions, Vader followed a false lead from an Imperial officer to Skywalker, only finding a con man pretending to be him to get pilot jobs and claiming that a droid named 'Ardee' helped him destroy the Death Star. Vader killed him and declared that anyone who claimed Skywalker's name would die. He told the Imperial officer to verify his findings next time and said Skywalker could still be anywhere.[[147]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_5_2020-147)

Having used the planet he saw in his vision as the basis for his search, Skywalker arrived at the planet [Serelia](/wiki/Serelia "Serelia"), where he encountered the woman from the vision at a dock on the coastline. However, when he asked whether she was a Jedi, the woman responded by dropping a large amount of fish on top of him and escaping in a boat. Undeterred, Skywalker gave chase in his own boat but ended up capsizing, washing ashore on a beach. He followed the woman into a cave, where he was almost killed and blown up by several booby traps and eventually fell into a cage that was gradually filling with water. As the woman watched, Skywalker attempted hold back the rising water with the Force, but was unable. The hooded woman asked him who he was and revealed herself to be Verla.[[147]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_5_2020-147)

 [![Verla reveals herself](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/fd/Verla-2020StarWars5.png/revision/latest?cb=20231117032347) [![Verla reveals herself](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/fd/Verla-2020StarWars5.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20231117032347)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/fd/Verla-2020StarWars5.png/revision/latest?cb=20231117032347) 

Verla reveals herself

 

Verla informed Skywalker that it would be safer if he was to give up his dream of becoming a Jedi, cynically telling him about [Order 66](/wiki/Order_66 "Order 66"), the Inquisitorius and Darth Vader himself. Sensing Skywalker's suspicious reaction to the mention of his father, Verla probed deeper into his mind and realized that he was the son of Vader. Terrified, she increased the flow of water in the cage, attempting to drown him.[[147]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_5_2020-147)Fortunately, Skywalker's life was saved by R2-D2, who incapacitated Verla and resuscitated him. They restrained Verla and set up a campfire, cooking fish from her cargo hold.[[148]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_6_2020-148)

When she regained consciousness, Skywalker freed her as a show of good faith and asked her about his vision. Verla told him that she did not possess a lightsaber, as she had given up on the Force and refused to take part in the conflict between the light and dark sides. She also revealed that Vader's name was Anakin Skywalker, and that she had learned from her master [Ferren Barr](/wiki/Ferren_Barr "Ferren Barr") that Anakin had once been a hero of the Clone Wars but that something happened to him. She revealed that she had spent her entire life on the run from the Inquisitors and Vader and had finally given up on Barr's wishes and had decided to live a normal life. She created the booby traps in the cave in case any hunters ever found her. She refuted Skywalker's belief that the Force had led her to him and insisted that Force only used people.[[148]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_6_2020-148)

#### Tempes

:   "*Once, I served the Jedi, wielded a saber like the one you hold. Then I hunted Jedi, in service to Vader and the Emperor. Now I serve them still—and kill every seeker who follows the path Vader created to this place. I presume I always will.*"  
    "*You're wrong. You will never kill a Jedi again.*"
:   ―The Grand Inquisitor and Skywalker[[148]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_6_2020-148)

 [![The Jedi outpost on Tempes](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/31/TempesJediOutpost-2020StarWars6.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20200916202443) [![The Jedi outpost on Tempes](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/31/TempesJediOutpost-2020StarWars6.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20200916202443)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/31/TempesJediOutpost-2020StarWars6.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20200916202443) 

The Jedi outpost on Tempes

 

Skywalker still maintained that it was his purpose to help a suffering galaxy and believed she could lead him to a lightsaber.
