Although she strongly recommended that Skywalker should leave the Force behind, and insisted that he did not have to follow its will if he did not want to, she informed him of a [Jedi outpost](/wiki/Jedi_outpost_(Tempes) "Jedi outpost (Tempes)") from the [High Republic Era](/wiki/High_Republic_Era "High Republic Era") on the Outer Rim astronomical object of [Tempes](/wiki/Tempes "Tempes") where she had once sought artifacts of the Jedi. Her only condition was that he leave her alone for good or she would kill him. After Skywalker thanked her, she warned him, that she had sensed that Tempes was guarded by a dark presence when she visited it and that it would be smarter for him to run.[[148]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_6_2020-148)

Skywalker [flew](/wiki/Mission_to_Tempes "Mission to Tempes") to Tempes and was almost struck down by the planet's powerful lightning storm. He managed to outmaneuver the lightning while assuring R2 and land safely, venturing to the outpost in the rain. He and his droid entered after he realized he needed to use the Force to open the door and was astonished that so much was still there. He found a new [yellow-bladed lightsaber](/wiki/Luke_Skywalker%27s_yellow_lightsaber "Luke Skywalker's yellow lightsaber") but when he picked it up was attacked by the spirit of the Grand Inquisitor, who had been forced to guard the outpost for eternity by Vader, who had turned the outpost into a trap for Jedi and Force-sensitives. After the Inquisitor introduced himself and ignited his [red double-bladed spinning lightsaber](/wiki/The_Grand_Inquisitor%27s_lightsaber "The Grand Inquisitor's lightsaber") lightsaber, Skywalker resolved to not let him kill a Jedi again and used the yellow lightsaber to enter a duel with the flaming spirit.[[148]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_6_2020-148)

 [![Skywalker is confronted by a spectre of the Grand Inquisitor.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/cf/GrandInquisitorGhost-2020StarWars6.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20200916202702) [![Skywalker is confronted by a spectre of the Grand Inquisitor.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/cf/GrandInquisitorGhost-2020StarWars6.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20200916202702)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/cf/GrandInquisitorGhost-2020StarWars6.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20200916202702) 

Skywalker is confronted by a spectre of the Grand Inquisitor.

 

The Inquisitor taunted the young Jedi's skill with a lightsaber, but Skywalker acknowledged his training was incomplete but also that he was already skilled and would be a Jedi. The Inquisitor ignited both blades of the [lightsaber](/wiki/Double-bladed_spinning_lightsaber "Double-bladed spinning lightsaber") and started destroying the artifacts there, insisting the Jedi Order was a lie that was over. As they fought, he told the Inquisitor that that place was inspiring him to want to be a part of the Jedi Order and fight what they fought for, and that he was beginning to understand loss and sacrifice for what was worth fighting for as they understood it. He cut off the Inquisitor's hand and disarmed him of his saber, before successfully slicing through him and escaping before Vader arrived.[[148]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_6_2020-148)

Skywalker returned to the Rebel fleet and reunited with Organa. Organa implored him to show the assorted rebels what he had found, and so Skywalker activated his new lightsaber, its yellow blade representing renewed hope for the future of the Rebellion.[[148]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_6_2020-148)

Around this time, after a long crusade, Vader discovered that the location where his late wife Padmé Amidala had given birth to Skywalker was Polis Massa and was enraged that his existence had been hidden from him.[[149]](#cite_note-Darth_Vader_(2020)_5-149)

#### Battle at Elessia

:   "*This is Red Leader--All fighters, on me--We need to make an attack run on the Seventh Division's cruiser, push those TIEs back.*"
:   ―Luke Skywalker[[150]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_8-150)

 [![Skywalker's fighters protect Home One](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/7d/BattleAtElessia-2020StarWars8.png/revision/latest?cb=20231120015247) [![Skywalker's fighters protect Home One](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/7d/BattleAtElessia-2020StarWars8.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20231120015247)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/7d/BattleAtElessia-2020StarWars8.png/revision/latest?cb=20231120015247) 

Skywalker's fighters protect *Home One*

 

Somewhere in the Inner Rim, Skywalker and Organa met with Commander [Grek](/wiki/Grek_(commodore) "Grek (commodore)") and instructed him to move forward with their rendezvous with the Seventh Division as part of a plan to strike back against the Empire. C-3PO was concerned that this would alert the Empire to their location, but Skywalker told him that it was about more than just protecting their own lives.[[151]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_7-151)

The Empire's Commander Ellian Zahra intercepted a transmission that revealed the Alliances [Fourth](/wiki/Fourth_Division "Fourth Division") and Seventh Divisions were planning to rendezvous somewhere in the Inner Rim, so Zahra initiated an [attack](/wiki/Battle_at_Elessia "Battle at Elessia") that saw her split her forces to strike simultaneously. Zahra's primary strike force led an attack on the Alliance's Seventh Division, while her secondary strike force attempted to attack Leia Organa's Fourth Division, however the Fourth had already left their rendezvous point before the strike force arrived. The Imperial forces overwhelmed the Seventh Division's capital ships. TIE interceptors created a blockade of *Home One*'s hangar bay, that prevented Alliance starfighters from launching, including Red Squadron.[[150]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_8-150)

 [![All available starfighters launch during a battle at Elessia.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/69/AllSquadronsLaunchBattle-2020StarWars8.png/revision/latest?cb=20231120014725) [![All available starfighters launch during a battle at Elessia.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/69/AllSquadronsLaunchBattle-2020StarWars8.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20231120014725)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/69/AllSquadronsLaunchBattle-2020StarWars8.png/revision/latest?cb=20231120014725) 

All available starfighters launch during a battle at Elessia.

 

Shortly into the battle, the Fourth Division's ships emerged from hyperspace and immediately deployed their starfighters, led by Commander Luke Skywalker, who assumed the callsign Red Leader. Skywalker was accompanied by other starfighters, that included Green Squadron's Shara Bey ([Green Three](/wiki/Green_Three "Green Three")), along with Lando Calrissian and Chewbacca in the *Millennium Falcon*. While fighting, Organa contacted him to check in, Skywalker informing her that the Imperials were pinning down the Seventh Division's cruiser and preventing them from scrambling their fighters. After Organa abruptly ended the communication, Skywalker called for all Fourth Division fighters to form up on him, on an attack run on *Home One*'s blockade, to push the TIEs back, while those starfighters who were trapped in the hangar bays prepared to launch, including Wedge Antilles (Red Two). As soon as Skywalker cleared the TIEs, all the Alliance starfighters aboard *Home One*, including Antilles, launched to repay the favor.[[150]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_8-150)

Skywalker eventually left the space battle to board the frigate where Leia Organa was under attack from an Imperial boarding party, led personally by Zahra. As Zahra threw a sword at Skywalker, which he easily dodged, and then kicked him to the ground, she claimed that she could kill him if she wanted to but was not allowed to because of Vader's plans for him. After Zahra jumped out a window with a jetpack to escape, Skywalker and Organa went to celebratory meeting for successfully regrouping and fending off the Empire. There, Skywalker noticed something was off with Organa, who revealed that she was perturbed by the amount of hate Zahra seemed to have for her.[[150]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_8-150)

#### Searching for Solo

:   "*Apparently there has been a sighting…of the notorious bounty hunter Boba Fett. And since he is possession of the block of frozen carbonite containing out good friend and rebel hero Han Solo, Chewbacca wants you to—*"  
    "*I get it, Threepio. Of course I'll go.*"
:   ―C-3PO and Skywalker[[152]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_13_2020-152)

 [![Luke, C-3PO, and Chewbacca on Nar Shaddaa.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/de/LukeC3POAndChewbaccaOnNarShaddaa-2020StarWars13.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20220331160731) [![Luke, C-3PO, and Chewbacca on Nar Shaddaa.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/de/LukeC3POAndChewbaccaOnNarShaddaa-2020StarWars13.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20220331160731)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/de/LukeC3POAndChewbaccaOnNarShaddaa-2020StarWars13.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20220331160731) 

Luke, C-3PO, and Chewbacca on Nar Shaddaa.

 

Around this time, Vader had his armor damaged during a [mission](/wiki/Mission_to_Exegol "Mission to Exegol"). Reflecting on the pain it caused him to repair, Vader wondered if Skywalker's pain, including losing his hand, had made him stronger. Vader suspected it had not and considered Skywalker weak, believing the fledgling Jedi had not accomplished anything without the help of his friends, who Vader believed he allowed to survive. No longer wishing to turn Skywalker he resolved to kill him, and began his path to do so by searching for Han Solo.[[153]](#cite_note-Darth_Vader_(2020)_12-153) In killing Skywalker Vader believed he would kill Obi-Wan Kenobi's last hope and prove those who thought Skywalker would be his end wrong.[[154]](#cite_note-Darth_Vader_(2020)_13-154) While tracking Solo, Vader's partner, a [Sith assassin](/wiki/Sith_assassin "Sith assassin") named [Ochi](/wiki/Ochi "Ochi"), figured out that Vader planned to lure Skywalker to him with Solo.[[155]](#cite_note-Darth_Vader_(2020)_15-155)

While practicing his lightsaber and Force skills by fighting training remotes, during which he recalled Yoda's training, Skywalker was interrupted by C-3PO, insisting he did not mind the distraction. C-3PO said that R2-D2 wanted to speak with him about something related to Tempes, where he found his new lightsaber. Before R2-D2 could say anything, Chewbacca arrived and revealed, via C-3PO translating, that Boba Fett had been spotted on Nar Shaddaa and urged Skywalker to come with him to rescue Solo from him. Chewbacca shot down Skywalker's suggestion that they bring Calrissian, saying he was not to be trusted and that Solo would not want to see him, but Skywalker agreed. Skywalker, C-3PO, R2-D2, and Chewbacca then took the *Falcon* to Nar Shaddaa, though R2 complained to C-3PO on the way that he had not been able to speak to Skywalker. Skywalker was annoyed that Organa had to stay behind to coordinate [Operation Starlight](/wiki/Operation_Starlight "Operation Starlight") and urged Chewbacca to ensure the mission would be quick, recalling how awful he found the planet and what had happened with Grakkus the Hutt.[[152]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_13_2020-152)

On the planet, Skywalker watched as Chewbacca met with his contact [Sagwa](/wiki/Sagwa "Sagwa"), C-3PO explaining that he and Chewbacca used to be old friends and translating that Sagwa believed a new victor in the [Garkata Fighting Arena](/wiki/Garkata_Fighting_Arena "Garkata Fighting Arena") was Boba Fett. Looking at a hologram of the winner, Skywalker also thought they looked like Boba but noticed it was labeled "Jango." Skywalker spoke with a [Pa'lowick attendant](/wiki/Unidentified_Pa%27lowick_attendant "Unidentified Pa'lowick attendant") at the Arena to get information on "Jango" but was annoyed by both the [Pa'lowick](/wiki/Pa%27lowick "Pa'lowick")'s refusal to answer questions without payment and C-3PO spouting the mottos of Nar Shaddaa. The attendant, suspecting they were friends of "Jango," used an alarm to call the [Kanji](/wiki/Kanji_Criminal_Enterprise "Kanji Criminal Enterprise") gang, who were upset that "Jango" had defeated their fighter in the arena. Using his lightsaber to fight back against the thugs, who attacked despite Skywalker's warnings, Skywalker and the others fled, though Chewbacca was reluctant to because they had not found much information. Following Sagwa through the streets before stealing and fleeing on a speeder, they encountered many more groups of Kanji that Skywalker fended off with the Force and his lightsaber until R2-D2 picked them up in the *Falcon*. However, some of the Kanji planned to report seeing Skywalker to Imperials on [Vandor](/wiki/Vandor "Vandor").[[152]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_13_2020-152)

Afterward, R2 finally gave his message to Skywalker via C-3PO, revealing that he had found a list of former Jedi outposts across the galaxy in his databanks that he seemingly acquired on the Death Star. This greatly excited Skywalker, who eagerly wanted to learn more, feeling like the Force was providing for him and making R2 list the locations for him immediately. Sagwa then entered with a message, C-3PO translating, in which he revealed that Organa had received a message from an unknown party claiming to be in possession of Solo.[[152]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_13_2020-152) Though Organa was starting to lose hope,

#### Ab Dalis

:   "*Approaching the target. Looks like a…*vent *of some kind, maybe. I see them, Artoo. TIEs on our six. Trying to hit a target the size of a bantha's eye…feels like old times.*"
:   ―Skywalker, to Starlight Squadron and R2-D2[[156]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_15_2020-156)

 [![Skywalker and Starlight Squadron approach Ab Dalis.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/8d/AbDalis-2020StarWars15.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20210731060929) [![Skywalker and Starlight Squadron approach Ab Dalis.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/8d/AbDalis-2020StarWars15.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20210731060929)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/8d/AbDalis-2020StarWars15.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20210731060929) 

Skywalker and Starlight Squadron approach Ab Dalis.

 

Skywalker and the others met up with Organa, who told them that Fett did not have Solo anymore and that he was going to be sold in a [auction](/wiki/Auction_for_Han_Solo "Auction for Han Solo") in the attendance of most of the galaxy's crime syndicates on [Jekara](/wiki/Jekara "Jekara").[[157]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_14_2020-157) Though Organa was starting to lose hope, Skywalker assured her that they would find him.[[158]](#cite_note-War_of_the_Bounty_Hunters_1-158) After Organa revealed Solo was in the possession of [Crimson Dawn](/wiki/Crimson_Dawn "Crimson Dawn"), who Chewbacca remembered was an extremely powerful criminal organization he had dealt with before, Skywalker expressed his concerns to Organa about her taking on this mission, claiming that she had not been herself recently and had not been acting from the heart. Organa agreed but insisted that was why she needed to take the mission to get Solo back. Later Skywalker joined Antilles and [Starlight Squadron](/wiki/Starlight_Squadron "Starlight Squadron") in his X-wing, having promised he would join them for a patrol, but assured Organa he would join her on Jekara soon.[[157]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_14_2020-157)

Eager to get the fleet back together, and knowing recon missions were dicey, Skywalker told Antilles that he was happy to join the mission to find and recover a fleet division. Hoping to boost pilot [L'ulo L'ampar](/wiki/L%27ulo_L%27ampar "L'ulo L'ampar")'s morale, he also revealed to the squadron that the Alliance was close to recovering Captain Solo. After traveling through hyperspace to [Ab Dalis](/wiki/Ab_Dalis "Ab Dalis"), [Freyta Smyth](/wiki/Freyta_Smyth "Freyta Smyth") and Antilles explained that it was chosen as a rebel rendezvous point because it was abandoned after a [cataclysmic impact](/wiki/First_Emergence "First Emergence") make it tectonically unstable hundreds of years earlier. [Mart Mattin](/wiki/Mart_Mattin "Mart Mattin") and Skywalker then received a broken transmission, which R2 unscrambled, revealing it was from the [Eleventh Division](/wiki/Eleventh_Division "Eleventh Division") of the [Rendezvous Point Lambda-Four](/wiki/Rendezvous_Point_Lambda-Four "Rendezvous Point Lambda-Four") at Ab Dalis who were being attacked by Imperial forces. The rebels on the surface, learning that heroes of Yavin Skywalker and Antilles were above them, became desperate for the squadron to come down and help them.[[156]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_15_2020-156)

 [![Skywalker and Starlight Squadron destroy a Star Destroyer above Ab Dalis.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ec/AbDalisEruption-2020StarWars15.png/revision/latest?cb=20240328073951) [![Skywalker and Starlight Squadron destroy a Star Destroyer above Ab Dalis.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ec/AbDalisEruption-2020StarWars15.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20240328073951)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ec/AbDalisEruption-2020StarWars15.png/revision/latest?cb=20240328073951) 

Skywalker and Starlight Squadron destroy a Star Destroyer above Ab Dalis.

 

Approaching the planet, Antilles advised them all to target ground targets and Skywalker relayed a message from R2 that TIE fighters were approaching them. Hearing that Skywalker, who had made the trench run on the Death Star was among the fighters, one Rebel who had conducted a geological survey of the planet sent coordinates to the squadron for a ground target beneath the Star Destroyer. They were unsure about what the target was, but after scanning and determining it was a tunnel that could have been hiding someone important, Antilles sent Skywalker to hit it, comparing it to making the Death Star run. Skywalker started to make the run while the others kept TIEs off of him, feeling like he was making the Death Star run again, but he started to have a flashback to the battle of Yavin that instead ended with Vader taking down the *Falcon* and saying he would claim Solo for himself, disturbing Skywalker and causing him to miss the target. However, the rest of Starlight Squadron were on the same vector and were able to hit it, triggering a volcanic explosion that destroyed the Star Destroyer that attacked the Eleventh Division. Afterward, Skywalker apologized for missing the shot, before the others realized they had rescued Mon Mothma. Skywalker then told Antilles that he was going to Jekara to help Organa.[[156]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_15_2020-156)

#### Auction of Han Solo

##### Haunted

:   "*Leia, I don't know if you're receiving this, but I had…a vision, I guess. I think the Force was trying to tell me something. I think…I think Vader's coming after Han.*"
:   ―Skywalker, in a message to Organa[[156]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_15_2020-156)

 [![Skywalker imagines fighting Darth Vader on Cloud City with his yellow lightsaber.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/6f/LukeVaderDuel-2020StarWars16.png/revision/latest?cb=20240328064925) [![Skywalker imagines fighting Darth Vader on Cloud City with his yellow lightsaber.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/6f/LukeVaderDuel-2020StarWars16.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20240328064925)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/6f/LukeVaderDuel-2020StarWars16.png/revision/latest?cb=20240328064925) 

Skywalker imagines fighting Darth Vader on Cloud City with his yellow lightsaber.

 

Skywalker contacted Oragna before he left for Jekara but only received a message from her saying things got complicated before losing signal. Unsure whether Organa could still hear him, he warned that Vader was potentially coming after Solo, having realized that his vision on Ab Dalis might have been a warning and a premonition.[[156]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_15_2020-156) This premonition also made him panic as he did not believe he could beat him. In hyperspace on the way to Jekara, Skywalker recalled fighting Vader on Cloud City and the Sith Lord's utter brutality, strength, and ineffable power, likening it to a [gravel storm](/wiki/Gravel_storm "Gravel storm"). Imagining himself as he was at that moment fighting Vader on Cloud City with his yellow lightsaber, Skywalker began to believe he could be a storm too, but then just thought he was kidding himself and that Yoda and Vader had been right about him. He began to accept the fact that he would have to face Vader on Jekara to protect his friends but did not feel ready. Desperate for guidance, he tried to reach out to the Force to speak to Kenobi, but his fear made it difficult to access.[[159]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_16_2020-159)

Just as he was about to exit hyperspace, Organa asked Skywalker for help in distracting Vader because the Sith Lord arrived at the auction, but he was quickly occupied dealing with Vader's Super Star Destroyer the *Executor* that was over Jekara. Overwhelmed, Skywalker fought off various TIE fighters before leading them close to and getting their shots to hit the ship of one of the crime syndicates present at the auction, the [Son-tuul Pride](/wiki/Son-tuul_Pride "Son-tuul Pride"), which made the syndicate retaliate against the Empire as Skywalker hoped it would. Finally given a window to approach the planet, he told Organa he was approaching as she told him to hurry. However, the Imperials established a secure channel between him and Vader, who had sensed that he was there in the Force. Vader threatened to kill the frozen Han if he did not arrive to face him,[[159]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_16_2020-159) while imagining fighting Skywalker and thinking that he would not be a father to him or let him hide behind his friends.[[160]](#cite_note-Darth_Vader_(2020)_16-160) After hearing the message, Skywalker, haunted by the image of his current self being killed by Vader on Cloud City, decided he was not ready to face him and turned his X-wing around.[[159]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_16_2020-159)

##### The chase

:   "*He's* not *trying to* kill *us. We'll lead him out into* space *and— All right…M-maybe he* is *trying to kill us!*"
:   ―Skywalker, to R2-D2[[160]](#cite_note-Darth_Vader_(2020)_16-160)

As he left, Skywalker explained to Organa his belief that Vader wanted to turn him, and that if he fought Vader, he would kill them too.[[160]](#cite_note-Darth_Vader_(2020)_16-160) He told her he would help from his ship and then taunted Vader, urging the Sith Lord to pursue him. Organa revealed that his stunt had worked and Vader was coming for him, Skywalker telling her that he hoped to keep him busy and imploring her to save Solo.[[161]](#cite_note-War_of_the_Bounty_Hunters_4-161) As he assured Organa he would be fine, the [starship](/wiki/Unidentified_criminal_group%27s_starship "Unidentified criminal group's starship") of a [criminal group](/wiki/Unidentified_criminal_group "Unidentified criminal group") [harpooned](/wiki/Magna-harpoon "Magna-harpoon") his fighter and started to pull him in. He was freed by laser blast's from Vader's TIE fighter.[[160]](#cite_note-Darth_Vader_(2020)_16-160) As the two engaged in a dogfight, Organa contacted Skywalker again, who simply repeated his earlier sentiments and said he needed to focus.[[161]](#cite_note-War_of_the_Bounty_Hunters_4-161) He then tried to lure Vader into open space, believing the Sith Lord did not want to kill him, but Vader shot his X-wing anyway, Skywalker realizing that Vader did want to kill him as he crash-landed on Jekara.[[160]](#cite_note-Darth_Vader_(2020)_16-160)

After urging R2-D2 to repair the ship quickly, he used a blaster to shoot at Vader's TIE fighter as it approached. However, Imperial [Administrator](/wiki/Administrator "Administrator") [Sly Moore](/wiki/Sly_Moore "Sly Moore"), who had been tasked with killing Vader dropped a droid gang she hired called the [Droid Crush Pirates of Bestoon](/wiki/Droid_Crush_Pirates_of_Bestoon "Droid Crush Pirates of Bestoon") onto Vader's TIE and near Skywalker. Skywalker initally ignited his lightsaber and acted defensively, but the droids instead fixed his fighter, leaving Skywalker confused. Skywalker, accepting of the help, flew away with Droid Crush members riding his wing and shooting at Vader.[[160]](#cite_note-Darth_Vader_(2020)_16-160)

 [![Skywalker is chased by Darth Vader during the auction for Han Solo.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/64/SW17-unlettered-cover.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20220331165631) [![Skywalker is chased by Darth Vader during the auction for Han Solo.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/64/SW17-unlettered-cover.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20220331165631)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/64/SW17-unlettered-cover.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20220331165631) 

Skywalker is chased by Darth Vader during the auction for Han Solo.

 

Opting to fly away to the planet's [Polar Sea](/wiki/Polar_Sea_(Jekara) "Polar Sea (Jekara)") to get Vader to follow him, Skywalker briefly thought he had lost Vader until Vader's TIE fighter emerged from the water beneath him. Vader taunted him, saying his increased strength in the Force would not save him and that he had Solo, so he would not be saving Skywalker either. Noticing how quickly the sea's water was freezing, Skywalker trapped Vader in the ice by making a giant wave of water with his X-wing and leading Vader into it when it quickly froze. Despite having the perfect opportunity to shoot at and kill Vader, Skywalker could not do it after what he had revealed at Cloud City, but knew he would eventually need to face him. Skywalker reached out to Organa on the *Falcon* who explained that they and the Imperial shuttle had been hit by a blast that had immobilized them, meaning they could not reach Solo but Solo could not be taken to the flagship. Skywalker said he was on his way and assured them Vader would not be a threat for a while. With Hutt fighters now chasing the shuttle with Solo on it, Organa tried to get Skywalker to help, but Vader emerged from the ice in his TIE fighter and dragged Skywalker back into a fight, so Skywalker told her he could not help.[[162]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_17_2020-162)

Vader soon chased Skywalker back into space. With Vader reveling in making Skywalker feel fear due to his friends lives being put in danger, Skywalker cried out as the shuttle containing Solo was fired at by Hutt and Imperial fighters.[[160]](#cite_note-Darth_Vader_(2020)_16-160) Thankfully, Vader was soon ordered by the Emperor to assist with a Hutt attack that was happening against the Empire, which forced the Sith Lord to leave his son behind, not before reminding Skywalker that he was no Jedi. Skywalker insisted that when they met again he would be a Jedi.[[163]](#cite_note-War_of_the_Bounty_Hunters_5-163) Vader resented having to leave but was proud of terrifying Skywalker, recognizing that the Emperor wanted Skywalker to live and was orchestrating things so that it could be the case.[[164]](#cite_note-Darth_Vader_(2020)_17-164) During his confrontation with Vader, Organa and the rest failed to rescue Han Solo, who was captured by Boba Fett once again after the auction.[[163]](#cite_note-War_of_the_Bounty_Hunters_5-163)

#### In search of Jedi secrets

:   "*I know I'm needed here, Leia. But I can't help but think I should be following that path, trying to grow as a Jedi. I'll have to face Vader eventually. […] I need to find a way to finish my training…and soon.*"
:   ―Luke Skywalker to Leia Organa[[165]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_19-165)

After the breakout of the [Syndicate War](/wiki/Syndicate_War "Syndicate War"), the Rebel Alliance had a meeting with many of its leaders that Luke Skywalker was present for. As Admiral Ackbar discussed the Alliance's next moves in its rebuilding effort, Leia Organa noticed that Skywalker was distant. He explained that R2-D2 had given him a list of possible Jedi sites across the galaxy from an Imperial archive. He expressed that he knew he was needed by the Alliance, but that he felt like he should be trying to continue growing as a Jedi. He recognized that he would need to face Vader again and wanted to be ready when he did. Organa told him that it was okay and that he should trust what the Force was telling him, offering to smooth things over with Mon Mothma and telling him that they could fight the battles without him for now.[[165]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_19-165)

 [![Luke Skywalker consults a list of Jedi sites.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/92/LukeJediLocationsList-2020StarWars19.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20220511171720) [![Luke Skywalker consults a list of Jedi sites.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/92/LukeJediLocationsList-2020StarWars19.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/300?cb=20220511171720)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/92/LukeJediLocationsList-2020StarWars19.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20220511171720) 

Luke Skywalker consults a list of Jedi sites.

 

Skywalker consulted R2-D2 for the list of Jedi sites and worried that since it was an imperial list all of the places would have been destroyed or looted. But he recognized that he needed to keep going if he was going to face Vader, though he wished Master Yoda would talk to him. Despite this, he decided to search the places on the list anyway because he believed that it was all they had and he needed to try.[[165]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_19-165)

He visited the planet [Ilum](/wiki/Ilum "Ilum") first and discovered the mass imperial blockade and presence there and the Empire's exploitation of the planet. He felt in the Force that the planet was important, but also felt that now only held pain as the Empire was killing it more and more every day. He believed there was nothing for him there and he and R2-D2 used the weather of the planet to leave and slip past the blockade. He visited [Arashar](/wiki/Arashar "Arashar") next, but only orbited it as it had a massive orbital Imperial presence and he did not think he could get by it. He then visited [Lothal](/wiki/Lothal "Lothal"), and traveled to the former location of the [Lothal Jedi Temple](/wiki/Lothal_Jedi_Temple "Lothal Jedi Temple"). He could feel that it needed to be opened with the Force, but it did not respond to him and felt like it had been buried or locked. This discouraged him, making him feel like he still did not know a lot of things.[[165]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_19-165)

#### A legacy on Al'doleem

:   "*A Jedi saved my life once. Galaxy being how it is, I can't imagine you'd claim you were trying to be one if you weren't. I've wanted to repay that debt my whole life. You're probably as close as I'll ever get.*"
:   ―Colli to Luke Skywalker[[165]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_19-165)

He finally traveled to the river moon of [Al'doleem](/wiki/Al%27doleem "Al'doleem") and decided to visit it because it did not have an Imperial blockade and was not being destroyed. He flew [Mount Pasvaal](/wiki/Mount_Pasvaal "Mount Pasvaal") as was encouraged by the sight of something important there without much guarding. He landed in the ruins of [Am'balaar City](/wiki/Am%27balaar_City "Am'balaar City"), after seeing that it had been rebuilt some after a [Dam collapse](/wiki/Mission_to_Al%27doleem "Mission to Al'doleem"). He told R2-D2 that they would head into town, but he did not want to draw attention as one of the Empire's biggest targets. He walked up to two stormtroopers and tried to perform a Jedi mind trick on them that Yoda had taught him and he had seen Obi-Wan Kenobi do, asking the troopers to tell him what the Empire was doing at the top of the mountain, but the mind trick failed and the troopers merely told him to move along.[[165]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_19-165)

Skywalker and R2-D2 aimlessly wandered the city until R2 noticed a hull panel from a [Delta-7 Aethersprite-class light interceptor](/wiki/Delta-7_Aethersprite-class_light_interceptor "Delta-7 Aethersprite-class light interceptor") and stopped him. Skywalker did not understand until a man named [Colli](/wiki/Colli "Colli") walked out and told Skywalker that he was surprised he did not know but bet he had other people fix his starships. Colli explained that the Jedi flew Delta-7 Aethersprites in the Clone Wars. Colli told Skywalker to come inside, as he had noticed the lightsaber on his belt, and warned that if he had others might have too. Colli asked him if he was really a Jedi, to which Skywalker explained that he was trying to be. Colli told him that he had known a Jedi named [Kirak Infil'a](/wiki/Kirak_Infil%27a "Kirak Infil'a") who had worked in the [monastery](/wiki/Al%27doleem_Jedi_monastery "Al'doleem Jedi monastery") on top of Mount Pasvaal and had allowed him and his sister to escape in his Aetherspire when the city was attacked and destroyed. He explained that both Infil'a and his parents had died. Colli asked Skywalker about his story, but R2-D2 tried to stop him from saying anything. Colli insisted that he was not going to turn them into the Imperials and that helping Skywalker would probably be the closest he could get to repaying his debt to the Jedi that saved him. Skywalker said that he needed to learn as much about the Jedi as he could from what of their legacy remained and that he believed the mountain that Infil'a had come from was connected to the Order and that he wanted to figure out what the Empire was looking for there.[[165]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_19-165)

 [![Luke Skywalker finds a recording of Yoda in a holocron.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/66/LukeYodaHolocron-2020StarWars19.png/revision/latest?cb=20240327161603) [![Luke Skywalker finds a recording of Yoda in a holocron.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/66/LukeYodaHolocron-2020StarWars19.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20240327161603)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/66/LukeYodaHolocron-2020StarWars19.png/revision/latest?cb=20240327161603) 

Luke Skywalker finds a recording of Yoda in a holocron.

 

Colli took Skywalker to the Monastery at the top of the mountain, but explained that there were also tunnels and chambers in the mountain that the Jedi had used and that the Empire was bringing artifacts out of it all the time. Skywalker considered using his lightsaber and the Force to let go and cut right through the Imperial forces in his way but could not bring himself to do it and instead gave his lightsaber to R2 for safekeeping. He went and meditated with the Force on the side of the mountain before returning to the warehouse where Colli had told him the Empire stored the artifacts they found in the mountain. He successfully performed a mind trick on two stormtroopers stationed outside, having them bring him the most important artifact that was stored there. They brought him a holocron, which Luke recognized from his experience with Grakkus the Hutt. He reached out with the Force to unlock it as he had learned how to do and found a recording of Master Yoda teaching lessons.[[165]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_19-165) Skywalker was disappointed, however, that the lesson Yoda taught in the holocron was one that he had already taught him back on Dagobah. Burdened by the series of setbacks he had faced recently, Skywalker considered dropping the holocron off of a cliff, but was stopped by R2. Skywalker opened the holocron again, and this time Yoda discussed [Vergences](/wiki/Vergence "Vergence") in the Force, listing the Jedi Temple on Coruscant, Jedha, and the [Living Sea](/wiki/Living_Sea "Living Sea") of [Gazian](/wiki/Gazian "Gazian") as examples. Luke had never heard of the Living Sea of Gazian and decided to go to the planet to check it out.[[166]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_20-166)

#### The Living Sea of Gazian

:   "*I'm going to tell you what the other Jedi you've met haven't. Even Yoda. You don't have to be a Jedi, friend. […] There are many other paths. The important thing is to make choices that feel right, that are true to you and the person you want to be. But if you want it, we're here for you.*"
:   ―Elzar Mann to Luke Skywalker[[166]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_20-166)

 [![Elzar Mann appeared to Luke Skywalker in the Living Sea of Gazian.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/c2/ElzarMannOnGazian-2020StarWars20.png/revision/latest?cb=20240325155656) [![Elzar Mann appeared to Luke Skywalker in the Living Sea of Gazian.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/c2/ElzarMannOnGazian-2020StarWars20.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20240325155656)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/c2/ElzarMannOnGazian-2020StarWars20.png/revision/latest?cb=20240325155656) 

Elzar Mann appeared to Luke Skywalker in the Living Sea of Gazian.

 

Arriving in the [Gazian system](/wiki/Gazian_system "Gazian system"), Luke was excited by the possibility of finding a Jedi-related site that the Empire did not know about. He landed on a platform he found on the planet, but was disappointed to only find a sea of mushrooms. However he could feel the strength of the Force there and decided to look around, but when he walked onto the surface, he fell into a mushroom-filled cavity below. His breath mask was pulled off of him and he went unconscious, starting to have a vision where he was wearing the clothes he wore during the Duel on Cloud City and was in possession of the Skywalker lightsaber. He then saw a man in High Republic Era Jedi robes sitting next to him, who then took the Skywalker lightsaber with Force and admired it, comparing it to his own. Skywalker held up a blaster and told the man to give it back. He acquiesced but commented that he was not scared of the blaster. The man introduced himself as Jedi Master [Elzar Mann](/wiki/Elzar_Mann "Elzar Mann"). He asked Skywalker if he was a Jedi, to which Skywalker said that he was trying to be but was still learning about the Force and trying to understand it. Mann told him that that never really stops, as the Jedi Order goes back a long way and there was a lot to learn.[[166]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_20-166)

Just then, their surroundings shifted to [Ahch-To](/wiki/Ahch-To "Ahch-To"), the birthplace of the Jedi. Skywalker asked Mann what exactly was going on. Mann explained that Gazian was a gigantic living organism that takes an imprint of the minds that visit it and reproduces them exactly as they were at the moment they were there. Mann added that he had come to the planet to get answers after having a vision, and that was why his imprint was there. Skywalker explained that the Republic had fallen and an Empire had taken over. He said that he had never met a Jedi like Mann, and had only ever met Obi-Wan Kenobi and Yoda, the latter of whom Mann remembered and commented was very old and very wise. Skywalker had also said that he had met a Jedi named Anakin Skywalker, but that he had fallen to the Dark side, something that Mann knew happened occasionally.[[166]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_20-166)

 [![Elzar Mann and Luke Skywalker speak in an imprint of Ahch-To.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/b9/AhchToGazianImprint-2020StarWars20.png/revision/latest?cb=20240325155606) [![Elzar Mann and Luke Skywalker speak in an imprint of Ahch-To.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/b9/AhchToGazianImprint-2020StarWars20.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/300?cb=20240325155606)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/b9/AhchToGazianImprint-2020StarWars20.png/revision/latest?cb=20240325155606) 

Elzar Mann and Luke Skywalker speak in an imprint of Ahch-To.

 

Mann then showed Skywalker an imprint of what the High Republic looked like, telling him that it was a Golden Age where they were all connected eight centuries after the defeat of [Darth Bane](/wiki/Darth_Bane "Darth Bane"). The mention of Darth Bane made Skywalker confused and comment that it was all too much. Skywalker elaborated that when he started his journey it was exciting and he had been a hero, then he was supposed to save the galaxy by learning from Yoda, but then it all fell apart and now he felt that if he did it wrong he would become a monster. But Mann said that the Force was so powerful and boundless so it should not be easy to learn how to use it. Mann recalled when he had trained to be a Jedi and how even with help and support how impossible everything felt. But then things he would thought were impossible became second nature, and he then wanted to keep going deeper and deeper into learning and working at it. But Skywalker was alone, and felt that it was too much. Mann said that the Jedi tend to be what they need to be, whether that be warriors fighting evil, teachers teaching the galaxy, and sometimes they were almost nothing, left with the responsibility of being the only light in the dark of the galaxy. Suddenly they were underwater, floating in an expansive ocean. Mann then told Skywalker that he knew the kind of pressure that the Force choosing you could bring, and decided to tell him a piece of advice that he did not think many other Jedi would tell him: He did not have to be a Jedi. Mann told him that there were other ways to use the Force safely and protect life and light, and that there are many paths and choices that could be true to the person he wanted to be. But he also told Skywalker that if he wanted it, the Jedi were there for him. Other past Jedi then appeared in the water and floated around them until they found themselves back in the void-like vision of the Living Sea. He asked Skywalker if he wanted to stay there and speak to him and the many minds in the Living Sea, but Skywalker told him that he thought he should leave. Mann was disappointed, but reminded Skywalker that a part of him would remain there to talk to them as Skywalker saw an imprint of himself appear in front of him.[[166]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_20-166)

Skywalker came to, ignited his lightsaber, and put his breath mask back on. He then saw many bodies of Jedi that had stayed in the Living Sea. He found one Jedi skeleton holding a [sacred Jedi text](/wiki/Unidentified_sacred_Jedi_text "Unidentified sacred Jedi text"), which he brought to the surface and recognized was an invitation.[[166]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_20-166)

Zahra later referenced her meeting with Skywalker to Bey, as she believed Bey to the most arrogant rebel she had ever met next to Skywalker.[[167]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_21-167)

#### Unity Day attack

:   "*This is amazing."  
    "We've earned it. It's been a long time since we had a solid win. Not a single casualty. You planned one heck of mission, Leia.*"
:   ―Organa and Skywalker during the celebration after the Unity Day attack[[168]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_26-168)

 [![The Unity Day parade](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d4/UnityDayParade-2020StarWars26.png/revision/latest?cb=20240116124251) [![The Unity Day parade](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d4/UnityDayParade-2020StarWars26.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20240116124251)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d4/UnityDayParade-2020StarWars26.png/revision/latest?cb=20240116124251) 

The Unity Day parade

 

After he returned to the Alliance, Skywalker took part in an [attack](/wiki/Unity_Day_attack "Unity Day attack") on the Imperial Unity Day Parade on [Bar'leth](/wiki/Bar%27leth "Bar'leth"), one of the Rebels' first large scale operations since the Battle of Hoth. Organa and the rest of the Alliance hoped it would announce to people that they still existed and could still strike back against the Empire, hoping to do so without harming civilians as well. Skywalker flew in his X-Wing as part of Red Squadron during the attack. After destroying the Empire's vast artillery on display in the parade, Skywalker told the others over comm that R2-D2 had detected a wave of TIE fighters launching from a nearby Imperial airbase outside of the city and suggested they leave. Wedge Antilles, flying as Red Leader, acknowledged Skywalker and told everyone to follow him, leading all of the Alliance fighters to a successful escape.[[168]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_26-168)

Afterward, Skywalker participated in a toast to the Rebel Alliance lead by Antilles before having a drink and sitting down. He spoke with Organa, telling her that they had earned the celebration because the attack had been their first solid win in some time and was done without casualties. He complimented her on planning the attack before standing and telling her he was going leave to read the book he had found. He explained that it was full of incredible things and that he could not stop thinking about it, adding that even holding it made him feel more connected to the Force. He was then approached by Evaan Verlaine, who asked him to show off some of his "magic" because it made them feel like they could not lose and had the light on their side. He was reluctant to do so because it made him feel like a show-off, but he agreed, igniting his yellow lightsaber. Verlaine called it magic while many looked on in awe.[[168]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_26-168)

#### The second Death Star revealed

:   "*Luke…what is it? What do you need to tell us?*"  
    "*The Empire's building another Death Star.*"  
    "*If we could do it once…we can do it again. Let's get to work.*"
:   ―Mon Mothma and Luke Skywalker[[169]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_28-169)

 [![Luke Skywalker asked Hera Syndulla about their fifth intelligence hit, feeling like it could work out well.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/7b/LukeGoodFeeling-2020StarWars27.png/revision/latest?cb=20230801043018) [![Luke Skywalker asked Hera Syndulla about their fifth intelligence hit, feeling like it could work out well.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/7b/LukeGoodFeeling-2020StarWars27.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20230801043018)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/7b/LukeGoodFeeling-2020StarWars27.png/revision/latest?cb=20230801043018) 

Luke Skywalker asked Hera Syndulla about their fifth intelligence hit, feeling like it could work out well.

 

Meanwhile, Crimson Dawn agents [Bevelyn](/wiki/Bevelyn "Bevelyn") and [Jon Melton](/wiki/Jon_Melton "Jon Melton") received a message from Lady [Qi'ra](/wiki/Qi%27ra "Qi'ra") instructing them to cause chaos for the Empire. Because they were deep undercover at the Empire's secret [Death Star II](/wiki/DS-2_Death_Star_II_Mobile_Battle_Station "DS-2 Death Star II Mobile Battle Station"), they decided that they should expose the facility to the Rebel Alliance.[[168]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_26-168) They managed to escape with their children and get a message to the Rebels telling them that they had top secret Imperial weapons information they would give in exchange for protection, but they were not taken seriously until it was presented by General [Hera Syndulla](/wiki/Hera_Syndulla "Hera Syndulla") at an intelligence briefing that Skywalker was present at among many other intelligence hits. Skywalker asked about it and Syndulla explained to him what it was, though she wondered if something about it stood out to him. While Skywalker was unsure, he said had good feeling about it.[[170]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_27-170)

Later, in a separate room, Syndulla asked Skywalker if he truly believed there was something significant about the defectors and wondered if he was sensing something due to his connection with the Force. Luke said that he has learned everything is connected to the Force, Syndulla responding that he sounded like [Kanan Jarrus](/wiki/Kanan_Jarrus "Kanan Jarrus"), her late Jedi lover. Skywalker asked if that was a good thing, and she said it usually was. Commodore [Grek](/wiki/Grek_(commodore) "Grek (commodore)") decided that anything that Skywalker thought was worth looking into was worth looking into and had someone look up information about the case to walk Skywalker through it. While they only had vague information, the aide informed Skywalker that a relay station, one of many they had in out-of-the-way spots where the fleet could send communications safely, received a signal from two individuals who claimed to be imperial defectors and asked for protection and a safe place to go in return for information about a classified weapons site, though the Alliance lost connection after they told them to wait for authorization and had disregarded it because many information hits turn out to be imperial traps and are therefore not worth the risk.[[169]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_28-169)

They had also taken the shuttle's signature and learned that the defectors had escaped in an Imperial shuttle called the *[Scopium](/wiki/Scopium "Scopium")* and discovered right then while checking the databases that the Empire had put a system-wide alert on the shuttle, suggesting the defectors' legitimacy. Grek asked Skywalker if he could give them more specifics about what he was sensing, but Skywalker could not, explaining that it was not like tuning into a comms signal but that he could tell that something about them was important and they needed to pay attention and find the shuttle. They discovered that the last place the shuttle's signal had popped up was on Coruscant, and so Skywalker suggested he go there. Grek and Syndulla told him it was a bad idea, the former reminding him that the Emperor lives there and the latter suggesting that they send pathfinders to mount a rescue mission but not him because he was too valuable, there were bounties for him across the galaxy, and because he was the only Jedi they had.[[169]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_28-169)

 [![Skywalker disguises himself as an Imperial officer on Coruscant](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/e3/SW28-Textless-cover.png/revision/latest?cb=20230731232112) [![Skywalker disguises himself as an Imperial officer on Coruscant](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/e3/SW28-Textless-cover.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20230731232112)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/e3/SW28-Textless-cover.png/revision/latest?cb=20230731232112) 

Skywalker disguises himself as an Imperial officer on Coruscant

 

Skywalker understood but reminded them that their spies had confirmed that the Emperor and Vader were off-world, even confirming it with the aide who said they were on Vader's flagship in the Mid Rim and that he could do things that others could not, so what was risky for others was not risky for him, demonstrating his point by performing a mind trick on Grek and getting him to repeat what he said. Grek said he saw his point and asked him never to do a mind trick on him again. Syndulla emphasized that Coruscant was the most dangerous place for a Rebel to be in the galaxy and asked if he had a plan. Skywalker said he had the start of a plan which was to hide the fact that he was a rebel by dressing as an Imperial.[[169]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_28-169)

Skywalker eventually arrived in [the Works](/wiki/The_Works "The Works") District of Coruscant, two Rebel agents seeing him off. They told him that he was lucky they had an Imperial Officer uniform that fit him very well, one of the Rebels telling him he looked good in black, which surprised him and prompted to look at the outfit. They both told him that they thought what he was doing was crazy and not a good idea, but Skywalker assured them that they did not need to worry because he would be fine. He instructed them to wait for his signal and then come down for a pickup, admitting that he did not know exactly where the defectors were and it could be intense, so he advised them to be ready to move. He then gave them his lightsaber to hold on to, which surprised them, clarifying that it was better to leave it with them because he would be tempted to use it if he had it and and if people saw it they would report the Jedi bounty and he would be swarmed with Imperials. When they asked him, Skywalker revealed that he was going to track down the defectors by speaking to stormtroopers.[[169]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_28-169)

Eventually Skywalker tracked the Meltons to a sewer, but they immediately started shooting at him until he told them he was there to help and was with was with the Alliance, forcing him to use the Force to jump around the sewer to dodge the blasts. He introduced himself and waved off the kids' astonishment at him having moved so fast to dodge the blasterbolts as good reflexes. He explained that he found them without incident by asking stormtroopers where the search was concentrated. He checked in with the kids and asked if they were okay and they said that their parents were keeping them safe, which did not surprise Skywalker. [Coruscant Police](/wiki/Coruscant_Security_Force "Coruscant Security Force") then arrived, and Skywalker told them to stand down and that he would take it from there, but they questioned this as they had not been told any officers would be down there and asked him for authorization. Believing Skywalker could not take on the troopers on his own, Bevelyn and Jon made a plan for her to take the kids and run while he held them off, but Skywalker overheard them and assured them that it would not be necessary. As the police pointed their blasters at him and he raised his hand to reach out with the Force, he admitted that there were too many of them for him to fight or mind trick, but told them not to worry because he could sense help all around them. He then used the Force to call down many [Corridor ghouls](/wiki/Corridor_ghoul "Corridor ghoul"), beastly creatures that lived beneath Coruscant, down through the ceiling of the sewer and had them attack the Police, Skywalker saying "told you" to the Meltons as they took the opportunity to run away and escape.[[169]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_28-169)

 [![Skywalker reveals that the Empire is building another Death Star to the Rebel Alliance leadership](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/30/LukeRevealsDeathStarII-2020StarWars28.png/revision/latest?cb=20231105153423) [![Skywalker reveals that the Empire is building another Death Star to the Rebel Alliance leadership](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/30/LukeRevealsDeathStarII-2020StarWars28.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20231105153423)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/30/LukeRevealsDeathStarII-2020StarWars28.png/revision/latest?cb=20231105153423) 

Skywalker reveals that the Empire is building another Death Star to the Rebel Alliance leadership

 

Skywalker got the Meltons back safely for them to debrief their intelligence people, but they talked to him on the way. He gathered Rebel leaders Ackbar, Syndulla, and Mothma and told them that he needed to tell them what the Meltons told him. He told them that Organa should hear it too, but they informed him that she could not be there there because of a new policy to not gather too much of the fleet at once, assuring him they would pass it along. Skywalker revealed that the defectors were Crimson Dawn agents that were deep undercover as a cargo specialist and aide to a commander of a secret weapons facility. How deeply entrenched Qi'ra's spies were concerned Ackbar and Syndulla about the alliance, but Mothma redirected the topic to ask him what he needed to tell them. Skywalker revealed that the Empire was building another Death Star. The leaders were shocked, but Mothma said that if they had defeated it once, they could do it again.[[169]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_28-169)

At some point after this, Skywalker sensed the activation and attempted opening of the [Fermata Cage](/wiki/Fermata_Cage "Fermata Cage"), an ancient Sith device, by members of Crimson Dawn.[[171]](#cite_note-Hidden_Empire_2-171)

#### Search for the *Kezarat* convoy

##### Spira

:   "*The* Kezarat *was the command ship in a hundred-tanker Byne Guild convoy bringing fuel to the Outer Rim Territories some two hundred years back. It just…vanished. […]* "  
    "*Probably got hit by raiders, right? That much fuel had to be a tempting target."  
    "Some people say that, Luke. But I think it was something different. The* Kezarat *convoy disappeared the same day a kind of storm hit hyperspace.*"
:   ―Amilyn Holdo and Luke Skywalker[[172]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_29-172)

Later, Skywalker took a break with Organa, Calrissian, Lobot, Chewbacca, and [Amilyn Holdo](/wiki/Amilyn_Holdo "Amilyn Holdo") at the latter's [friend's](/wiki/Amilyn_Holdo%27s_friend "Amilyn Holdo's friend") [house](/wiki/Amilyn_Holdo%27s_friend%27s_mansion "Amilyn Holdo's friend's mansion") on the planet [Spira](/wiki/Spira "Spira"). Sitting by the pool, Skywalker read the Jedi text he had recovered from Gazian. Calrissian, who was playing [Sabacc](/wiki/Sabacc "Sabacc") with Lobot and Chewbacca tried to convince Skywalker to stop reading and join their game, but Skywalker refused, explaining that he did not often get the opportunity to study and wanted to use the time to focus since he was learning so much about the Force and the Jedi from the text. Eventually, Calrissian pushed Chewbacca into the pool, sending a wave toward Skywalker that he held back and redirected with the Force while still reading with a smile. Meanwhile, Holdo tried to convince Organa to relax especially since they were by handsome men. Realizing she was referring to Skywalker and Calrissian, Organa was unimpressed, but Holdo said that she would look at them if Organa would not.[[172]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_29-172)

 [![Skywalker, Holdo, and Organa attend an auction on Spira](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a3/RebelsAtAuction-2020StarWars29.png/revision/latest?cb=20231104100759) [![Skywalker, Holdo, and Organa attend an auction on Spira](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a3/RebelsAtAuction-2020StarWars29.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/300?cb=20231104100759)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a3/RebelsAtAuction-2020StarWars29.png/revision/latest?cb=20231104100759) 

Skywalker, Holdo, and Organa attend an auction on Spira

 

Later, Skywalker, Organa, and Holdo attended an [auction on Spira](/wiki/Auction_on_Spira "Auction on Spira") for an ancient [Nihil](/wiki/Nihil "Nihil") [strikeship](/wiki/Strikeship "Strikeship"), the real reason Holdo had wanted them to come to the planet. They were all dressed in elegant masks to hide their identities. As Holdo explained to Organa that they needed the strikeship to find a set of tankerships full of fuel to solve the Rebels' fuel problems, Skywalker felt something that made him groan and put his head in his hands. Holdo was losing the auction to the [curator](/wiki/Unidentified_curator "Unidentified curator") of the [Imperial Museum](/wiki/Galactic_Museum "Galactic Museum"), so she asked Skywalker if he could use the Force to get the man to stop bidding. Skywalker said that he could not perform a mind trick because he was feeling off, believing something was happening with the dark side of the Force that was distracting him,[[172]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_29-172) which unbeknownst to Skywalker was a disturbance in the Force caused by the opening of the [Fermata Cage](/wiki/Fermata_Cage "Fermata Cage").[[173]](#cite_note-Hidden_Empire_5-173) Skywalker agreed to try the trick anyway, but Calrissian commed them and told him not to. Organa, holding Skywalker's arm to stop him from doing anything, listened as Calrissian explained that the mind trick would draw too much attention to them, and that the man might know about the Force and figure out what happened since he ran the Imperial Museum. Calrissian suggested they instead let the man win.[[172]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_29-172)

Later, in a hangar where the man who won the strikeship was keeping it, Skywalker ignited his lightsaber and drew a bunch of stormtroopers that were guarding the ship to him, deflecting their blaster shots back at them. While they were distracted by Skywalker, Calrissian and Holdo fired on them from above and Chewbacca stopped some of the troopers from locking off the ship. Once all the stormtroopers were taken down, Calrissian said that he knew his plan would work because all the stormtroopers would be so caught up in taking down the Jedi to get a reward that they would not notice anything else. Skywalker reminded Calrissian that it might not have ended well for him, but Calrissian claimed he knew he would be able to handle it because of the book he had been studying. Holdo asked Skywalker to cut open the side of the strikeship with his lightsaber and make a circular hole not too deep. After Skywalker did, they retrieved the [Path engine](/wiki/Path_engine "Path engine") from inside the ship.[[172]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_29-172)

 [![Skywalker and his companions arrive in No-Space](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/f1/NoSpace-2020StarWars29.png/revision/latest?cb=20231104100303) [![Skywalker and his companions arrive in No-Space](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/f1/NoSpace-2020StarWars29.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20231104100303)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/f1/NoSpace-2020StarWars29.png/revision/latest?cb=20231104100303) 

Skywalker and his companions arrive in No-Space

 

Later, back at Holdo's friend's house, Holdo explained that she was planning to go after the [*Kezarat* convoy](/wiki/Kezarat_Convoy "Kezarat Convoy"), which Organa had suspected. She explained that it was a massive [Byne Guild](/wiki/Byne_Guild "Byne Guild") fuel convoy that disappeared when entering [hyperspace](/wiki/Hyperspace "Hyperspace") many years earlier. Skywalker asked if it was because it got hit by raiders because it was such a sought-after target, but Holdo revealed it actually disappeared during a [storm](/wiki/Great_Hyperspace_Disaster "Great Hyperspace Disaster") in hyperspace caused by the Nihil. She hoped that the last message sent by the convoy that was thought to be nonsense was actually navigational data designed only to communicate with a Path engine and that both together could take them to the convoy. After Chewbacca finished installing the Path engine into their ship the *[Skyfarer](/wiki/Skyfarer "Skyfarer")*, a group of TIE fighters found them and started going after them. Holdo attempted to pilot the ship out of the atmosphere so they could jump to hyperspace and escape, but the Path engine activated on its own and sent the ship through hyperspace into [No-Space](/wiki/No-Space "No-Space"), near the [Great Hall of the Nihil](/wiki/Great_Hall_of_the_Nihil "Great Hall of the Nihil").[[172]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_29-172)

##### The lost colony

:   "*Sometimes people find their way to No-Space, just like you all did. […] One of those was a Jedi. Alareen Xie. She joined us, helped us fight off the Nihil. We wouldn't have survived without her. She died in time, as most people do. But after she did, a sort of belief rose up. That someday a Jedi would return and take us out of this place. Would take us home.*"
:   ―Blythe, to Skywalker[[174]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_31-174)

Skywalker and his friends did not recognize No-Space and had no idea where they were, but Skywalker expressed that while he had not traveled as much as they had, he knew the galaxy had strange things in it. He added that the Force seemed off and distant, as if there was not much around that was alive. After Holdo tried and failed to take the ship to hyperspace again, Skywalker suggested that they needed to disconnect the Path engine to see if it would fix the problem, but Holdo revealed they would need to land somewhere first. After landing on the Great Hall, Lando lamented the dangers of falling off the edge there and said it was worse than Cloud City, but Skywalker insisted that Cloud City had been really bad. A child in a spacesuit then appeared and asked them if they had 'flavors', which Calrissian interpreted to mean the kid wanted to eat them. Skywalker said he was just a kid, but Calrissian asked him to remind him to tell Skywalker about the [White Worms](/wiki/White_Worms "White Worms") gang's savage children. The kid eventually advised them to hide and ran off, and Skywalker sensed with the Force that the kid was terrified and did not know where he was going. The kid then jumped off the edge of the Hall, which shocked Skywalker, but he just activated a jetpack and flew away.[[175]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_30-175)

 [![A killdroid in the Great Hall](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/37/Killdroid-2020StarWars30.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20230105152936) [![A killdroid in the Great Hall](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/37/Killdroid-2020StarWars30.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20230105152936)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/37/Killdroid-2020StarWars30.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20230105152936) 

A killdroid in the Great Hall

 

Lando suggested they get out of there, which Skywalker agreed with, suggesting they go back to their ship and try to find the other place there that the boy mentioned. He then noticed that a bunch of Nihil [killdroids](/wiki/Killdroid "Killdroid") had surrounded their ship, which was what the boy was afraid of. Skywalker began to fight them with his lightsaber, but quickly realized that they were lightsaber resistant. A ship then pulled up next to the hall, and Holdo suggested that they board it to escape the droids, but was concerned by having to jump across open space to it. Skywalker insisted that it was not that bad of a jump and because the ramp had a magnetic shield they would not be in the vacuum very long, but Calrissian implied that easy for him to say because he was a Jedi. They all jumped over to the ship without issue, except for Calrissian, who tripped and fell, prompting Skywalker to use the Force to pull him back up while muttering "I can do this." Once Calrissian was safe he thanked Skywalker for saving his life and assured him he would not bother him about studying his book ever again. Skywalker revealed that he could have gotten him to safety faster but could not because there was still something going on with the Force that he described as ripples messing with his concentration. Once the ship they were on docked with a larger ship, a voice over a speaker ordered them to throw their weapons out into space or they would vent them out into space. Skywalker considered using his lightaber to just cut through the door into the bigger ship but realized they would just vent them anyway. He threw his lightsaber out into space, which he said hurt because they were hard to find, but the kid with the jetpack just flew over, picked it up, and ignited it before flying away, Skywalker warning him that he needed to be careful with it or he would hurt himself.[[175]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_30-175)

The voice over the speaker welcomed them to the [Colony of Kezarat](/wiki/Colony_of_Kezarat "Colony of Kezarat"). Holdo yelled that they just needed to go home, but an [Abyssin](/wiki/Abyssin "Abyssin") left the cockpit and told them they were home.[[175]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_30-175) After Organa said they would not attack and were listening, the individual introduced himself as Captain [Blythe](/wiki/Blythe "Blythe"), and Holdo introduced herself, Skywalker, and the others to him. Blythe then began a tour of the colony, confirming that it was the old convoy and the fuel was still there. The kid, who Blythe revealed was named [Forvan](/wiki/Forvan "Forvan"), then ran up excitedly, and Blythe explained that he had gotten excited from seeing a lightsaber. Skywalker asked if it was because they had Jedi there and asked for his saber back, but Blythe said they did not have Jedi there and he would get his lightsaber back in due time. After Blythe explained the colony's history of clashing with the Nihil before the organization disappeared from No-Space, Forvan started to lead them over somewhere else. Blythe told Skywalker to let Forvan down easy, and when he said he did not understand, Blythe said he would.[[174]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_31-174)

 [![The mural of Alareen Xie](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/39/AlareenXie-2020StarWars31.png/revision/latest?cb=20230216083332) [![The mural of Alareen Xie](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/39/AlareenXie-2020StarWars31.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20230216083332)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/39/AlareenXie-2020StarWars31.png/revision/latest?cb=20230216083332) 

The mural of Alareen Xie

 

Forvan took them to mural depicting a Jedi. Skywalker was shocked that they had a Jedi with the convoy, but Blythe said she had not been there from the beginning and just found her way to No-Space. Blythe explained that her name was [Alareen Xie](/wiki/Alareen_Xie "Alareen Xie"), and that after she died a belief spread within the colony that a Jedi would someday lead them home. Blythe once again reiterated for Skywalker to let Forvan down easy, so he bent down to speak with Forvan and told him that while the Jedi could do incredible things, he could not assure them that he would get them out of No-Space, though he would at least do everything he could to try and get them out of there or to make their lives better. Forvan once again said that Jedi could do anything, so Skywalker just said he would try his best. After Blythe warned them that they would be there for a while and would not be able to get back to their ship, Skywalker and the others all went to sleeping quarters given to them. Skywalker paced around the room and Organa recognized something was wrong and asked him about it. Skywalker explained that he had to get out of there to get back to the ship to get the irreplaceable Jedi text that he had left on it. When she brought it up, Skywalker said he was not worried about his lightsaber as he could get another one, but that without the text he would not be able to move forward with his training. He feared that if he lost it and was no longer able to access its knowledge, techniques, and history of the Force and the Jedi Order or be able to use it to find places he could learn more, he would never truly become a Jedi.[[174]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_31-174)

##### Escape from No-Space

:   "*Keep the killdroids off Chewie until he's back on the ship. Then get yourselves safe too. I'm going after the Jedi text.*"  
    "*But you said your saber can't get through [the killdroids'] armor! And Luke…it's just a book!*"  
    "*No. It's* the *book. And as far as my lightsaber, I wasn't properly focused before. Now I am. Now…the Force is with me.*"
:   ―Skywalker and Holdo[[176]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_32-176)

After Chewbacca realized that they could use the Path engine to escape No-Space, Blythe gathered Skywalker and the others, offering them an old [Longbeam cruiser](/wiki/Longbeam-class_corvette "Longbeam-class corvette") to retrieve it. Skywalker was skeptical that it could fly, but Blythe assured them that it used to and just needed to be fixed up. Once they got the cruiser to take off and leave the colony, Holdo and Lando took inventory of what they had, including that they had a Jedi. Skywalker reminded them that his connection to the Force was different and hard to use in No-Space and something strange felt like it was happening to it anyway, but he assured them he would try his best. Calrissian assured them they would be fine, but Skywalker was still skeptical and pointed out that the killdroids had found and taken the Path engine. Skywalker decided that he would distract the droids so the others could get the engine, but after needed to go back to the *Skyfarer* and get his Jedi text, refusing to leave without it. He added that he had talked to Forvan before they left and that the boy, wanting to help out a Jedi, gave him specialized gear, including a spacesuit, that he could use to get down to the Great Hall. Wearing the spacesuit, Skywalker jumped from the cruiser down to the Hall, ignited his lightsaber, and called out to the droids, encouraging them to go after him. As Skywalker, Holdo, and Calrissian distracted the droids, Skywalker deflecting their blastershots with his lightsaber, Chewbacca went after the engine. However, some droids noticed and went after Chewbacca anyway, so Skywalker sent them flying away off into no-Space with the Force. He warned Chewbacca that he probably would not be able to do it again, so he needed to run and get the engine back to the ship.[[176]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_32-176)

 [![The Kezarat Colony](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/01/ColonyofKezarat-CGSWG.png/revision/latest?cb=20250129052305) [![The Kezarat Colony](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/01/ColonyofKezarat-CGSWG.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20250129052305)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/01/ColonyofKezarat-CGSWG.png/revision/latest?cb=20250129052305) 

The Kezarat Colony

 

After shooting a droid behind Chewbacca with a blaster, Skywalker started to run off and told Holdo to keep Chewbacca safe while he ran after the Jedi text. She reminded him that his lightsaber could not get through their armor and that it was just a book, but Skywalker said that it was more than just a book and that he had not been focused when his lightsaber would not cut them the first time, but now was. Skywalker sliced through the droids with his lightsaber while saying "the Force is with me" and calling out for what they did with his book. He eventually found the book on a ledge at the edge of the Hall and decided that he would easily be able to grab it and fly back to the ship, but a killdroid shot his jetpack, sending him flying uncontrollably toward the book and leaving it without fuel. As killdroids approached him, their footsteps shaking the ground caused the book to go over the edge. Skywalker screamed in horror and reached out to it with his right hand, which was holding his lightsaber, but a droid grabbed his hand and lifted him up by it, crushing both his hand and his lightsaber.[[176]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_32-176) The droid threw him onto the ground and into the remains of the *Skyfarer*, and Skywalker cried out in horror when he saw his hand and lightsaber. Calrissian and Holdo saw what happened and decided to try and get to Skywalker before the droids killed him. A delirious Skywalker told the approaching droids to stop, but when they did not, he threw all of the droids out of the Hall in a massive wave using the Force while telling himself "may the Force be with me." Calrissian, Holdo, and Chewbacca were shocked at how he was doing it, and Calrissian told Chewbacca to remind him never to get on his bad side. Skywalker then pulled the Jedi text to him with the Force and passed out immediately after.[[177]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_33-177)

Later, on the way back to the colony, Calrissian checked in on a now handless Skywalker, though the droid had only destroyed his already mechanical hand. Calrissian asked him how he would done what he did, but he said that he did not understand how it happened and that it felt like the Force suddenly came back to him stronger than ever, and that it was frightening. Calrissian told him to cheer up, but thinking about his broken lightsaber and his inevitable confrontation with Vader, told Calrissian that he was not sure he would be able to do something he needed to anymore. Back at the colony, Skywalker showed Organa, who had stayed behind, what happened to his hand. Blythe and Forvan offered to fix it up, the latter suggesting a claw or grappling hook, but Skywalker said he would just wait until they got home even though those things would be cool. Skywalker and Chewbacca then presented the Path engine to Blythe. After Blythe presented the group to the members of the colony, but Organa and Calrissian warned them about the dangers of the Empire and traveling with them, Blythe revealed to them that several of the colony decided to go back with them. However, he revealed that many were going to stay on the Great Hall since they got rid of all the killdroids. Chewbacca pointed out that Skywalker got rid of all the droids by himself, and Blythe commented that it seemed the things people said about Jedi were true. However, Skywalker, who was struggling to pull a piece of scrap to him with the Force, said they sometimes were true and sometimes were not. Later, after a rough hyperspace jump made with many ships secured together and assisted by Lobot, Skywalker and his friends as well as several members of the colony arrived back in the greater galaxy.[[177]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_(2020)_33-177)

Back with the fleet, Skywalker had his mechanical hand repaired by a medical droid while R2-D2 did his best to repair his lightsaber. Organa reminded Skywalker that it could have been worse if the droid had crushed his other hand, and asked him about the powerful act of the Force he had pulled off on the Great Hall. He confirmed that he had not learned it from his book but that it was instead related to something being wrong with the Force, describing it as if something hit the Force while he was in No-Space and caused it to ripple.
